We migrated from Teamspeak to our own Discord Server.

This move provided us with a number of advantages and new abilities:

  - nearly 24/7 support with quicker response time
  - a fast and easy way to get in touch with us or the community  (real time or asynchronously)
  - instant notification when a new forum post or announcement is made
  - read ingame chat in real time - even when you are not logged in to HWS
  - [url=https://www.patreon.com/hws]become a Patron and write from Discord to ingame players[/url]
  - request a connection of your faction chat and discord. That way you get also intruded alarms 24/7 in there.


[i]"[i]Keep in mind that you can have [b]temporary[/b] channels for your faction, just request it. But setting up a permanent channel with game integration cost us time and fills up space in the HWS Discord server. Our goal is to only have active faction channels there and not hundreds of empty ones as we saw on other Discord servers.[/i]
"[/i]

------------------------



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/2/2f717cc573c29ff178203657591de655b4f0f2be.jpg]
image.jpg937×347 22.6 KB[/url]

[b][u]HWS Discord Server: [url=https://discord.gg/ZFw4U9h]https://discord.gg/ZFw4U9h[/url][/u][/b]

[i]"[b]Note:[/b] After each full wipe we have to re-integrate the Discord <> Ingame Faction chat. Please let us know if your faction continues to use that faction chat feature.
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Some guidelines and info:[/u][/b]

  - The Discord <> Ingame Chat integration is now available for [url=https://www.patreon.com/hws]HWS Elite & HWS Meta[/url] Patrons.
  - If you are ingame, you have to use the ingame chat! I see too often players ingame and using Discord to make their chat “special” over others -> abuse.
  - Quick notes, quick help is fine. I consider [b]HWS Elite[/b] and [b]HWS Meta[/b] as loyal and “old” HWS players. Similar to the HWS Community Helper role.The chat feature should not be abused for general chat, because
  - The API we have currently does not allow to split the incoming and outgoing chat into global chat and faction chat. [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/jascha]@Jascha[/url] only have one way he can broadcast the chat and that is in global AND faction chat. A very bad limitation we have to live with it for now.

English:
[i]Q: Can I dock a Small Vessel or a Hover Vessel to a Capital Vessel?[/i]
Yes, but the to-be-docked vessels needs to be in the same faction as the Capital Vessel you want to dock it to. Exception: if the Capital Vessel is set to public, any private vessel can dock.

[i]Q: Can I dock Small Vessel to Small Vessel or Hover Vessel to Small Vessel or Capital Vessel to a Base or any other combination?[/i]
No. Only Small Vessel/Hover Vessel can currently be docked to a Capital Vessel.

[i]Q: How does docking work in particular?[/i]
Your Hover Vessel or Small Vessel either need to be equipped with docking pads or landing gears attached BELOW the vessel corpus. Adding docking pads on the sides or on the top will not dock the vessel to the Capital Vessel! 

Move your Small Vessel or Hover Vessel onto the Capital Vessel. Lower the vessel with C and the Vessel will dock itself. There is no Docking-Key. Just have a look at the info screen on the right. It will show you a 'docked: ' with YES or NO. To undock, just hit SPACE and fly away. 

[u]Note:[/u] 
- Small Vessel and Hover Vessel will not dock to any other blocks than steel or hardened steel. 
 - You cannot dock a Small Vessel or Hover Vessel to a Capital Vessel landing gear!

[i]Q: Do the Capital Vessel landing gears have any use?[/i]
Other than looking cool and absorbing damage from a hard landing? Not yet.
Russian:
[i]Q: puis-je arrimer un petit vaisseau ou un Hover à un vaisseau mère ? [/i]
Oui, mais pour pouvoir s'arrimer, le vaisseau doit faire partie de la même Faction que le vaisseau mère. Exception : si le vaisseau mère est défini 'Public', n'importe quel vaisseau privé peut s'y arrimer.

[u]Note :[/u] actuellement, seul un petit vaisseau ou un Hover peut être arrimé à un vaisseau mère.

[i]Q: comment fonctionne l'arrimage ? [/i]
Votre Hover ou petit vaisseau doit être équipé d'un système d'arrimage (Hover) ou d'un train d'atterrissage (petit vaisseau) fixé au dessous de la coque. Monter un système d'arrimage sur les côtés ou sur le dessus du Hover ne permettra pas l'arrimage ! 
Pour réaliser l'arrimage :
1- Amenez votre petit vaisseau ou Hover sur le vaisseau mère.
2- Abaisser le vaisseau avec la touche 'C', et l'arrimage se fera tout seul.
Vous pourrez voir à droite de l'écran l'info 'Arrimé : ' avec 'Oui' ou 'Non'. Pour vous désarrimer, il suffit d'appuyez sur 'espace' et de décoller.

[u]Note :[/u] Un petit vaisseau ou Hover ne pourra pas s'arrimer à des blocs autres que ceux en acier ou acier blindé.
Vous ne pouvez pas vous arrimer au train d'atterrissage d'un vaisseau mère !

[i]Q: le train d'atterrissage a t-il une utilité sur un vaisseau mère  ? [/i]
Autre qu'avoir l'air cool et absorber les chocs en cas d'atterrissage brutal ? Pas encore.
,[i]P: Posso encaixar uma Small Vessel ou um Hover Vessel em um Capital Vessel? [/i]
Sim, mas as naves que vão ser ser ancorados precisam estar na mesma facção que o Capital Vessel para o qual deseja encaixar. Exceção: se o Capital Vessel for definido como público, qualquer nave privada pode encaixar.

[i]P: Posso encaixar Small Vessel em um Small Vessel ou um Hover Vessel em um Small Vessel ou um Capital Vessel em uma Base ou qualquer outra combinação? [/i]
Não. Somente o Small Vessel/Hover Vessel pode atualmente ser encaixado no Capital Vessel.

[i]P: Como o encaixe funciona em particular? [/i]
Seu Hover Vessel ou Small Vessel deve ser equipado com bloco de ancoragem ou trem de pouso ABAIXO da nave. Adicionar blocos de ancoragem nos lados ou na parte superior não encaixará a nave ao Capital Vessel!

Mova sua Small Vessel ou Hover Vessel para o Capital Vessel. Aterrisse a nave com C e a nave se encaixará. Não tem uma tecla para ancorar. Basta dar uma olhada na tela de informações à direita. Ele irá mostrar-lhe um 'Ancorado:' com SIM ou NÃO. Para desancorar, basta decolar usando ESPAÇO e voar para longe.

[u]Nota:[/u]
- O Small Vessel e o Hover Vessel não encaixarão em nenhum outro bloco que não seja aço ou aço endurecido.
- Você não pode encaixar um Small Vessel ou Hover Vessel em um trem de pouso do Capital Vessel!

[i]P: Os trens de pouso do Capital Vessel têm algum uso? [/i]
Além de parecer legal e absorver danos de um pouso repentino? Ainda não.,[i]В: Могу ли я пристыковать свое малое судно или парящее судно к большому судну?[/i]
Да, но стыкуемые суда должны принадлежать той же фракции, что и большое судно. Исключение: если большое судно отмечено как публичное, то стыковаться может любое личное судно.

[i]В: Могу ли я стыковать малое судно к малому или большое судно к базе или, может, использовать другие варианты стыковки?[/i]
Нет. На данный момент только малое/парящее суда могут быть пристыкованы к большому.

[i]В: Как конкретно работает стыковка?[/i]
Ваше малое или парящее судно должно быть оснащено стыковочными узлами или посадочными опорами, присоединенными СНИЗУ корпуса судна. Если разместить посадочные опоры или стыковочные узлы сбоку или сверху, то такой аппарат не сможет быть пристывкован к большому судну! 

Подлетите на вашем малом или парящем судне к большому сверху. Снизьтесь при помощи клавиши C (по умолчанию), и судно пристыкуется автоматически. Никаких док-ключей. Просто взгляните на информационную панель справа. Там есть строка 'пристыковано: ', имеющая значение Да или Нет. Чтобы отстыковаться, просто нажмите SPACE и улетайте. 

[u]На заметку:[/u] 
- Малое судно или парящее судно не стыкуются ни к каким блокам, кроме стальных и блоков из закаленной стали. 
 - Вы не можете пристыковать малое или парящее судно к посадочным опорам большого судна!

[i]В: Есть ли в посадочных опорах большого судна хоть какой-нибудь смысл?[/i]
Кроме потрясного вида и защиты от повреждений при жесткой посадке? Пока нет.,,[i]问：我能将一艘悬浮飞船或小飞船停靠到母舰上么？[/i]
当然，要不为啥叫母舰？但是只有同一派系的飞船才允许停靠。举例：如果母舰所有权被设置成了公共，任何悬浮飞船或小飞船都可以停靠。

[i]问：我能将小飞船停靠到小飞船，或是悬浮飞船停靠到小飞船，或是母舰停靠到母舰么？[/i]
不行。现版本只允许悬浮飞船或小飞船停靠到母舰或基地，母舰停靠到基地。

[i]问：如何停靠？[/i]
你的悬浮飞船或小飞船必须安装起落架，并能依靠起落架降落平稳，在母舰或基地上用起落架降落平稳自动进入停靠状态（起落架和母舰要有接触），有特别的音效。是否算作停靠你要在悬浮飞船或小飞船驾驶舱里看右下的信息。想脱离停靠直接飞走或悬空即可。

[u]注意：[/u] 
- 悬浮飞船或小飞船不能停靠在非金属方块上（木质，混凝土）。
 - 另外，起落架也有吸收降落伤害的作用，直接方块落地，方块耐久可能有损失。（原文是以前版本的，译者自作主张改为现版本解释）

English: Place a plant in the growing plot
Place a Corn Harvestable into the Growing Plot to spread life and love!
Russian: Поместите Кукурузное зерно на растительный модуль, чтобы распространять жизнь и любовь!

Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.
Be warned! Traitors and Mercenaries might have captured the Freighter already!

HWS Racom - Liant + Unknown Orbit

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]

[b][ff0000]!!! Внимание РvP ! Очень Опасно !!![-][/b]

[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
Мы не можем терпеть этих мерзких мерзавцев, работающих на наёмников! Верните нашу добычу, прежде чем она будет продана по смешным ценам на рынке!
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть все руды с помощью Бура, чтобы вас не обнаружила система безопасности грузового судна и вернуться к торговцу.
Будьте осторожны! Предатели и наемники уже могли захватить корабль!

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Система Cebo + Неизвестная орбита

У вас есть всего 10 минут до вызова подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший Бур и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, Бесконечно раз, 720 мин. задержка + 1 мин. пауза за успех

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents
HWS offers players a unique story-based backdrop for the Empyrion universe which vastly enriches gameplay and gives players a fresh new perspective and a deeper, more rewarding experience.

[b]Every feature on HWS gives players an exclusive and direct connection to the story which unfolds as you develop your character.[/b]

No matter if you store assets and supplies in your OCD, recycle your structures via EGS, or manage your wealth of credits via the Elemental Bank, you must accept that:

[i]"[b]you are a  clone with artificial memories[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/9/9e253075e873b00d088db06d997c68c3e44c9936.jpeg]
image.jpg2237×1301 102 KB[/url]


You are determined to find out who created you and the details of your origin.   What is your purpose?

As you progress towards the truth, you will discover hints, solve puzzles and complete missions with possibly the help of your friends as you uncover all the answers which await.
[b][u]
Origins[/u][/b]

To join one of the three Origins, you have to choose the appropriate Starter planet. Only then are you matched to that Origin officially. Each Origin has a unique starter planet and you can’t change your Origin unless you reset your character with the command: [b]cb:reset[/b] (available every 12 hours)

Therefore, be sure you read each Origin’s description carefully and know which journey appeals to you and fits your preferences and personality.

Origins are basically the parent groups of all factions. For example: The Freelancer Origin can have multiple factions within it.

[b]Remember:[/b] [i]Starter Planets have a one way warp!
This prevents players from warping back to safety after venturing into a universe with areas that are dangerous.  If you run into deadly trouble and suffer a loss, you may always chose to once again get a fresh beginning on your starter world (with [b]cb:reset[/b]), but you cannot warp back there with a ship.  So before you warp out of your chosen starter system, be sure you are ready and well stocked.[/i]

By default each faction in your origin is NOT allied with each other.  Alliances are proposed and accepted by players.  Being in alliance with other factions means that your auto-turrets will not target each others structures in PvP. However, friendly fire is active and you [b]can[/b] inflict damage on each other with manual fire!

[b]GUIDELINES[/b]: To help maintain continuity of the HWS Storyline, we request that you do your best to build and support the roles of the various Origins.  For example, if you want to hunt and kill, join the Outcast origin.  Or… if you wish to make the universe a better place by trading and/or protecting those who trade - choose Federation.  Operating within your faction’s role is very important to upholding and fulfilling the HWS Storyline!
[b][u]
Clone Levels[/u][/b]

While you play on HWS, season for season, you will return every time as Clone - until you found the truth.But along the way you will also progress in your Clone level. More and more memories will come back in your mind, helping you greatly for future tasks.

However you have to find notes not only in the Universe but sometimes outside of the Universe. In HWS Connect or the HWS Forum for example.

This topic will contain a table of contentsThe servers must be completely wiped periodically and all players start over again on HWS because Empyrion is currently in alpha development.  Eleon (developers of Empyrion) release major patches roughly 2 to 3 times a year.[b][u]HWS Seasons[/u][/b]

In addition, HWS has implemented Seasons -  these last approximately [b]90-days[/b] (3-months).  However, the length of seasons may vary (shorter or longer) – such as when Eleon releases a major version update, or a very critical patch is needed between major releases.

Complete server wipes normally have a major impact on players due to loss of all progress. This is true of all servers, including HWS. However, we here at HWS have created and implemented several unique features that set HWS apart from the typical server setup.Three (3) of these unique features allow players to retain much of their hard won progress across wipes, these are:

  - [b]Elemental Bank:[/b]  Retain various amounts of Credits across wipes
  - [b]Orbital Cargo Drone:[/b]  Retain various types and amounts of ores, blocks, parts
  - [b]Orbital Auto Miners:[/b]  Produce and store various types and amounts of Ores


Our commitment to players – we will only wipe servers when it’s completely necessary, or when a season ends and a new season begins.
[i]We do not create fake reasons as others to force a full wipe only to get attention![/i]
[b][u]Player Resets[/u][/b]

If you don’t like your planet or misclicked you can type [b][fdb100]cb:reset[-][/b] in chat to remove yourself from the server and start new like your first join.
[b][u]What Is Kept[/u][/b]

  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/orbital-cargo-drone-ocd/4394]OCD level and contents[/url]

  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/recycle-structures/7112]EGS Recycle level[/url]

  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-reputation-points/4388]HWS Reputation Points[/url]

  - OAM levels, Ores and Fuel ([url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/orbital-auto-miner-oam/4393]Orbital Autominer[/url])

  - Elemental Bank level and Credits - depended on your [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/elemental-bank-eb/4395]Elemental Bank Level[/url]


[b][u]What Is Lost[/u][/b]

  - Player Level
  - Inventory
  - Ownership (private structures)
  - Faction
  - Faction Allegiance(s)
  - Origin
  - Player Credits
  - Blueprint Factory Contents
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-skill-tree/9696]HWS Skill Tree[/url] Skills. These are associated with your previous character.

[b][u]Playfield Wipe[/u][/b]

A Playfield Wipe means you lose every structure or placed device (e.g. Water Generator) on it but structres outside of that playfield or your inventory are safe.

HWS has such wipes for [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/the-black-hole/4379]Black Hole[/url] and [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/the-phoenix/16358]Phoenix[/url]:

  - On EU, Black Hole & Phoenix wipe daily with the next wipe occurring at May 4, 2018 3:00 PM
  - On NA, Black Hole & Phoenix wipe daily with the next wipe occurring at May 4, 2018 9:00 PM

[b][u]Terrain wipe (Hard)[/u][/b]

That means the whole terrain of a planet will be reset to its original state. Every digged hole will be fixed and [b]every placeable device (e.g. Water Generator) removed[/b].
Your structures and Inventory are safe though.Be careful with Structural Integrity of your bases in such situations.

HWS has such wipes for [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/golden-globe/12099]Golden Globe[/url], Atlantis and Armageddon.

[i]"[b]NOTE:[/b] Auto Miners and other placeables will be wiped!
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"Type [fdb100][b]cb:nextwipe[/b][-] in the game chat to see the upcoming wipe times!
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Terrain wipe (Soft)[/u][/b]

The difference to above is that the terrain around / in your base will be untouched. So if you have an underground base, the terrain around that base will not get reset.

[b]We are running these wipes on many Planets at different times.[/b]

[i]"[b]NOTE:[/b] Auto Miners and other placeables will be wiped!
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"Type [fdb100][b]cb:nextwipe[/b][-] in the game chat to see the upcoming wipe times!
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"[b]Check the Map description (M) at bottom right for more info[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Deposit Wipe[/u][/b]

That will regenerate every Deposit on a planet back to 100% and reset the terrain around that deposit.

[b]We are running these wipes on many Planets at different times.[/b]

[i]"[b]NOTE:[/b] Auto Miners and other placeables will be wiped!
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"Type [fdb100][b]cb:nextwipe[/b][-] in the game chat to see the upcoming wipe times!
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"[b]Check the Map description (M) at bottom right for more info[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]POI Wipe[/u][/b]

A POI Wipe will regenerate POIs back to its original state, no matter if someone claimed the POI with their own core or not (hence it’s not recommended to live in such POIs).

[b]We are running these wipes on many Playfields at different times.[/b]

[i]"[b]Check the Map description (M) at bottom right for more info[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Personal Wipe[/u][/b]

Personal Wipe Counter means that each player in the [b]Starter System[/b] (planet + orbit) has  [b]7 days[/b]  for their spawned structures. Each player and each structures independently (personal).

[i]"Type [fdb100][b]cb:wipe[/b][-] in the game chat to see the upcoming wipe times!
"[/i]

------------------------

It’s easy if you check your cb:wipe counter regulary (and of course only on the Starter Planets + their Orbits). It does not count for all the other playfields!
[b][u]Full Wipes[/u][/b]

To follow the patch cycle of Eleon, adapt to new changes, create new content and make things overall more interesting we have a [b]3 month season[/b] cycle on HWS.
[b][u]What will be transferred[/u][/b]

  - HWS RP earned in one season will be paid out as credits for the following Season. The multiplier is [b]7,000[/b].
[b]Example:[/b] If a player earned and has a total of 100 RP at the end of a season, they would be paid [b]700,000 credits[/b] the next season.  This amount will be deposited into their Elemental Bank account.

  - [b]Up to 2,500,000  Credits[/b]  - This amount is higher if a player upgrades their [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-features-elemental-bank-lottery-economy/4395]Elemental Bank[/url]

  - All Ore types from the HWS Auto Miner (OAM).  The OAM levels transfer as well.

  - Everything stored in the OCD[ff0000]*[-], including the OCD level.
*[i]This is subject to change. Always check the forum for announcements about what items in the OCD may be eliminated or reduced for the coming full server wipe and plan accordingly.[/i]


[b][u]What can be transferred with Support Packages[/u][/b]

  - Elemental Bank Balance (up to 400 million)
  - Elemental Bank Level
  - EGS Recycle Level
  - Factory Resources (transferred into the OCD - if there is room)

[b][u]What will not be transferred[/u][/b]

  - Completed Factory Blueprints (ships, bases)
  - Player Inventory
  - HWS Marketplace Trades
  - Player Level
  - Factions
  - Ships
  - Bases
  - OAM Fuel
  - HWS Skill Tree Skills & Skill Points
  - Fa Supply Counter (you can use fa:supply after the full wipe)
  - Every illegale item in the OCD


[b]Check the forum for announcements regarding full wipes.[/b]
[b][u]Important Server Settings[/u][/b]

  - [b][u]cb:reset[/u][/b]

Players can [b]cb:reset[/b] within the [b]first 10 hours 3 times without a delay[/b]. After the first three resets or after 10 hours of play, the cooldown increases to 3 hours and 3 hours are added each subsequent time the command is used (3, 6, 9, 12 hours, etc.).  This prevents starter loot farming.

  - [b][u]DecayTime: 6 hours[/u][/b]

Player-built structures without a core or which have less than [b]10 blocks[/b] are removed.

  - [b][u]WipeTime (Touch): 360 hours [15 days][/u][/b]

Player-built structures are removed when not visited / touched for more than 2 weeks. ‘Touched’ means the player that owns the structure stands ON or IN the vehicle or base. Accessing a structure via its Control Panel or docking to an untouched CV does not qualify.  The amount of time since a structure was last touched is visible on HWS Connect in the Structure Commander.

  - [b][u]ProtectTime: 24 hours[/u][/b]

Offline Protection Duration

  - [b][u]ProtectDelay: 30 minutes[/u][/b]

Half hour delay after a players logs off before Offline Protection becomes active.

  - [b][u]Proximity Alarm Range[/u][/b]

Planet: [b]500 meters[/b] | Space: [b]2000 meters[/b]

  - [b][u]DSL (Dynamic Structure Loading)[/u][/b]

60 seconds unload time | [b]1700m[/b] on Planet | [b]3500m[/b] in Space

[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c]
You have well done so far, my precious clone!

Prepare now for warping to the next Space Sector.

[c][ed1e1e][u]Hint:[/u][-][/c]
[b][c][fdb100]Once you warped to the next Orbit, you [-][/c][c][fd0006]can't come back![-][/c][/b]
Make sure to take all your friends and belongings with you!!
Russian:
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c]
[c][FFFFFF]Ты молодец, мой драгоценный клон![-][/c]

[c][FFFFFF]Приготовьтесь к Варпу-прыжку на следующую орбиту.[-][/c]

Подсказка:
[c][fdb100]После того, как вы варпнетесь на следующую орбиту, вы не сможете вернуться![-][/c]
Обязательно возьмите с собой всех своих друзей и вещи!!!

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents[b][u]Story and Gameplay[/u][/b]

The Federation Origin are the so-called ‘good’ guys of the HWS Universe. They protect the weak and the meek and they inflict justice upon those who operate outside of the law. They are not afraid to punish people who prey on the powerless.

Here are some of the guiding principles, requirements, features and benefits if you choose [b]Federation[/b] as your Origin:

  - The Federation Origin weapon is the [fdb100][b]Epic Assault Rifle[/b][-]
  - Protector of the weak
  - Specialized in Trading
  - May be called upon and Deputized by an Admin to help keep peace or resolve community issues
  - Ally with the Polaris NPC Faction




[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/2/27a7c7308ef71a9e38bb9d2b3959c0bb3671f366.jpeg]
image.jpg900×150 29.8 KB[/url]

[b][u]Federation Supply Packages[/u][/b]

This supply package can save your life or get you out of a tight spot. The HWS Universe is not without danger, so if you find yourself stuck somewhere without supplies, use this command - but be sure there is room in your inventory first!  Every Origin has access to different versions of these survival supplies, so use [b]fa:supply[/b] wisely.  [b]This command can be used once every 7 days.[/b]
[i][i]Tier I | Unlocked at < 1000 Reputation Points[/i]
temporary image

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/c/c8bb7ed09c4023b9891014ebaf0dcd4d987518b7.jpeg]

This topic will contain a table of contents[b][u]Story and Gameplay[/u][/b]

The Outcast Origin is a self-seeking group, but they are proud, skilled, and cunning.  Though some may consider them to be the ‘bad’ guys in the HWS Universe, they are undeniably brilliant opportunists. They excel at liberating players from their possessions and joyfully force this fate on any and every Origin, including their own.  They thrive in almost any situation, overcoming adversity by their wits and often find that their only allies are other Outcast members.

Here are some of the guiding principles, requirements, features and benefits if you choose [b]Outcast[/b] as your Origin:

  - The Outcast Origin weapon is the [fdb100][b]Epic Laser Minigun[/b][-] 

  - Every ship is a potential payday

  - Practically no structure can withstand the combined efforts of a few experienced Outcast

  - Often, there is no honor among thieves

  - Ally with the Zirax NPC Faction

Freelancers would object to being labeled as ‘good guy’ or ‘outlaw’.   They would likely object to practically any label. While Freelancers may not be as clearly defined as the other two Origins  - they are free to carve their own path and define themselves as they see fit, not caring what others may call or think of them. The Freelancer Origin has grown considerably as the many seasons have passed and today, it holds equal status with the other two Origins.  They have earned an honorable place in the HWS Universe and therefore warrant similar benefits and advantages.  This origin is for the die-hard rebel who simply must play his or her own way.

Here are some of the guiding principles, requirements, features and benefits if you choose [b]Freelancer[/b] as your Origin:

  - The Freelancer Origin weapon is the [fdb100][b]Plasma Rifle (Epic)[/b][-] 
  - Less focus on Pirating, PVP, trading or policing & more time spent on exploration & completing missions
  - Freelancers are in a unique position to align themselves both with Federation and/or with Pirates
  - Freelancers are free from many of the restrictions and limitations the Federation and Pirates are bound by
  - Ally with the Talon NPC Faction

This topic will contain a table of contents
Certain playfields have [b]Taxes[/b] applied to them for various reasons.

Playfields with Taxes:

  - Please press [b]M[/b] ingame and read the playfield description.   You may need to scroll down to see [b]Taxes[/b].
  - Typically, taxes are applied to the following playfields: ECC System, CSW, the 2 Peacekeepers and the Donor playfields.   [i]*[b]If[/b] there are more than 200 cores on the Donor Planets.[/i]



[b][u]How Taxes work:[/u][/b]

  - You have to pay taxes for all of your structures (BA, CV, HV, SV) that exist in the taxable playfield and they are  taxed using the following formula:

  - [b]Ship Tax[/b]: Blocks * Devices * Tax Factor([b]100[/b])

  - [b]Private Structure Tax[/b]:  ([b]Ship Tax[/b] + Player [b]Bank[/b] Credits) / RP

  - [b]Faction structure Tax[/b]: ([b]Ship Tax[/b] + Player [b]Bank[/b] Credits + Player Balance) / Faction members / RP



Player Balance is the amount of credits a player has ON them.



 [b][u]Example:[/u][/b]

One member from an active 7-person faction has a CV with 6,534 Blocks and 187 devices and a faction RP of over 2,000.  They will pay [b]77,189 credits[/b] for that CV.

Here’s the math behind this calculation:

First, Calculate the Ship Tax:  [b]6,534 x 187 x 100[/b]  (Blocks * Devices * Tax Factor)Ship Tax = 122,185,800

The CV in question is a faction ship, so the next step in the calculation is: [b]Ship Tax[/b] + [b]Player Bank Credits[/b] + [b]Player Balance[/b] and then we [b]Divide[/b] by [b]the number of Faction Members (7)[/b] and [b]RP[/b] (Average RP of all faction members).
[b][u]Notes:[/u][/b]

  - [b]Tax Factor is 100[/b]

  - RP for the faction structure is the [b]average RP for the whole faction[/b]

  - Faction members are [b]considered as active if they played within the last 7 days[/b]. Inactive players pay half the tax amount.

  - [b]Tax sinners[/b] pay DOUBLE the tax amount.  A Tax Sinner is a player who repeatedly fails to pay taxes that are due or who switches their assets to public in an effort to avoid taxes.

  - Regardless of structure size or type, the minimum tax is [b]1000 credits[/b] per structure.

  - This formula is [b]per player[/b].  This means that the [b]whole[/b] [b]faction[/b] pays taxes if one faction member has faction structures in a taxed playfield. However, faction members do not pay taxes on others’ private structures in a taxed playfield.

  - The credits to pay for taxes will be first taken from the Player Bank, and then from the Player Balance.

  - Taxes will be paid every day at 8:50 AM (servertime: [b]cb:time[/b]). You can park on a taxed playfield until then for free.

  - HWS Connect automatically updates which structures are subject to tax every hour.

  - If a player cannot pay the taxes, the player goes into [b]debt[/b].

  - If a playfield has 199 structures and you are the one which sets it with 200 structures to a taxed playfield only [b]you[/b] will get taxed, not the others (not for ECC + ECC Orbit + CSW though!)

  - If a player is 300,000 or more credits in [b]debt[/b], their latest taxed structure will be [b]set to public[/b].

  - We have implemented a different Tax system for beginner, taking their playtime into account and sending them messages:
     - < 50 hours on HWS = no tax
     - 50h - 99h = 50% tax reduction
     - >= 100h = 100% tax as everyone else

Golden Globe is the most well known planet in the whole HWS Universe.The name is not just a name but indeed the nature of it.
[b][u]Video of Golden Globe in 9.X[/u][/b]

[b][u]Gameplay[/u][/b]

HWS Factories is a big integration and implementation of different features all combined together as smooth as possible!Be it the fight of a Land Claim area, be it the regular loot you can get per hour, be it the trading in the Factory Shop, be it the decisions you have to make regarding hacking or the just cool looking POI 

[b]Golden Globe[/b] especially will give you the important choice to trade lucrative or to hack and be able to mine the Red Gold and get the Factory Loot transferred to your inventory.
Because once you [b]hack the Factory[/b] the Land Claim Device will be destroyed and the Red Gold is free to farm for the next 60 minutes.
[b][u]Layout[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/9/993e66b178c959180cb6184628ff4035fe572ee5.jpeg]
Golden-Globe-Factory-Era.jpg1879×1057 508 KB[/url]


Beside the big HWS Factory integration you have now 2 Red Gold Arenas West and East, you can fight for / control. But then again, is the -20000 Reputation loss for Zirax or Polaris worth the Gold?

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/9/95bae3272beb302a36dec3ffd64e073199d11a39.jpg]
hws-egs-hq.jpg1920×800 175 KB[/url]


The origins have over time developed themselves into niches that they dominate.  But what is not very well understood, or even questioned, is who runs the Elemental Consortium.  One reason nobody questions them or where they get the wealth to do what they do, is because most everyone else benefits from it.

As a way to further reward loyalty and frivolous spending, the EGS team has provided you an additional place to pour your hard earned credits.  In many cases, as is typical for EGS, you earn more than you spend – But nothing is cheap.   That said, with enough investment in the right things, you could spend millions to earn a billion.

To do so, you will want to look into [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-commands]upgrading your EGS membership[/url] status.  Doing so gives you additional perks and access to other EGS services.

Keep an eye out for upgradeable services to get the MOST out of your EGS features.

In this category you will find all HWS Features which are “special”.\nThis either means they have many usage locations like the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/alien-core/9472]Alien Core[/url] (it’s a Support, HWS Garage and EGS topic) or deserve their own spot like the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-garage/4643]HWS Garage[/url], the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/supergate/11596]HWS Supergates[/url], the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-config/9161/22]HWS Config[/url] and many more.

English:
[b][fdb100]Mission[-][/b]
[ff0000][b]!!! ONLY FOR OUTCAST !!![/b][-]
Every Now and Then a Freighter full of Ores are travelling through the Universe. 
Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.

[b][fdb100]Location[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Freelancer Mission Dealer - ECC System + Unknown Orbit

You have only 10 minutes before reinforcement is called. Make sure you have the best Drill equipped and are prepared for any conflict!

[b][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 360m cooldown
Russian:
[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
[ff0000][b]!!! ТОЛЬКО ДЛЯ ПИРАТОВ !!![/b][-]
Время от времени грузовое судно, полное руды, путешествует по Вселенной. 
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть всю руду с помощью бура, чтобы система безопасности грузового судна не обнаружила вас и вернутесь к торговцу.

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Торговая миссия Фрилансер - Система ECC  + Неизвестная Орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до прибытия подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший дрель и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, бесконечно раз, 360 мин. интервал

Over the last 3 years, more and more Features got added to HWS.A limitation of them are chat commands to interact with them.

At least if you don’t use [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect.html]HWS Connect[/url] where you have Buttons to click instead of typing commands ingame and IF HWS Connect should not work, to have a Plan B.

Check the commands from time to time, because they might change over time.

There is also a possibility that one day we have a much better interaction of players and our features straight in the game.
[b][u]All available HWS Commands:[/u][/b]

  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/chatbot-commands/19305]Chatbot Commands[/url]

  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/patron-commands/19307/2]Patron Commands[/url]

Chat Command | Description | 
csw:? | Provides you with useful information regarding Cross Server Warp. | 
csw:start:DESTINATION | Starts the Cross Server Warp engine if you are in the Cross Server Warp orbit. You can find out what destination is available with the command csw:?. | 
csw:startshipless:DESTINATION | Starts the Cross Server Warp engine if you are in the Cross Server Warp orbit. This will only warp your player, not your ships. You can find out what destination is available with the command csw:?. |

Chat Command | Description | 
co:? | Provides you with useful config commands regarding [url=https://www.patreon.com/hws]Become a HWS Patron[/url] | 
co:info | List you all available Patron commands, based on your Patron Level. | 
co:on:[parameter taken from co:info] | The main syntax of Patron commands is always “on” or “off”. By default most Patron exclusive features are “off”. So to turn on your Auto Daily Loot for example, type co:on:ADL. | 
co:off:[parameter taken from co:info] | The main syntax of Patron commands is always “on” or “off”. By default most Patron exclusive features are “off”. So to turn off your Auto Daily Loot for example, type co:off:ADL. |

English:
[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
On the traces of Professor Void on ECC you learned about the Aliens Technologies. On the Triton Planet Professor Void himself developed a new device, but he did not came far... 

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Triton Planet - Blue Dwarf System
Mission activatable in the Clone Room in the EGS HQ Building on the ECC Planet.

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Travel around the Triton Planet and search for the ten EGS Caves. 
Solve a Puzzle to enter the secret room in the RMX Cave. 
Find out, what happened on the Triton Planet.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
No

[b][c][fdb100]Clone Points[-][/c][/b]
Remember to Claim your Clone Point at the Clone Guide Terminal. [b][c][fdb100][-][/c][/b]
You find it somewhere at the end of the mission.
Russian:
[b][c][fdb100]Миссия[-][/c][/b]
По следам профессора Пустоты на ECC вы узнали о технологиях инопланетян. На планете Triton профессор Void сам разработал новое устройство, но он не зашёл далеко ...

[b][c][fdb100]Место[-][/c][/b]
Triton

[b][c][fdb100]Детали[-][/c][/b]

Пролетитесь по планете Triton и найдите десять пещер EGS.
Решите головоломку, чтобы войти в секретную комнату в пещере RMX.
Узнайте, что случилось на планете Triton.

[b][c][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/c][/b]
Нет

[i]Q: How to add players to a specific permission group?[/i]\nAs soon as you are promoted to Admin status, you can EITHER use Telnet OR the ingame-console to achieve that. Use 'help setrole' to learn the syntax and the values you can use.
Russian:
[i]Q: comment ajouter des joueurs à un groupe d'autorisations spécifiques ? [/i]
Dès que vous êtes promu au statut Admin, vous pouvez soit utiliser Telnet ou la console in-game pour atteindre cet objectif. Dans la console, tapez « help setrole » pour visualiser la syntaxe et les valeurs que vous pouvez utiliser.,[i]P: Como adicionar jogadores a um grupo de permissão específico? [/i]
Assim que você for promovido para o status Admin, você pode usar o Telnet OU o console dentro do jogo para conseguir isso. Use 'help setrole' para aprender a sintaxe e os valores que você pode usar.,[i]В: Как добавить игроков в специфическую группу доступа?[/i]
Как только вы стали администратором, вы можете использовать для этого КАК telnet ТАК И внутриигровую консоль. Наберите 'help setrole', чтобы узнать синтаксис и принимаемые параметры данной команды.,PDA情報,[i]问：如何将一些玩家提升为特权玩家？[/i]
如果你是服务器管理员，你可以通过远程命令或游戏内控制台给与权限。打开控制台输入“help setrole”查询具体命令语句。

English:
[i]Q: Do devices also have temperature and radiation?[/i]
YES! Some of the devices will heat up or radiate the area around them, like Thrusters and Generators and Warpdrives.

[i]Q: Can other blocks have temperature and radiation as well?[/i] Yes. For example the green Alien Building blocks are radioactive.

[i]Q: Does the heat 'flow' into the room?[/i]
Currenty there is no 'transition zone'. For devices, the radiation/temperature is limited to a fixed perimeter of ONE block around them. This is subject to change in the future.
Français:
[i]Q: Les appareils et blocs peuvent-il subir les effet de la temparéture ou des radiations ? [/i]
Oui ! Certains éléments vont chauffer ou irradier la zone autour d'eux, comme les propulseurs, les générateurs et les moteurs à distorsion.

[i]Q: d'autres blocs peuvent-ils aussi chauffer et irradier ? [/i]
Oui. Par exemple, certains blocs de construction Alien sont radioactifs.

Concernant les appareils et autres éléments qui peuvent irradier, la zone d'irradiation est limitée à un périmètre fixe de '1 bloc' autour d'eux. Ceci est susceptible d'être modifié à l'avenir.
Russian:
[i]В: У устройств также есть температура и излучение?[/i]
ДА! Некоторые из устройств нагревают или излучают область вокруг них, например, Двигатель, Генератор и Варп-двигатель.

[i]В: Могут ли другие блоки также иметь температуру и излучение?[/i] Да. Например, зеленые блоки строений Чужих являются радиоактивными.

[i]В: Тепло 'течет' в комнату?[/i]
В настоящее время нет 'переходной зоны'. Для устройств радиация / температура ограничена фиксированным периметром ОДНОГО блока вокруг них. Это может измениться в будущем.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：设备会有散热和辐射问题么？[/i]
答：当然！一些设备的周围温度和辐射会很高，比如推进器、发电机和翘曲驱动器。

[i]问：其它的一些方块也有这个问题么？[/i]答：是的。例如绿色外星人建筑方块就会有辐射。

[i]问：设备散热会导致整个房间温度升高么？[/i]
答：目前还不会。设备散热和辐射目前只能影响周围大约一个方块的距离，以后我们会改变这个问题。
Greek:
[i]Ε: Οι συσκευές έχουν επίσης ακτινοβολία;[/i]
ΝΑΙ! Μερικές συσκευές θα ζεστάνουν ή θα ακτινοβολήσουν τον χώρο γύρο τους, όπως οι Προωθητές Σκάφους, οι Γεννήτριες και οι Διαστρεβλωτές.

[i]Ε: Μπορούν άλλα τετράγωνα να έχουν θερμοκρασία και ακτινοβολία;[/i] Ναι. Για παράδειγμα, το πράσινο Εξωγήινο τετράγωνο Κτιρίου είναι ραδιενεργό.

[i]Ε: Η θερμοκρασία διαχέεται στο δωμάτιο;[/i]
Επί του παρόντος δεν συμβαίνει αυτό . Για τις συσκευές, η ακτινοβολία/θερμοκρασία είναι περιορισμένη σε μία περίμετρο ΕΝΟΣ τετραγώνου γύρω από αυτές. Αυτό όμως θα αλλάξει στο μέλλον.

English:
Single
  *Has vision and alert
States
  *Calm - walks around
  *Alerted - attacks the player with a projectile
Modifiers for 'Alerted':
  *If the player is far, he will walk towards him
  *If he is too far from spawn position, it will return back to it
  *If the player is too close, it will keep distance
  *During the attack he will fire 1 - 3 projectiles, then change position
Deutsch:
Single
 *In Sicht und alamiert
States
 *Ruhig - Läuft umher
 *Alamiert - Attackiert Spieler mit einem Projektil
Modifiers for 'Alerted':
 *IIst der Spieler entfernt, läuft er zum Spieler
 *Ist er zu weit vom Spanpunkt entfernt Läuft er zurück
 *Ist der Spieler zu Nah entfernt er sich 
 *Während des Angriffes schiesst er 1-3 Projektile und wechselt seine Position

[i]All HWS Team members volunteer their time for your enjoyment. They have day jobs, families and sleep on occasion![/i]
Time to collect your reward! We got intel the exit Stargate is on the Bridge. Move quick before the reinforcement is coming!
Russian: Настало временя, чтобы забрать свою награду! У нас есть информация, что выход из Звездных Ворот на мостике. Двигайтесь быстрее, пока не прибыло подкрепление!

KEY: Do you want to accept the Mission?
English:
[b][fdb100]Mission[-][/b]
Kill all blue Spider Queens in a Spooky House.

[b][fdb100]Location[-][/b]
ECC System + Binomi

[b][fdb100]Intel[-][/b]
We recommend splash damage weapons!

[b][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/b]
No

HWS is the largest Multiplayer Server for Empyrion Galactic Survival.
With hundreds of players daily and thousands of them monthly, it is a place with active and frequent interactions.Especially due CSW > HWS Servers in North America and Europe, means we have tons of nationalities and cultures playing together.

Fact is that this can cause problems from time to time and it’s our responsibility to make your stay here as best as possible!

That is the reason why there needs to be rules and limits in place to grant exactly that for the majority.

[i]"So please keep in mind that playing on HWS has consequences in terms of your behavior and respect to the owners and other players. Make sure to read and understand all HWS rules here:
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-rules]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-rules[/url]
"[/i]

------------------------
Russian:
HWS является крупнейшим игровым сервером для  Empyrion - Galactic Survival.

С сотнями игроков ежедневно и тысячами из них ежемесячно, это место с активными и частыми взаимодействиями.
Особенно из-за возможности телепортироваться между HWS серверами  в Северной Америке и Европе, это значит, у нас есть множество национальностей и культур, играющих вместе.

Дело в том, что это может вызвать проблемы время от времени, и это наша обязанность, чтобы сделать ваше пребывание здесь как можно лучше!

Вот почему должны быть правила и ограничения, чтобы предоставить именно это для большинства.

[i]"Поэтому, пожалуйста, имейте в виду, что игра на HWS имеет последствия с точки зрения вашего поведения и уважения к владельцам сервера и другим игрокам. Обязательно прочитайте и поймите все правила HWS здесь:
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-rules]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-rules[/url]"[/i]

------------------------

English:
Chat Command | Description | 
ev:? | Provides you with useful information regarding HWS Events | 
ev:start:Name:Position | Join/Apply for the event. If a position is needed, please enter also the position-name. | 
ev:restart | This restarts the event only for you. You get back to the start position and - if activated - get the start event inventory back. | 
ev:players:EventName | Shows you the participant of the given Event Name (short name) | 
ev:exit | Finish/Exit the event. If you exit before its finished you will not get any reward. |

KEY: The Combat Testing Facility Mission is active now! Good luck! Do not deactivate this Chapter!
English:
[b][fdb100]Mission[-][/b]
Long time ago only the toughest and bravest people were invited to the HWS Combat Testing Facility. Nowadays it is a possibility for every Origin to show their smart and forceful skills.
Are you smart enough for it?

[b][fdb100]Location[-][/b]
Alien Planet

[b][fdb100]Intel[-][/b]
Bring your mates with you and a lot of ammo + medic!

[b][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 240m cooldown + 15m delay per success
Mine 1000 Cobalt Ore. Buying from Marketplace or just having it in your inventory does not complete this Mission!
Deutsch: Sammle 1000 Kobalterz. Der Kauf dieser Erze auf dem Marktplatz, sowie bereits vorhandene Erze tragen nicht zum Abschluss dieser Mission bei!
Français: Minez 1000 minerais de Cobalt. Les acheterdepuis un marché ou juste les avoir dans votre inventaire ne pourra pas terminer pas cette Mission !
Italiano: Estrai 1000 Minerali di Cobalto. Comprarli dal Mercato o averli già nel tuo inventario non completa la missione!
Russian: Добудьте 1000 кобальтовой руды. Покупка руды на рынке или просто взятие руды в инвентарь (из контейнера и т.п.) не завершает миссию!
Chinese (simplified): 挖掘1000个钴矿石。从市场购买和你背包已有的矿石不计数！
Greek: Εξόρυξε 1000 Κοβάλτιο. Το να το αγοράσεις το από την αγορά ή απλά το να το κρατήσεις στο inventory σου δεν θα ολοκληρώσει την Αποστολή!

English:
[b][c][ff0000]!!! PvP involved! Very dangerous !!![-][/c][/b]

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
[b]The Sathium Freighter Heist[/b]
[c][fdb100][b][/b][-][/c]We can't tolerate those nasty buggers, working for Mercenaries! Bring back OUR loot, before it gets traded by ridiculous prices in the market!
Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.
Be warned! Traitors and Mercenaries might have captured the Freighter already!

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
HWS Racom - Cor + Unknown Orbit

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
You have only 10 minutes before reinforcement is called. Make sure you have the best Drill equipped and are prepared for any conflict!

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 720m cooldown + 1m delay per success
Russian:
[b][ff0000]!!! Внимание РvP ! Очень Опасно !!![-][/b]

[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
Мы не можем терпеть этих мерзких мерзавцев, работающих на наёмников! Верните нашу добычу, прежде чем она будет продана по смешным ценам на рынке!
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть все руды с помощью Бура, чтобы вас не обнаружила система безопасности грузового судна и вернуться к торговцу.
Будьте осторожны! Предатели и наемники уже могли захватить корабль!

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Система Walla + Неизвестная орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до вызова подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший Бур и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, Бесконечно раз, 720 мин. задержка + 1 мин. пауза за успех

English: For more Info about Status Effects, diseases and how to cure them, please read the DOCTORS JOURNAL in the Empyriopedia (F1)
Deutsch: Für mehr Informationen zu Status Effekten, Krankheiten und wie man diese behandelt, lese den MEDIZINER LEITFADEN in der Empyriopedia (F1)!
Français: Consultez le [Guide Médecine] dans l'Aide au jeu pour plus de détails
Italiano: Per maggiori informazioni circa gli Effetti di Stato, malattie e come curarle, Leggi la GUIDA DEL MEDICO nell’Empyrionpedia (F1)
Russian: Для получения дополнительной информации о статусных эффектах, заболеваниях и способах их лечения, пожалуйста, прочитайте журнал Медицинский журнал в ЧАВО (F1)
Chinese (simplified): 关于伤病类型及其治疗方法，详细信息请查阅知识库中的医疗日志（F1）!
Greek: Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες σχετικά με τα Εφέ Κατάστασης, αρρώστιες και πώς να τις θεραπεύσεις, παρακαλώ διάβασε το ΙΑΤΡΙΚΟ ΗΜΕΡΟΛΟΓΙΟ στην Empyrioπαίδεια (F1)

English: Is your Group well prepared? Then go ahead and raid some well defended Bases of the Alien factions! Can you keep up with them?
Deutsch: Ist deine Gruppe gut vorbereitet? Dann zieht los und stürmt ein paar gut geschützte Alien Basen! Könnt ihr es mit denen aufnehmen?
Français: Votre groupe est bien préparé? Alors allez-y et faites des raids sur certaines Bases de faction Alien bien gardées. Y parviendrez-vous?
Italiano: Il tuo Team è pronto? Allora andiamo a conquistare qualche Base della Fazione Aliena! Ce la farai?
Russian: Ваша группа отлично подготовлена? Тогда идите иустройте налет на парочку отлично защищенных баз фракции пришельцев. Сможете возвыситься над ними?
Chinese (simplified): 你的团队万事俱备了么？好吧，那就去突袭一座防守严密的外星人基地吧！跟紧了兄弟们，无人永生！
Greek: Είναι η ομάδα σου καλά προετοιμασμένη; Τότε προχώρα και κάνε εισβολή σε ένα καλά προστατευμένες Βάσεις Εξωγήινων Φατριών! Μπορείς να τους αντιμετωπίσεις;

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
[b]The Copper Freighter Heist[/b]
[c][fdb100][b][/b][-][/c]We can't tolerate those nasty buggers, working for Mercenaries! Bring back OUR loot, before it gets traded by ridiculous prices in the market!
Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.
Be warned! Traitors and Mercenaries might have captured the Freighter already!

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
HWS Racom - Binomi Sector + Unknown Orbit

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
You have only 10 minutes before reinforcement is called. Make sure you have the best Drill equipped and are prepared for any conflict!

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 720m cooldown + 1m delay per success
Russian:
[b][ff0000]!!! Внимание РvP ! Очень Опасно !!![-][/b]

[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
Мы не можем терпеть этих мерзких мерзавцев, работающих на наёмников! Верните нашу добычу, прежде чем она будет продана по смешным ценам на рынке!
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть все руды с помощью Бура, чтобы вас не обнаружила система безопасности грузового судна и вернуться к торговцу.
Будьте осторожны! Предатели и наемники уже могли захватить корабль!

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Система Cebo + Неизвестная орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до вызова подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший Бур и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, Бесконечно раз, 720 мин. задержка + 1 мин. пауза за успех

English: [i]Q: Do I need to use EAC (Easy Anti Cheat) for Singleplayer?[/i]\nNo. You can switch off EAC via the main menu. Go to MISC and set EAC to NO. But please note: With EAC deactivated, you cannot access any server that is EAC protected!
Russian:
[i]Q: dois-je utiliser la protection EAC en mode Solo ? [/i]
Non ! L'EAC se paramètre via Menu principal > Options > Divers.

[u]Note :[/u] si l'EAC est désactivé, vous ne pourrez accéder à tout serveur dont l'EAC est activé !,[i]P: Eu preciso usar o EAC no Singleplayer?[/i]
Não. Você pode ligar ou desligar o EAC pelo menus. Vá em OUTROS na opção EAC e deixe em Desligado. Mas note que: Com o EAC desligado você não poderá acessar servidores que são protegidos pelo EAC!,[i]В: Нужно ли мне использовать EAC (Easy Anti Cheat) в одиночной игре?[/i]
Нет. Вы можете выключить EAC через настройки в главном меню. Перейдите в раздел РАЗНОЕ и установите настройке 'Запускать с EAC' значение НЕТ. Но, пожалуйста, учтите: с выключенным EAC вы не сможете подключиться к защищенному EAC серверу!,,[i]问：单人游戏我需要打开EAC么？[/i]
不必，你可以通过主菜单关闭EAC，主菜单的杂项选项里可以关闭EAC。但是请注意：不开EAC进不去有EAC保护的服务器。
Protection hors ligne de propriétés de Faction,Proteção Offline para Propriedades da Facção,Офлайновая защита фракционных конструкций,デバイスごとのパブリック設定,派系财产的离线保护
Changer de Faction / propriété,Mudar de Facção / Propriedade,Смена фракции / владение,ホームベースの設定,改变派系/所有权
Drone-joueur,Drone do Jogador,Дрон игрока,建物ヘルパー,玩家无人机

English: [i]Q: Is it possible to revert the faction status of a vessel or base back to public or private?[/i]\nYes, but only the Faction owner can do that.
Russian:
[i]Q: est-il possible de modifier le statut de la Faction d'une Base ou vaisseau en 'Public' ou 'Privé' ? [/i]
Oui, mais seul le propriétaire de la Faction peut le faire.
,[i]P: É possível reverter o status de facção de um nave ou base de volta para público ou privado? [/i]
Sim, mas apenas o proprietário da facção pode fazer isso.,[i]В: Можно ли вернуть судну или базе личный или публичный статус?[/i]
Да, но сделать это может лишь владелец (глава) фракции.,[i] Q：オフライン・プロテクションはPvP上の全てのファクション所有を保護しますか？[/i]/nもちろんですが、ファクション・メンバーが全員サーバーにいなくなった場合のみオフライン・プロテクションが有効になります。,[i]问：可以把本属于一个派系的飞船和基地转移所有权么？[/i]
当然，但是只有派系创建者才能那样做。

English:
[i]Q: Where can I set my vessel or base to private or faction?[/i]
Open the Control Panel (P) and select your faction from the dropdown on the bottom right. 
- Public = anyone can use/work on it with tools
- Private = only Owner can use / work on it with tools
- Faction = only Faction members can use /work on it with tools 

[u]Note:[/u] Private or Public are also counted as a 'faction' (technically)
Russian:
[i]Q: Comment puis-je définir la faction de ma Base ou de mon vaisseau ? [/i]
Ouvrez le panneau de contrôle (P), dans l'onglet 'Principal', vous pourrez choisir la faction pour votre Base ou votre vaisseau avec le menu 'Faction:' (en haut à gauche).
-  n'importe qui peut utiliser vos biens et en faire ce qu'il veut
-  seul le propriétaire peut utiliser ses biens et en faire ce qu'il veut
- <'nom de la faction'> seuls les membres appartenant à la Faction peuvent utiliser vos biens et en faire ce qu'ils veulent

[u]Note :[/u] 'Privé' ou 'Public' sont également considérés comme une « faction » (techniquement)
,[i]P: Onde posso configurar minha nave ou base para privado ou facção? [/i]
Abra o Painel de controle (P) e selecione sua facção no menu suspenso no canto inferior direito.
- Público = qualquer pessoa pode usar/trabalhar com as ferramentas
- Private = apenas dono pode usar/trabalhar com as ferramentas
- Facção = somente os membros da Facção podem usar/trabalhar com as ferramentas

[u]Nota:[/u] Privado ou público também são contados como uma 'facção' (tecnicamente),[i]В: Где я могу установить моей базе или судну статус принадлежности фракции или личный?[/i]
Откройте панель управления (P) и выберите нужный статус из выпадающего списка в правой нижней части экрана. 
- Общее = любой сможет использовать постройку или обрабатывать ее инструментами
- Личное = использовать/обрабатывать может только владелец
- Фракция = только члены фракции смогут использовать или обрабатывать постройку.

[u]На заметку:[/u] Статусы 'Общее' и 'Личное' также трактуются системой как 'фракции' (технически).,,[i]问：我在哪里可以设置我飞船或基地的所有权？[/i]
打开控制面板 (P)，左上角位置可以设置。
- 公共 = 任何人都可使用或改装
- 私人 = 只有你个人可用 
- 派系 = 仅派系成员可用

[u]注意：[/u] 私人和公用也可以看做是一个“派系”（技术上来说）

Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть все руды с помощью Бура, чтобы вас не обнаружила система безопасности грузового судна и вернуться к торговцу.
Будьте осторожны! Предатели и наемники уже могли захватить корабль!

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Система Cebo + Неизвестная орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до вызова подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший Бур и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, Бесконечно раз, 720 мин. задержка + 1 мин. пауза за успех
Aide à la construction,Ajudante de Construção,Помощник в строительстве,ファクション,建筑好帮手

English:
[i]Q: How does the Player Drone work (F5)?[/i]
The drone is a building helper. It can use all building features including placing blueprints and using the Remove & Repair tool. It cannot use ALL tools or weapons yet. 

Hit F5 to spawn the Player drone. It does not cost you resources or energy to do so, but it has a limited range. If you keep going farther away, the view will get distorted and finally be cut off. Your drone is lost. You can recall it using F5. 

If the drone is destroyed by other players or just lost, you will not lose its inventory, as the inventory or blocks in the toolbelt are technically still in your players inventory/toolbelt.
Russian:
[i]Q: comment le Drone-joueur fonctionne ? [/i]
Le drone est un aide à la construction. Il peut utiliser toutes les fonctionnalités de la construction y compris l'utilisation de l'Outil Multifonctions et également plaçer les blueprints. Il ne peut pas encore utiliser tous les outils ou les armes.

Tapez 'F5' pour activer le drone-joueur. Il ne vous coûte aucune ressource ou énergie pour travailler, mais il a une utilisation limitée. Si vous continuez à l'utiliser au delà de ces limites, la vision se déformera et sera finalement coupée et votre drone sera perdu. Vous pouvez le rappeler à l'aide de 'F5'. 

[u]Note :[/u] Si le drone est détruit par d'autres joueurs ou juste perdu, son inventaire sera toujours accessible.,[i]P: Como o Player Drone funciona (F5)? [/i]
O drone é um ajudante de construção. Ele pode usar todos os recursos de construção, incluindo a colocação de blueprints e usando a ferramenta Remover e Reparar. Ainda não pode usar TODAS as ferramentas ou armas.

Aperte F5 para gerar o drone do jogador. Não lhe custa recursos ou energia para fazê-lo, mas tem um alcance limitado. Se você continuar indo mais longe, a visão ficará distorcida e, finalmente, será cortada. Seu drone será perdido. Você pode recuperá-lo usando o F5.

Se o drone for destruído por outros jogadores ou simplesmente perdido, você não perderá seu inventário, já que o inventário ou os blocos na barra de tarefas estão tecnicamente ainda no inventário/barra de tarefas de seus jogadores.,[i]В: Как работает дрон игрока (F5)?[/i]
Дрон является помощников в строительстве. Он может использовать любые строительные функции, включая постройку по чертежам и мульти-инструмент. Пока что он не может использовать прочие инструменты и турели. 

Нажмите F5, чтобы вызвать дрона игрока. Это действие не затрачивает каких-либо ресурсов или энергии, но у дрона ограниченный радиус действия. Если вы удалите дрона на слишком большое расстояние от игрока, то сначала у вас будут искажения в связи с ним, а после связь с дроном окончательно пропадет. Дрон будет потерян. Вы, однако, сможете снова вызвать его, нажав F5. 

Если дрон уничтожается другим игроком или вследствие потери связи, то его инвентарь или панель быстрого доступа не пропадают, т.к., технически, это инвентарь и панель игрока.,ファクション,[i]问：玩家无人机(F5)如何设定？[/i]
玩家无人机专职帮助玩家搞建筑，它能代替你的所有工作，甚至使用工具枪，但是，还不能使用所有的工具和武器。

点击 F5 启动玩家无人机，这不会有任何消耗，但是它有控制范围的限制。如果玩家离他的无人机过远，开始会信号不好，再远点无人机会关闭。你只能再按F5启动。

无人机关闭或者被其他玩家摧毁，你不用担心无人机快捷栏里的东西会丢失，实际上，那是你的快捷栏而已。
Changement statut de Faction,Mude a Posse de uma Propriedade da Facção,Изменение принадлежности фракции,ファクションにおいてのオフライン・プロテクト,改变派系财产的所有权
Créer ou rejoindre une Faction,Criar ou Juntar-se,Создание и присоединение,ファクションにおいての所有権の変更,创建和加入

English:
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/9/95bae3272beb302a36dec3ffd64e073199d11a39.jpg]
hws-egs-hq.jpg1920×800 175 KB[/url]


The Origins have developed over time into niches that they now dominate and control.  However, what is not very well understood or even questioned, is who runs the Elemental Consortium.  One possible reason no one investigates them or asks where or how they have acquired the wealth to build their infrastructure and do what they do, is because almost everyone benefits from the EC.

[i]"Visit [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]https://cmd.hws.global[/url] or check your PDA > Guide > HWS Commands or type egs:? for all available commands
"[/i]

------------------------

As a way to further reward loyalty and frivolous spending, the EGS team has provided players with an additional place to pour their hard earned credits: EGS Services.  In many cases, as is typical for EGS, you earn more than you spend – but nothing is cheap.   That said, with enough investment in the right assets, commodities and services, it is possible for the wise investor to spend millions and become a billionaire as a result.

To accomplish this, players should look into upgrading their EGS membership status.  Doing so gives players additional perks and benefits and additional access to other EGS services.

Keep an eye out for upgradeable services to get the MOST out of EGS features.
[b][u]Syntax: egs:upgrade:{service}[/u][/b]

[i]"[i]Example: egs:upgrade:recycle[/i]
"[/i]

------------------------

Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.
Be warned! Traitors and Mercenaries might have captured the Freighter already!

You have only 10 minutes before reinforcement is called. Make sure you have the best Drill equipped and are prepared for any conflict!

English: [i]Q: How to create or join a faction?[/i]\n- Open your inventory and click the Faction button. Just create one as you see fit. \n- You can join an existing faction or manage your faction (candidates) from the same screen
Russian:
[i]Q: comment créer ou rejoindre une Faction ? [/i]
Vous pouvez accéder à l'écran des Factions avec la touche 'F4' ou via l'inventaire puis l'icone 'Factions' en haut dans la barre d'icônes. Il suffit alors de créer ou de rejoindre (demander une alliance) une Faction depuis cet écran
,[i]P: Como criar ou entrar em uma facção? [/i]
- Abra seu inventário e clique no botão Facção. Apenas crie um como achar adequado.
- Você pode participar de uma facção existente ou gerenciar sua facção (candidatos) da mesma tela,[i]В: Как создать фракцию или вступить в существующую?[/i]
- Откройте ваш инвентарь и нажмите кнопку 'Фракция'. Дальше делайте так, как вам нравится. 
- Вы можете присоединиться к существующей фракции или создать собственную, а также можете управлять своей фракцией. И все это на одном экране.,[i] Q：船舶や拠点のファクション・ステータスをパブリックからプライベートに戻すことは可能ですか？[/i]/nその設定は、ファクションの管理者だけが行うことができます。,[i]问：怎样创建和加入一个派系？[/i]
- 打开你的背包界面，点击“派系”按钮，然后你就明白了。
- 管理派系也是同样界面，前提你是创建者或者管理员。

English:
[i]Q: Which types of boosters are available at the moment?[/i]
Armor, Jetpack, Temperature, Radiation, O2, Mobility, Multi, EVA.

[i]Q: How many boosters can i use simultaneously?[/i]
Depends on the slots available. This is different for each Player Armor. Interior Suit has no booster slots.

[i]Q: Are there limitations how many boosters of the same kind i can use simultaneously?[/i]
No. You can for example stuff all of the slots with Armor Boosters...but you migh also pile up the penalties each of the boosters has.

[i]Q: Can i build all of the boosters?[/i]
No, boosters need to be found or traded. You can not build them (yet).

[i]Q: Where do i get boosters?[/i]
Boosters are available from loot. More possibilities will be added in the future.

[i]Q: Do i loose boosters if i die?[/i]
Currently not. You are respawned in your last equipped player armor incl. the boosters that were added to this player armor

[i]Q: How can i change / apply boosters?[/i]
You need to go to a Armor locker. Access the device and change suits or add/remove boosters

[i]Q: Do i need to re-add boosters every time i change the player armor?[/i]
NO! The boosters are saved to your Player Armor slots. So you can stuff several player armors with a variation of boosters and just need to swap the player armor to have the setup re-applied!
Français:
[i]Q: Quels types de boosters sont disponibles à ce jour ? [/i]
Les boosters Armure, Jetpack, Isolation, Radiations, Réservoir O2, Mobilité, Multi, EVA.

[i]Q: combien de boosters puis-je utiliser en même temps ? [/i]
Ca dépend des slots disponibles. C'est différent pour chaque armure. Les boosters ne s'appliquent pas à la combinaison d'intérieur.

[i]Q: existe-t-il une limite à utiliser plusieurs booster de même type en même temps ? [/i]
Non ! Vous pouvez par exemple utiliser tous les slots avec le booster 'Armure', mais vous aurez aussi tous les handicaps liés à ce booster qui seront multipliés.

[i]Q: puis-je fabriquer les boosters ? [/i]
Non, vous ne pouvez pas ( pour l'instant), ils doivent être trouvés ou échangés.

[i]Q: où puis-je trouver des boosters ? [/i]
Lors de pillages. Plus de possibilités seront ajoutés à l'avenir.

[i]Q: est-ce que je perds mes boosters si je meurs ? [/i]
Actuellement pas. Vous réapparaîtrez dans votre armure équipée de tous ses boosters.

[i]Q: Comment puis-je changer/appliquer des boosters ? [/i]
Vous devez utiliser l'élément 'Casier armures'. Vous pouvez également utiliser ce dernier pour changer d'armure.

[i]Q: est-ce que je perds les boosters ajoutés chaque fois que je change d'armure ?[/i]
Non ! Les boosters sont sauvegardés avec votre armure. Donc vous pouvez avoir plusieurs armures avec différents boosters ajoutés, et juste besoin de changer d'armure pour utiliser une configuration de boosters choisie !
Russian:
[i]В: Какие типы усилителей доступны на данный момент?[/i]
Броня, Джетпак, Температура, Радиация, Кислород, Мобильность, Мульти, EVA.

[i]В: Сколько усилителей можно использовать одновременно?[/i]
Зависит от доступных слотов. Это различно для каждой брони. Внутренний костюм не имеет слотов.

[i]В: Существуют ли ограничения на количество усилителей одного и того же типа которые я могу использовать одновременно?[/i]
Нет. Вы можете, например, забить все слоты усилителем брони... но вы будите накапливать штрафы, которые есть у каждого из усилителей.

[i]В: Могу ли я создать все ускорители?[/i]
Нет, усилители можно найти или обменять , вы не можете их создать (пока).

[i]В: Где я могу получить усилители?[/i]
Усилители доступны из трофеев. Дополнительные возможности будут добавлены в будущем.

[i]В: Потеряю ли я усилители при смерти?[/i]
 В настоящее время нет. Вы возрождаетесь в своей последней экипировке, включая усилители, которые были добавлены в эту броню

[i]В: Как я могу изменить / применить усилители?[/i]
Вам нужен Шкаф аммуниции. Войдите в устройство и выберете броню или добавьте / удалите усилители

[i]В: Нужно ли повторно добавлять усилители каждый раз, когда я меняю броню?[/i]
НЕТ! Усилители сохраняются в слотах брони. Таким образом, вы можете сделать несколько видов брони с вариациями усилителей и просто менять броню.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：目前都有哪些类型的强化器？[/i]
护甲、喷气背包、温度、辐射、氧气、机动、多功能、出舱。

[i]问：我能同时安装多少个强化器？[/i]
取决于护甲插槽的数量。这个数量每种护甲是不同的，室内甲没有插槽。

[i]问：同一种强化器有没有同时安装数量限制？[/i]
没有。你可以随意组合，但注意，每种强化器的负面效果也是叠加的。

[i]问：我能制造强化器么？[/i]
不能。强化器只能搜刮和买卖获得，“目前”尚不能制造。

[i]问：我去哪找强化器？[/i]
像更衣柜样子的箱子里较多，未来我们会添加更多拾取几率。

[i]问：我能拾取其他玩家尸体上的强化器么？[/i]
目前不行。玩家死后会穿着临死时的护甲复活，包括上面的强化器。

[i]问：我怎样替换、安装强化器？[/i]
还是需要“护甲更衣柜”，与替换护甲相同步骤。

[i]问：我每次更换护甲时用不用重新插拔那些强化器？[/i]
是的。有点麻烦。（此处是最新版解释，未按原文翻译）
Greek:
[i]E: Ποιοι τύπο Προωθητήρων είναι διαθέσιμοι αυτή τη στιγμή;[/i]
Πανοπλίας, Jetpack, Θερμοκρασίας, Ακτινοβολίας, Ο2, κινητικότητα, Multi, EVA.

[i]E: Πόσους προωθητήρες μπορώ να χρησιμοποιήσω ταυτόχρονα;[/i]
Εξαρτάται από τις διαθέσιμες θέσεις. Αυτό είναι διαφορετικό σε κάθε πανοπλία. Η Εσωτερική στολή δεν έχει προωθητήρες.

[i]Ε: Υπάρχουν περιορισμοί ως προς το είδος των προωθητήρων που μπορώ να χρησιμοποιήσω ταυτόχρονα;[/i]
Όχι. Μπορείς για παράδειγμα να γεμίσεις τις θέσεις μόνο με προωθητήρες πανοπλίας...αλλά ταυτόχρονα θα πρέπει να υποστείς τις συνέπειες που έχει κάθε προωθητήρας.

[i]Ε: Μπορώ να φτιάξω όλους τους προωθητήρες;[/i]
Όχι, οι προωθητήρες πρέπει να βρεθούν ή να αγοραστούν/ανταλλαχτούν. Δεν μπορείς να τους φτιάξεις (ακόμα).

[i]Ε: Από πού παίρνω προωθητήρες;[/i]
Οι προωθητήρες είναι διαθέσιμοι από την λεηλασία. Περισσότερες επιλογές θα προστεθούν στο μέλλον.

[i]Ε: Χάνω τους προωθητήρες εάν πεθάνω;[/i]
Προς το παρόν όχι, Θα δημιουργηθείς με την πανοπλία που φορούσες όταν πέθανες συμπεριλαμβανομένων των προωθητήρων που είχες βάλλει στη στολή.

[i]Ε: Πώς μπορώ να αλλάξω/βάλλω προωθητήρες;[/i]
Χρειάζεσαι ένα Φωριαμό Πανοπλίας. Απέκτησε πρόσβαση στη συσκευή και άλλαξε τη στολή σου ή πρόσθεσε/αφαίρεσε προωθητήρες.

[i]Ε: Πρέπει να ξαναβάλω τους προωθητήρες εάν αλλάξω στολή;[/i]
ΟΧΙ! Οι προωθητήρες σώζονται στις θέσεις πανοπλίας. Έτσι, μπορείς να γεμίσεις με αρκετές πανοπλίες τον φωριαμό και απλά θα πρέπει να αλλάξεις στολή για να επαναφέρεις τις ρυθμίσεις!

English: [i]Q: Does the drill or the filler & flatten tool, harvester or the chainsaw damage own or enemy blocks or enemies at all?[/i]\nNo, with one exception: the chainsaw can be used for close combat fights.
Russian:
[i]Q: les outils Multifonctions, la foreuse, l'outil coupe bois ou encore la tronçonneuse peuvent-ils occasionner des dommages à nous même et nos structures ainsi qu'à nos ennemies et leurs structures ? [/i]
Non, à une exception près : la tronçonneuse peut être utilisée pour les combats rapprochés.
,[i]P: Por acaso a broca ou a ferramenta de terraplenagem, a colhedeira ou a motosserra danificam meus próprios blocos ou os do inimigo?[/i]
Não, com uma exceção: a motosserra pode ser usada em combate de perto.,[i]В: Наносит ли бур, ландшафтный инструмент, сборщик или бензопила повреждения своим или вражеским блокам, врагам?[/i]
Нет, за одним исключением: бензопилу можно использовать в ближнем бою в качестве оружия.,,[i]问：各种工具、电锯会对自己、或敌人和敌对建筑造成伤害么？[/i]
不会，只有一个例外，电锯可以作为肉搏武器切外星生物。

Chinese (simplified): 全局游戏技术问题 - 第二部分

English:
[i]Q: How to use the ALT-look Mode?[/i]
- Hit V to switch to the 3rd Person view. Then hit ALT only ONCE and the camera view gets un-docked from your Player Avatar or Vessel. Use the mouse to move the camera view. Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out
- You can still walk/fly by using the Arrow-Keys and the WASD +Q/E commands
- The ALT-look mode also works in 1st Person, for example when sitting in a Cockpit!
Russian:
[i]Q: comment fonctionne le Mode ALT-look ? [/i]
Tapez 'V' pour basculer la vue à la 3ième personne. Puis tapez 'ALT' une seule fois et la vue caméra ne sra plus locké sur votre Avatar ou vaisseau. Utilisez la souris pour déplacer la vue caméra, la molette pour zoomer/dézoomer - vous pouvez aussi continuer à marcher ou voler en utilisant les flèches et les touches ZQSD - le mode ALT-look fonctionne également en vue 1ère personne, par exemple lorsque vous êtes assis dans un Cockpit !
,[i]P: Como usar o modo de visão com ALT? [/i]
- Pressione V para mudar para a visão da 3ª Pessoa. Em seguida, pressione ALT apenas uma vez e a visão da câmera é desativada do seu Avatar ou Nave do Jogador. Use o mouse para mover a visão da câmera. Use a roda do mouse para aumentar e diminuir o zoom
- Você ainda pode andar/voar usando as teclas de seta e os comandos WASD + Q/E
- O modo de visão com ALT também funciona na 1ª Pessoa, por exemplo, quando sentado em uma Cabine!,[i]В: Как использовать альтернативный вид?[/i]
- Нажмите V (по умолчанию), чтобы переключиться в вид от 3-его лица. Затем нажмите ALT [b]один[/b] раз и камера переключится в независимый от игрока или судна режим. При помощи мыши вы можете управлять направлением камеры. Колесико мыши позволяет приближать и отдалять камеру
- Несмотря на положение камеры, вы все еще можете бегать/летать, используя клавиатуру
- Альтернативный вид также работает и в режиме от первого лица, например, когда вы находитесь в кабине!,,[i]问：怎样使用ALT键观察模式？[/i]
- 点击V键切换第三人称视角，然后点击ALT键一次，于是屏幕的视野会从你身体或所驾驶舰船解锁。利用鼠标移动镜头视角，鼠标滚轮放大或缩小。
- 按方向键或WASD+Q/E键你本人仍可移动/飞行。
- ALT键观察模式也可应用于第一人称视角，比如你坐在驾驶室的情况下！
PvP vs PvE,PvP vs PvE,PvP и PvE,PvP vs PvE,PvP 和 PvE
Arbre Technologique,Árvore de Habilidades,Технологии,テックツリー,科技树

English:
[i]Q: What is the Techtree (F3)?[/i]
- When you progress through the game (SP and MP) you gain XP for doing certain things. Each level up will add some Unlock points at your disposal. Use them to unlock more advanced stuff in the Techtree.
- A lot of basic blocks and devices can be built without having to be unlocked. 
- If you think you are missing something in the template folder of your Constructor, have a look at the Techtree if it has been unlocked already!
Russian:
[i]Q: A quoi sert l'Arbre Technologique (F3) ? [/i]
Lorsque vous progressez dans le jeu (SP et MP) vous gagnez des points XP pour certaines actions que vous faites. A chaque niveau gravi, des points de déverrouillage vous seront attribués. Utilisez-les pour déverrouiller des éléments plus avancés dans l'Arbre Technologique.
Bien sur, un grand nombre de dispositifs et de blocs de base peuvent être construits sans avoir à être déverrouillé.
Si vous pensez qu'il vous manque des éléments dans le dossier 'Modèles' de votre constructeur, jetez un oeil à l'Arbre Technologique pour voir si vous pouvez en débloquer certains !
,[i]P: O que é a Árvore de Habilidades (F3)?[/i]
- Quando você progride no jogo (SP e MP), ganha o XP por fazer certas coisas. Cada nível aumentará alguns pontos de desbloqueio à sua disposição. Use-os para desbloquear coisas mais avançadas na Árvore de Habilidades.
- Muitos blocos e dispositivos básicos podem ser criados sem ter que ser desbloqueados.
- Se você acha que está faltando alguma coisa na pasta de modelos do seu Construtor, dê uma olhada na Árvore de Habilidades se já foi desbloqueado.,[i]В: Что такое Технолигии (F3)?[/i]
- Во время любых успешных действий в игре (например, обнаружение месторождений или попадание в цель из оружия) вы получаете очки опыта. Каждый раз, когда вы получаете новый уровень, также вы получаете очки открытия. Используйте их для открытия различных вещей в дереве технологий.
- Множество базовых блоков и устройств не требуют открытия и могут быть созданы сразу. 
- Если вам кажется, что в шаблонах конструктора чего-то не хватает - проверьте, открыты ли нужные шаблоны в дереве технологий!,,[i]问：科技树（F3）是啥？[/i]
- 当你通过（单人和多人的）游戏获取经验后，你会升级，每一级会给你一些自由分配的“解锁点数”，你可以通过科技树使用该点数解锁新的、高级的物品或设备。
- 一些基础的方块和设备是不用解锁初始自带的。
- 如果你在建造机模板里找不到一些东西，你应该看看科技树里此物品你是否已经解锁了！

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents
HWS Reputation Points are the most important “currency” in HWS.
HWS RP can grant you powerful advantages, so it’s definitely worth it to consistently work to increase your reputation and earn a high HWS RP balance. With a high balance and a steady income of HWS RP, you can spend it like currency to unlock greater access to gameplay advantages, various abilities and even convert them to [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-ingot/14844]HWS Ingots[/url] to buy real money packages.
[b][u]How To Acquire Reputation Points (HWS RP)?[/u][/b]

There are several active ways to earn HWS RP in addition to various passive methods.

  - Each Origin has both active and passive ways of earning HWS RP and they are unique to that Origin
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-story](Click here for details on each Origin[/url])

  - The [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/the-alien-sacrifice/11586]Sacrifice of the Aliens[/url]

  - The Kill Board

  - Buy Alien Container from the HWS Marketplace (see [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/the-alien-sacrifice/11586]Sacrifice of the Aliens[/url])

  - Missions (PDA - press F1)

  - Special HWS Events



[i]"[b]Note[/b]: [i]You must play actively (daily) to get HWS RP from your Origin HWS RP system[/i]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]What can you buy with HWS RP?[/u][/b]

  - The ability to buy [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-features-hws-npc-trader/4396]HWS NPC Trader[/url] packages
  - You pay less [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/taxes/4389]Taxes[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/rp-to-bp/11932]Reduce your Blueprint Time in your Factory[/url]
  - Upgrade your Bank Level or EGS level
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-scan/11585]Scan Origins and usage of fa:scan command[/url] around you
  - Not buy but convert them to [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-ingot/14844]HWS Ingots[/url] and you can buy with them all supporter packages (instead of real money)
  - Access to custom RP-Restricted PVE playfields which you can call home and are tax free!
  - [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A8xMtMsawbk&index=6&list=PL7QEQwexrJ0FBu9EjJehlNU9R9Cm60SL0]Stealth your ships[/url]


[i]"[b]Note:[/b] [i]HWS Reputation is wiped at the end of each HWS season when there is a full wipe. Each HWS RP point is rewarded with 7000 credits in your bank for the next season.[/i]
"[/i]
