English:
[i]Q: How do i use Console Commands in Singleplayer (Survival/Creative)?[/i]
- Just open the Console (see Options > Controls) and enter 'help'. This will show you all the commands that are available by now. 
- Type in 'help' and add a command to reveal its syntax and values. Like 'help faction' will show you everything you need to know about the faction command
- Console commands only work on a multiplayer server if you are either Admin, Moderator or Gamemaster!

 [i]Q: How to use Console Commands when playing on a (local) Dedicated Server (Creative/Survival)?[/i]
You can't. The owner or and admin of the server needs to promote you to the Gamemaster permission group at least.
Russian:
[i]Q: comment utiliser les commandes de la Console en Mode Solo (survie/création) ? [/i] - il suffit d'ouvrir la Console ('!' par défaut) et taper « help ». Cela vous montrera toutes les commandes actuellement disponibles.
Si vous tapez « help » + le nom d'une commande, cela vous montrera comment utiliser cette commande. Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser la Console en Mode Multijoueurs sauf si vous si vous êtes Admin/modérateur/Gamemaster du serveur !

[i]Q: comment utiliser les commandes de la Console lorsque vous jouez sur un serveur (local) dédié (Creatif/survie) ? [/i]
Vous ne pouvez pas. Le propriétaire et/ou administrateur du serveur a besoin de, au moins vous promouvoir auprès du groupe d'autorisations Gamemaster.
,[i]P: Como eu uso os comandos da console no Singleplayer (Sobrevivência/Criativo)? [/i]
- Apenas abra o Console (veja Opções > Controles) e coloque 'help'. Isso mostrará todos os comandos que estão disponíveis até agora.
- Digite 'help' e adicione um comando para revelar sua sintaxe e valores. Como 'help faction', mostrará tudo o que você precisa saber sobre o comando de facção
- Os comandos do console funcionam apenas em um servidor multiplayer em que você for Administrador, Moderador ou Gamemaster!

[i]P: Como usar os Comandos do Console ao jogar em um Servidor Dedicado (local) (Criativo/Sobrevivência)? [/i]
Você não pode. O proprietário ou o administrador do servidor precisam promovê-lo para o grupo de permissões Gamemaster pelo menos.,[i]В: Как мне использовать команды консоли в одиночной игре (на выживание/творческой)?[/i]
- Просто откройте консоль (см. настройки > управление) и введите 'help'. Эта команда отобразит все доступные на данный момент консольные команды. 
- Наберите 'help' и добавьте имя команды, чтобы посмотреть ее синтаксис и назначение. Например, 'help faction' покажет вам все, что необходимо знать про команду 'faction'.
- В мультиплеере консольные команды работают только в случае, когда вы администратор, модератор или гейммастер!

 [i]В: Как использовать консольные команды, если игра идет на (локальном) выделенном сервере (выживание/творчество)?[/i]
Вы не можете. Для этого владелец или администратор сервера должен повысить вас минимум до статуса гейммастера.,,[i]问：单人模式（生存/创造）下如何使用控制台命令？[/i]
- 打开控制台（`键默认），输入“help”查询。系统将会显示目前所有可用的控制台命令列表。
- 输入“help”加相关变量，还可以查询该变量下的详细命令。比如输入“help faction”，会将所有关于“派系”的控制台命令显示出来。
- 在多人游戏下只有服务器管理员、服主、游戏管理员等才可使用控制台命令。

 [i]问：局域网联机模式（创建/生存）怎样使用控制台命令？[/i]
不可以。只有服主或服务器管理员将你提升为游戏管理员时才可使用。

English:
[i]Q: Can i create a POI in Creative Mode and use it in my custom game?[/i]
Yes, YOU CAN! 
1. Go to your In-game Blueprint library (F2) 
2. Double-click any BASE (Small Vessel/Hover Vessel/Capital Vessel won't work) 
3. Set a group name
4. Use the group name in your customized playfield.yaml

If you want creatures spawn in your base, create that base in CREATIVE and add the Monster-Spawners. Same applies for the Alien POI loot containers.
Russian:
[i]Q: puis-je créer un POI en Mode Créatif et l'utiliser dans une partie personnalisée ? [/i]
Oui, vous pouvez :
1- allez dans votre bibliothèque de Blueprints (F2)
2- Double-cliquez sur n'importe quelle BASE (ne fonctionne que pour les Bases)
3- Définir un nom de groupe
4- Définir un nom qui sera utilisé dans la zone de jeu.
Si vous voulez pouvoir généner des PNJ dans la Base, ajoutez un spawner PNJ. Vous pouvez également ajouter des containers Alien qui pourront être pillés.,[i]P: Posso criar um POI no Modo Criativo e usá-lo no meu jogo personalizado? [/i]
Sim você pode!
1. Vá para a sua biblioteca de Blueprints do jogo (F2)
2. Clique duas vezes em qualquer BASE (Vessel/Hover Vessel/Capital Vessel não funcionará)
3. Defina um nome de grupo
4. Use o nome do grupo em seu playfield.yaml personalizado

Se você quer gerar criaturas na sua base, crie essa base em CREATIVE e adicione Monster-Spawners. O mesmo se aplica aos containers de itens para POIs de Aliens.,[i]В: Могу ли я создать ТИ в творческом режиме и использовать ее в своей игре в режиме выживания?[/i]
Да, ЭТО ВОЗМОЖНО! 
1. Зайдите в библиотеку чертежей (F2) 
2. Двойной щелчок мыши на любой БАЗЕ (на судах не работает) 
3. Установите имя группы.
4. Используйте это имя группы в вашем варианте playfield.yaml

Если вы хотите, чтобы на базе рождались монстры, создайте базу в ТВОРЧЕСКОМ режиме и установите внутри точки возрождения монстров. То же касается контейнеров для ТИ чужих.,コンソールコマンドと管理,[i]问：我能在创造模式创建一个外星人建筑而应用在我的自定义游戏中么？[/i]
是的，可以！
1. 进入你的蓝图库(F2)
2. 双击任意建筑（任何类型飞船不行）
3. 设置一个组名称
4. 在你自定义区域使用这个组名称来生成建筑

如果你想让怪物刷新在这个建筑里，那么在创建模式中要添加怪物刷新点，专用拾取容器也一样设定。

English:
[b][fdb100]Mission[-][/b]
[b]The Silicon Freighter Heist[/b]
We can't tolerate those nasty buggers, working for Mercenaries! Bring back OUR loot, before it gets traded by ridiculous prices in the market!
Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.
Be warned! Traitors and Mercenaries might have captured the Freighter already!

[b][fdb100]Location[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Binomi + Unknown Orbit

[b][fdb100]Intel[-][/b]
You have only 10 minutes before reinforcement is called. Make sure you have the best Drill equipped and are prepared for any conflict!

[b][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 720m cooldown + 1m delay per success
Russian:
[b][ff0000]!!! Внимание РvP ! Очень Опасно !!![-][/b]

[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
Мы не можем терпеть этих мерзких мерзавцев, работающих на наёмников! Верните нашу добычу, прежде чем она будет продана по смешным ценам на рынке!
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть все руды с помощью Бура, чтобы вас не обнаружила система безопасности грузового судна и вернуться к торговцу.
Будьте осторожны! Предатели и наемники уже могли захватить корабль!

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Система Cebo + Неизвестная орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до вызова подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший Бур и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, Бесконечно раз, 720 мин. задержка + 1 мин. пауза за успех

English:
[i]Q: How to change my player name?[/i]
You need to change your player name over at steampowered.com or from within your Steam Client.

[i]Q: What is my Empyrion Steam Player ID? (often referred to as EGS Steam ID or EPD)?[/i]
Your Player ID is a string of numbers. If you need to know your EPD, open the explorer and go to one of your savegames PLAYER folder: ../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Saves/Games/YourSavegameName/Players/..

You'll find a file with the .ply ending there. The numbers are your EPD. 

[u]Note:[/u] Do not mix up the EPD with your Steam Account or Web ID. The EPD is a player ID unique to the game. The Steam Account/Web ID is the ID you are using on steampowered.com or other Steam-related topics (like for the webshops or login to websites).
Russian:
[i]Q: Comment changer mon nom de joueur ? [/i]
Vous pouvez modifier votre nom de joueur sur le site de Steam ou via votre compte Client Steam.

[i]Q: quel est mon identifiant Steam de joueur d'Empyrion ? (souvent dénommé EGS Steam ID ou EPD) ? [/i]
Votre identifiant de joueur est une chaîne de nombres. Si vous avez besoin de connaître votre EPD, ouvrez l'Explorateur et aller dans le dossier des sauvegardes : ... /Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic survival/Saves/Games/'nom de votre sauvegarde'/Players /...

Vous trouverez un fichier avec l'extension ' .ply'. Les nombres composant le nom du fichier sont votre EPD. 

[u]Note :[/u] ne pas intervertir le EPD avec votre nom de compte Steam ou Web ID. Le EPD est un identifiant de joueur unique au jeu. L'ID de compte Web de Steam est l'ID que vous utilisez sur le site de Steam ou avec d'autres sujets liés à Steam (comme pour les boutiques en ligne ou pour se connecter à des sites Web).
,[i]P: Como mudar o nome do meu jogador? [/i]
Você precisa mudar o nome do seu jogador no steampowered.com ou dentro do seu Cliente Steam.

[i]P: Qual é o meu Empyrion Steam Player ID? (Muitas vezes referido como EGS Steam ID ou EPD)? [/i]
O ID do seu Jogador é uma série de números. Se você precisa saber seu EPD, abra o explorador e vá para a pasta do um dos seus Savegames: ../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Saves/Games/NomeDoSeuSave/Players/..

Você encontrará um arquivo com terminado com .ply. Os números são o seu EPD.

[u]Nota:[/u] Não misture o EPD com a sua Conta Steam ou Web ID. O EPD é uma identificação de jogador exclusiva do jogo. A Conta Steam/ID da Web é a ID que você está usando no steampowered.com ou outros tópicos relacionados ao Steam (como para as webshops ou login nos sites).,[i]В: Как изменить имя моего игрока?[/i]
Вам нужно изменить имя игрока на steampowered.com или непосредственно в своем клиенте Steam.

[i]В: Как узнать мой Empyrion Steam Player ID? (часто упоминается как EGS Steam ID или EPD)?[/i]
Ваш Player ID это строка чисел. Если вам нужно узнать ваш EPD, откройте в проводнике папку PLAYER в одной из ваших сохраненных игр: ../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Saves/Games/ИмяВашейСохраненнойИгры/Players/..

Там будет файл, заканчивающийся на '.ply'. Числа - это ваш EPD. 

[u]На заметку:[/u] Не путайте свой EPD со своим Steam Account или Web ID. EPD уникален для каждой игры. Steam Account/Web ID - это ID, используемый для определения вашего аккаунта на steampowered.com или прочих сайтах, использующих авторизацию Steam.,,[i]问：如何修改我游戏内的名字？[/i]
你需要修改Steam昵称才可改名。

[i]问：Steam上此游戏里我的玩家ID是什么？（是我的Steam ID还是本游戏ID）？[/i]
你的玩家ID是一串数字，如果你想知道，打开你的某一个游戏存档查看，路径为：../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Saves/Games/YourSavegameName/Players/..

你会找到一个扩展名为.ply的文件，前面数字就是你的游戏玩家ID。

[u]注意：[/u] 不要混淆本游戏玩家ID、你的Steam账号、Steam登陆ID。游戏玩家ID只是本游戏所用，你的Steam账号或Steam登陆ID是和Steam有关的。

English:
[i]Q: How to report an issue with the game?[/i]
If the issue can be reproduced, head over to the forums and report your bug in the bug threads. 

If you are getting a 'Continue or Quit' Error in Singleplayer, remember what you last did before this happened. Then exit the game, grab your Output_log.txt (can be found here: ../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Empyrion_Data), zip and upload your savegame and send everything to support@empyriongame.com with a detailed description on what has happened. 

If you are the Server Owner, please also zip the server savegame PLUS send ALL the files that are located in your servers LOG folder! (../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Logs)
Russian:
[i]Q: Comment signaler un bug survenu dans le jeu ? [/i]
Si le bug peut être reproduit, rendez-vous sur les forums (via le site du jeu), et signaler votre bug via les liens 'Report bugs'. 

Lors du bug, si vous avez un message d'erreur « Continue ou Quit » (Mode Solo), notez ce que vous avez fait dans le jeu juste avant le bug. Puis quitter le jeu, récupérer le fichier Output_log.txt (peut être trouvé ici : .../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic survie/Empyrion_Data), zippez-le et envoyez-le avec votre sauvegarde à support@empyriongame.com avec une description détaillée sur ce qui s'est passé.

Si vous êtes le propriétaire du serveur, zippez également la sauvegarde serveur, et envoyez tous les fichiers qui se trouvent dans votre dossier de journaux de serveur (fichiers LOG) ! (.. /Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic survival/Logs)
,[i]P: Como relatar um problema com o jogo? [/i]
Se o problema puder ser reproduzido, dirija-se aos fóruns e relate seu bug nos tópicos do bug.

Se você está recebendo um erro 'Continue or Quit' no Singleplayer, lembre-se do que você fez pela última vez antes disso. Em seguida, saia do jogo, pegue o seu Output_log.txt (pode ser encontrado aqui: ../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Empyrion_Data), crie um zip com ele e faça o upload do seu savegame e envie tudo para support@empyriongame.com com uma descrição detalhada sobre o que aconteceu.

Se você é o Proprietário do Servidor, por favor, crie um zip tambem com o savegame do server e envie TODOS os arquivos que estão localizados na sua pasta de LOG dos servidores! (../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Logs),[i]В: Как сообщить о проблеме с игрой?[/i]
Если проблема может быть воспроизведена, то разместите ее на нашем официальном форуме в разделе, посвященном приему багов от населения. 

Если вы столкнулись с проблемой 'Continue or Quit' в одиночной игре, запомните ваши последние действия перед тем, как это случилось. После чего выйдите из игры, упакуйте в zip ваш Output_log.txt (можно найти здесь: ../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Empyrion_Data), а также вашу сохраненную игру, и отправьте все это на адрес support@empyriongame.com с детальным описанием произошедшего на английском языке. 

Если вы владелец сервера, тоже прикрепите упакованную в zip сохраненную игру, а также ВСЕ файлы, которые находятся в папке логов сервера! (../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Logs).,,[i]问：怎样反馈游戏的一些bug或问题给官方？[/i]
如果此问题可以被复制或重演，那么直接提交BUG反馈表并叙述情况给官方。

如果此问题是单人游戏中的死机或崩溃问题，记好出问题前你最后干了什么。退出游戏，找到你的Output_log.txt文件（路径：../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Empyrion_Data），压缩并上传你的存档文件和其它所有相关文件，发送到support@empyriongame.com，邮件中请详细描述遇到的问题。

如果是服务器出现了上述问题，请一并把服务器存档和你LOG文件夹(../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Logs)内所有文件都上传并邮寄。

English:
[i]Q: How does saving a game work?[/i]
 There are three ways: 
1. [u]AUTOSAVE:[/u] The game auto-saves every time you leave an ongoing session (ESC -> Door symbol), overwriting the initial savegame. 
2. [u]MANUAL SAVE:[/u] If you hit ESC you'll notice a SAVE button designed like a disk. When you hit the SAVE-button a new savegame will be created with the extension _BACKUP. If you hit the button repeatedly, the _BACKUP extension will get added some numbers
3. [u]COPY SAVE:[/u] From the main menu, open RESUME GAME. Select a savegame and use the COPY button. This will create a manual backup with a _COPY extension. 

[u]Please note:[/u] you cannot load a savegame while in-game, yet.
Russian:
[i]Q: Comment sauvegarder un jeu ? [/i]
 Il existe trois façons :
1- Sauvegarde automatique : le jeu se sauvegarde automatiquement chaque fois que vous quittez une partie en cours, remplaçant la sauvegarde précédente.
2- Sauvegarde manuelle : Si vous appuyez sur ÉCHAP, vous verrez un bouton 'Sauvegarde' (icône disquette) en haut à gauche de l'écran. Lorsque vous cliquez sur ce bouton, une nouvelle sauvegarde sera créée avec l'extension _BACKUP.
3- COPIER une sauvegarde : dans le menu principal, cliquez sur 'Continuer une partie'. Sélectionnez une sauvegarde et utilisez le bouton 'Copier' (à droite). Cela va créer une sauvegarde manuelle avec une extension _COPY. 

[u]Note :[/u] vous ne pouvez pas charger une sauvegarde pendant que vous jouez (pour l'instant).
,[i]P: Como salvar um jogo?[/i]
Existem três maneiras:
1. [u]AUTOSAVE:[/u] O jogo é salvo automaticamente toda vez que você deixa uma sessão (ESC -> Símbolo da porta), substituindo o savegame inicial.
2. [u]MANUAL SAVE:[/u] Se você pressionar ESC, notará um botão SAVE projetado como um disco. Quando você clica no botão SAVE, um novo savegame será criado com a extensão _BACKUP. Se você pressionar o botão repetidamente, a extensão _BACKUP receberá alguns números
3. [u]COPY SAVE:[/u] No menu principal, abra RESUMIR JOGO. Selecione um savegame e use o botão COPIAR. Isso criará um backup manual com uma extensão _COPY.

[u]Observação: [/u] você não pode carregar um jogo de salvamento enquanto estiver no jogo ainda.,[i]В: Как работает сохранение игры?[/i]
 Тут три разных пути: 
1. [u]АВТОСОХРАНЕНИЕ:[/u] Игра автоматически сохраняется каждый раз, когда вы покидаете сессию (ESC -> значок с дверью), перезаписывая начальную сохраненную игру. 
2. [u]СОХРАНЕНИЕ ВРУЧНУЮ:[/u] Если вы нажмете ESC вы увидите кнопку СОХРАНИТЬ, обозначенную значком как диск. Когда вы нажимаете кнопку СОХРАНИТЬ создается новая сохраненная игра, расширенная строкой _BACKUP. Если нажать на кнопку несколько раз, то к расширению _BACKUP добавляются цифры.
3. [u]КОПИРОВАНИЕ СОХРАНЕНЫХ ИГР:[/u] В главном меню нажмите ПРОДОЛЖИТЬ ИГРУ. Выберите сохраненную игру и нажмите кнопку КОПИРОВАТЬ. Будет создана резервная копия, расширенная строкой _COPY. 

[u]Пожалуйста, учтите:[/u] пока что нет возможности загрузить сохраненную игру, находясь в игре.,,[i]问：保存游戏是如何设定的？[/i]
有三个途径：
1. [u]自动保存（AUTOSAVE）：[/u]游戏会在你每一次离开不间断空间时保存（ESC -> 门的标记），覆盖之前的游戏存档。
2. [u]手动保存（MANUAL SAVE）：[/u]如果你按ESC，你会发现有个像软盘一样的保存游戏按钮，如果你按此按钮，会保存一个名字附加“_BACKUP”字样的新存档。如果你再次按此按钮，附加“_BACKUP”字样后会有数字区分而再次建立新存档。
3. 复制存档（COPY SAVE）：[/u]主菜单，点击“继续游戏”，选择一个游戏存档，按“复制”按键。这样会手动备份该存档，附加“_COPY”字样。n
[u]请注意：[/u]目前，还不能在游戏中直接读取存档，只能先退出再读取。

Если вы выходите из системы, ваш прогресс сбрасывается.

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents
[i]"Visit [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]https://cmd.hws.global[/url] or check your PDA > Guide > HWS Commands or type egs:? for all available commands.
"[/i]

------------------------

Much of the galaxy remembers when deconstructing ships, bases and pretty much everything else was enough to give you space tremors for life. Thanks to the geniuses at EGS, we now have the ability to recycle your vessels with the power of [b]Science![/b]

Depending on your upgrade level for EGS Recycle, you will be able to recycle vessels and get up to [b]90%[/b] of your materials back, and perform recycles at a number of locations, and possibly [b]anywhere[/b], if your EGS Recycle level is high enough.



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/b/be190fe3c9ace0d8385971d66c4e65d745daa336.jpeg]
HWS-EGS-Recycle-HQ.jpg1920×1080 312 KB[/url]
([i]The EGS Recylce HQ in ECC System[/i])

[b][u]EGS Upgrade Levels[/u][/b]
[b][u]EGS Level 1[/u][/b]

  - Free: everyone starts with EGS level 1
  - command [b]cost 0 credits[/b] and [b]0 RP[/b]
  - gives [b]only blocks[/b] back
  - [b]% blocks returned is 50%[/b]
  - you can use the command [b]only in an EGS Recycle zone[/b]

[b][u]EGS Level 2[/u][/b]

  - upgrade cost: [b]2,000,000 credits[/b] and [b]25 RP[/b]
  - returns [b]only blocks[/b]
  - [b]% blocks returned is 60%[/b]
  - Use command [b]only in EGS Recycle zones[/b]

[b][u]EGS Level 3[/u][/b]

  - upgrade cost: [b]3,000,000 credits[/b] and [b]50 RP[/b]
  - returns [b]only blocks[/b]
  - [b]% blocks returned is 70%[/b]
  - Use command [b]only in EGS Recycle zones[/b]

[b][u]EGS Level 4[/u][/b]

  - upgrade cost: [b]4,000,000 credits[/b] and [b]100 RP[/b]
  - returns [b]blocks and devices[/b]
  - [b]% blocks returned is 80%[/b]
  - [b]costs 5 credits per block and device[/b]
  - Use command [b]only in EGS Recycle zones[/b]

[b][u]EGS Level 5[/u][/b]

  - upgrade cost:  [b]5,000,000 credits[/b] and [b]250 RP[/b]
  - returns [b]blocks and devices[/b]
  - [b]% blocks and devices returned is 90%[/b]
  - [b]costs 10 credits per block and device[/b]
  - Recycle command can be used [b]globally[/b] (if no enemies are near you)!
  - make sure to have [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-features-orbital-cargo-drone-ocd/4394]OCD level 5[/url] to have the [b]Alien (NPC) Core[/b] preserved during the recycle process

[b][u]General Info[/u][/b]

  - The main EGS Recycle Zone is in [b]ECC System[/b] [b]above the ECC Planet[/b].
  - The Outpost EGS Recycle Zone is in [b]Homeworld System[/b].
  - [b]egs:upgrade:recycle[/b] is the command to upgrade your Recycle Level
  - [b][fdb100]Your EGS Recycle upgrade levels get reset after every season![-][/b]
  - [b]devices[/b] not fitting in your Backback and [b]all blocks[/b] will be put into the [b]OCD[/b], if there is enough space for them.


You can retain your EGS Recycle level through a full wipe with a [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/support-us]support[/url].

Italiano: Completa il tutorial

English: Warp to the orbit of your [c][fdb100]Origin System[-][/c]
Russian: Совершите Warp прыжок на орбиту HQ планеты вашей расы

English: Fly to the orbit of this planet

Here are a few basic SI rules you need to take into account: 

1. Only blocks that are touching the ground will be 100% stable (does not depend on the material used) 

2. You can only achieve 100% stability for a vertical row of blocks, if the lowest block is touching the ground. If you have a 100% stable block, a so called 'anchor block', you can build a vertical pillar on top of it as high as the sky. There is no vertical limit (yet). 

3. If you add blocks to such a 100% stable pillar in any horizontal direction, so each block that is attached in a row, any additional block will have a lower stability - until the row reaches a breaking point. The maximum range or breaking point for a horizontal, floating, not supported beam made out of any of the four base materials is 12 blocks. Note: The anchor block will keep its stability, as there is no such thing as shear force (yet)! [u][c][fdb100]Tip:[-][/c][/u] if your line or area of blocks is showing weak spots, just build a supporting pillar! 

4. Do not put heavy materials or devices on top of a already weak beam or weak foundation. You might risk the construction to collapse and your devices will be destroyed.
Russian:
Voici quelques règles élémentaires que vous devez prendre en compte : 
1- Uniquement les blocs en contact avec le sol sont 100% stables (ne dépend pas du matériaux utilisé)

2- Vous pouvez obtenir 100 % de stabilité pour une rangée verticale de blocs, seulement si le bloc le plus bas touche le sol, appelé aussi « bloc d'ancrage ». Vous pourriez construire un pilier vertical aussi haut que le ciel, il n'y a aucune limite verticale (pour l'instant).

3- Une rangée horizontale de blocs, rattachée par le premier bloc seulement à une structue 100% stable, aura une plus faible stabilité - jusqu'à ce que la ligne atteigne un point de rupture. La portée maximale ou le point de rupture pour une ligne horizontale,'flottante', fabriquée à partir des 4 matériaux de base, est de 12 blocs (Le bloc d'ancrage conservera sa stabilité).
[u]Astuce :[/u] si une rangée ou une zone de blocs montre des signes de faiblesse, construisez juste un pilier de soutien ! 

4- ne placez pas de matériels lourds ou dispositifs au dessus d'une structure instable. La structure risquerait de s'effondrer et vos appareils et dispositifs seraient détruits.
,Aqui estão algumas regras básicas de IE que você precisa levar em consideração:

1. Somente os blocos que estão tocando o solo serão 100% estáveis ​​(não dependem do material utilizado)

2. Você só pode alcançar uma estabilidade de 100% para uma fileira vertical de blocos, se o bloco mais baixo estiver tocando o chão. Se você tem um bloco 100% estável, um chamado 'bloco de âncora', você pode construir um pilar vertical em cima dele tão alto quanto o céu. Não há limite vertical (ainda).

3. Se você adicionar blocos a um pilar 100% estável em qualquer direção horizontal, então cada bloco que está conectado em uma linha, qualquer bloco adicional terá uma estabilidade menor - até que a linha alcance um ponto de ruptura. O alcance máximo ou ponto de ruptura para um feixe horizontal, flutuante, não suportado, feito de qualquer um dos quatro materiais de base é de 12 blocos. Nota: O bloco de âncora manterá sua estabilidade, pois não existe força de corte contra esse bloco (ainda)! [u]Dica:[/u] se sua linha ou área de blocos está mostrando pontos fracos, basta construir um pilar de apoio!

4. Não coloque materiais pesados ​​ou dispositivos em cima de um feixe já fraco ou de uma base fraca. Você pode arriscar a construção em colapso e seus dispositivos serão destruídos.,Здесь несколько базовых правил ПКН, которые следуе принять к сведению: 

1. Только блоки, стоящие на земле имеют 100% стабильность (независимо от использованного материала) 

2. Вы можете рассчитывать на 100% стабильность вертикальных столбов над блоком, стоящим на земле. Имея блок, имеющий 100% стабильность, который также называется 'якорным блоком', вы можете строить на нем вертикальные колонны хоть до самого неба. Вертикального лимита не существует (пока). 

3. Если вы добавляете горизонтальный блок к любому из блоков столба, имеющих 100% стабильность, то каждый добавленный блок будет иметь уже меньшую стабильность - вплоть до достижения точки излома. Максимальный горизонтальный луч, не поддерживаемый дополнительными опорами может составлять 12 блоков для любого из четырех базовых материалов. На заметку: якорный блок будет сохранять свою стабильность, т.к. поперечные нагрузки не рассчитываются (пока)! [u]Совет:[/u] если линия или область блоков имеют низкую стабильность, просто подоприте их колонной! 

4. Не размещайте тяжелые материалы или устройства на заведомо слабых местах постройки. В этом случае возможен обвал строения и тогда ваши устройства будут уничтожены!,,本游戏有一些很少的建筑结构完整性规则需要你掌握：

1.只有方块放到地表才能获得100%的稳定性（无论材质）

2.如果最下面的方块是放在地表的，那么竖直方向可以无限放置方块而不会垮塌，最底下的方块就是“地基”，你这种无限叠加的东西就是“柱子”。“目前”，方块的竖直方向承载力无限。

3.如果你在柱子水平方向悬空连接方块，那么每个后加的方块稳定度都会比前一个更低，直到垮塌，垮塌前的东西叫做“梁”。垮塌前的极限长度的受力就是“水平承载力”，这个力是不固定的。基地建筑的四种材质稳定的水平连接都不会超过12个方块的长度。注意：作为地基的方块，由于本身的就是100%稳定的不会受到剪切力，水平方向也是无限连接的，前提是都是地基不能悬空。[u]专业贴：[/u]当你需要水平方向很长的连接长度时，记得隔几块方块加一个“柱子”！

4.尽量不要在不稳定的地方放置过重的材料和设备，一旦垮塌，血本无归。（基本意译）

By end of the 24th century, after an accelerated rate of riots and catastrophic events, power was granted to the UCH authority to take care of the survival of the Terran civilization.[-]

Zirax installation infiltration suggests deep involvement with the empire, but this fact has yet to be confirmed.[-]

[bcd3d4]The Ziraxian Empire is a militarist oligarchy and the largest power in the galaxy Andromeda. It is ruled by a series of houses, each with a specific function or functions that relates to a sphere of influence. These houses each produce a representative at an, as yet, undiscovered time, and they form a council of elders. This production is facilitated by the Emperor who publicly holds supreme power, but is realistically, more a figure head.[-]

There isn’t very much information available on the origin(s) of the Zirax Empire at this time, however Intel reports that the ancient Zirax  were in touch with the 'Elder Talon', and were given a technological boost from the advanced civilization. The Talon and Zirax were joined together in a technological and cultural Union, called the 'Zirax-Talon Assembly', which persisted for hundreds of years.

We do not know why it collapsed, why they separated, or if it was a conspiracy. Files retrieved by the 2nd UCH recon unit indicated, that the abominations found on the planets they occupied, seemed to have something to do with this or at least are related to a big incident in the past. These files were encrypted, classified and could not be deciphered until today.

Their brutality and behavior towards the Talon Guardians or anyone not from a Zirax controlled faction, indicates that there is a lot more to uncover, than official reports tell us at the moment.
[bcd3d4]Primitive culture (Technology is forbidden; Zirax drones control their settlements). Seem to be the descendants of the so called 'Elder Talon.'[-]

[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
[ff0000][b]!!! ТОЛЬКО ДЛЯ ФЕДЕРАЦИИ !!![/b][-]
Время от времени грузовое судно, полное руды, путешествует по Вселенной. 
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть всю руду с помощью бура, чтобы система безопасности грузового судна не обнаружила вас и вернутесь к торговцу.

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Торговая миссия Фрилансер - Система ECC  + Неизвестная Орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до прибытия подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший дрель и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, бесконечно раз, 360 мин. интервал

English:
[i]Q: How do I upload my Blueprint to the Workshop?[/i]
Just hit the PUBLISH button when having selected a blueprint from the list. A completion message will pop up on the top right if your Blueprint has been uploaded to the workshop.

[i]Q: Can I update a blueprint and have it replace my already published workshop item?[/i]
Of course. Spawn your Blueprint in a Survival or Creative game and make the changes you want to update. Then save the changes by OVERWRITING the original blueprint (rightALT+O -> select your blueprint -> OVERWRITE). Then hit the UPDATE button. It may take a few seconds until the blueprint is published/updated. A message on the top right will notify you about the upload process being completed.
Russian:
[i]Q: Comment puis-je télécharger mon Blueprint sur Workshop ? [/i]
Appuyez simplement sur le bouton 'Publier' après avoir sélectionné le Blueprint dans la liste. Un message s'affiche alors en haut à droite pour confirmer que le Blueprint a bien été tranféré sur Workshop.

[i]Q: puis-je mettre à jour un Blueprint déjà publié sur Workshop ? [/i]
Bien sûr. Une fois votre Blueprint modifié, sauvegardez-le en remplaçant l'original (ALTdroit + O sur Blueprint -> sélectionnez le Blueprint original -> 'Remplacer'). Puis cliquez sur le bouton 'Mettre à jour'. Cela peut prendre quelques secondes, le temps que le Blueprint soit mis à jour. Un message s'affiche alors en haut à droite pour confirmer que la mise à jour a été effectuée.
,[i]P: Como faço para carregar o meu Blueprint para o Workshop?[/i]
Basta clicar no botão PUBLICAR ao selecionar um modelo da lista. Uma mensagem de conclusão aparecerá no canto superior direito quando seu Blueprint estiver pronto.

[i]P: Posso atualizar um Blueprint e substituí-lo do item de oficina já publicado?[/i]
Claro. Faça o seu Blueprint em um jogo de Sobrevivência ou Criativo e faça as alterações que deseja atualizar. Em seguida, guarde as alterações clicando em SOBREPOR o modelo original (ALT DIREITO + O -> selecione o seu modelo -> SOBREPOR). Em seguida, pressione o botão ATUALIZAR. Pode demorar alguns segundos até que o Blueprint seja publicado / atualizado. Uma mensagem no canto superior direito irá notificá-lo sobre o processo de upload concluído.,[i]В: Как я могу загрузить мой чертеж в мастерскую?[/i]
Просто нажмите кнопку ОПУБЛИКОВАТЬ, выбрав чертеж из списка. Когда ваш чертеж загрузится в мастерскую, в правом верхнем углу появится всплывающее сообщение.

[i]В: Могу ли я обновить уже опубликованный в мастерской чертеж?[/i]
Конечно. Разместите постройку по вашему чертежу в режиме выживания или творческом и измените то, что хотите. Затем сохраните изменения, ПЕРЕЗАПИСАВ оригинальный чертеж (правый ALT + O -> выберите ваш чертеж -> ПЕРЕЗАПИСАТЬ). Затем нажмите кнопку ОБНОВИТЬ. Публикация / обновление чертежа может потребовать несколько секунд. Сообщение справа вверху оповестит вас о завершении загрузки чертежа в мастерскую.,,[i]问：怎样将我的蓝图上传到创意工坊？[/i]
在蓝图库中点击“发布”按钮即可，上传完毕后会有系统提示。

[i]问：我能对我已上传的蓝图更新和升级么？[/i]
当然，将你原先的蓝图制造出，更新和升级完成后，保存时点选“覆盖”按键，覆盖你原先的蓝图。然后再点击“更新”按键，几秒钟后就会更新完毕，屏幕右上角会有上传进程提示。

English:
On HWS you have the possibility to get an [b]Alien Core[/b] as a super HighTech Alien Technology® item.

Either from PDA missions, rewards, buying HWS Garage ships and recycling them, or with a [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/support-us]Support[/url].

However, with great power comes great responsibility:
[b][u][fdb100]WARNING 1: BEFORE you replace your core, [b]make sure the structure exists already longer than 5 minutes.[/b] If not, wait until you see it also on HWS Connect. Then you can remove the old core and enter the new Alien core![-][/u][/b]
[b][u][fdb100]WARNING 2: As soon as you drop the Alien Core in your structure, it is set to “No Faction”, your structures will probably shoot at it (even in PVE), and you can’t access it anymore. Make sure to prepare yourself for it! You may have to wait at least 5 minutes before you can switch it back to you again![-][/u][/b]
[b][u][fdb100]WARNING 3: if you dismantle an Alien Core it will become parts in your inventory. You CAN’T get the Alien Core back out of your structure unless you have EGS Recycle level 5 and recycle your structures![-][/u][/b]

The best procedure is as follows:

  - You get the Alien Core
  - You want to get the ID of that structure BEFORE placing / replacing the core. Also make sure this structure is not new created. Otherwise wait  at least 5 minutes before you proceed.
2.1 Either by checking HWS Connect > Structure Commander
2.2 Open your registry, select the structure you want to place the core in and click on statistics. The ID is at the bottom left visible2.3 Type “di” in your game console, look at your structure and see top center the ID
  - If no server restart is near and no other structures are near, you can replace your old Core with the Alien Core
  - You can’t access your structure anymore since it’s set to “No Faction”.
  - Now press TAB and go to the Control Panel




[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/3/3868cca3af627b086a14623493a986b70c54538e.jpeg]
image.jpg1553×918 113 KB[/url]


  - Change the “No Faction” to you (Private) again.

  - Remember it is a super HighTech Alien Technology® and be careful in using this feature!



[i]"[b][u]
Alien Core Advantages[/u][/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

  - Can be stored in your OCD
  - It has more hitpoints and CPU than a normal core
  - No fuel consumption
  - No O2 / Oxygen consumption
  - Very light weight
  - Very valuable item to trade

English:
HWS has a special Economy system where you can store your credits independently from the game.

It is called [b]Elemental Bank[/b].
Elemental Bank credits are especially important to buy other HWS features as the OCD, RP from the EGS, NoGuilty, Recycles, Orbital AM upgrades, HWS Garage ships and more.
Russian:
HWS имеет специальную систему Экономики, где вы можете хранить свои кредиты независимо от игры.

Она называется [b]Единый Банк (Elemental Bank)[/b].

Кредиты Единого Банка особенно важны для покупки других функций HWS, таких как OCD (Орбитальный Карго Дрон), RP от EGS, NoGuilty, Recycles, апгрейды OAM (Орбитальных Автомайнеров), корабли HWS Гаража и многое другое.

English:
[b][c][ff0000]!!! PvP involved! Very dangerous !!![-][/c][/b]

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
[b]The Erestrum Freighter Heist[/b]
[c][fdb100][b][/b][-][/c]We can't tolerate those nasty buggers, working for Mercenaries! Bring back OUR loot, before it gets traded by ridiculous prices in the market!
Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.
Be warned! Traitors and Mercenaries might have captured the Freighter already!

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
HWS Racom - Cor + Unknown Orbit

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
You have only 10 minutes before reinforcement is called. Make sure you have the best Drill equipped and are prepared for any conflict!

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 720m cooldown + 1m delay per success
Russian:
[b][ff0000]!!! Внимание РvP ! Очень Опасно !!![-][/b]

[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
Мы не можем терпеть этих мерзких мерзавцев, работающих на наёмников! Верните нашу добычу, прежде чем она будет продана по смешным ценам на рынке!
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть все руды с помощью Бура, чтобы вас не обнаружила система безопасности грузового судна и вернуться к торговцу.
Будьте осторожны! Предатели и наемники уже могли захватить корабль!

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Система Cebo + Неизвестная орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до вызова подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший Бур и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, Бесконечно раз, 720 мин. задержка + 1 мин. пауза за успех

English:
To enhance the Role Play, help players in need and help with keeping an eye out, HWS introduced a “Homeworld Police” (HWP) faction on both Servers.

But the Police also have some guidelines they have to respect:

  - Police role is to offer advice on Rules and limited assistance if required

  - Police are not to engage in hostility, ever. Defense is permitted as a LAST resort providing repeated warnings are given, but under no circumstances should a hostile player’s ship be destroyed or looted

  - Police do not have Admin Rights and are role playing as Police. This does not involve normal play as they are impartial and neutral, cannot take sides or engage in battle. They can, however, trade and accumulate wealth (e.g. mining on GG with a normal ship but retreat to their Admin ship in Orbit) providing that it doesn’t result in a conflict of interests eg: favouring a player in return for goods / services!

  - Police got special “help commands” based on their Trust / Police Level. E.g. warp commands are only reserved for helping players / checking things out quick

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/2/2a4df76e78e0b1fe7b9ffdf61f4ec1d2483b554b.jpeg]
image.jpg1390×239 48.4 KB[/url]


  - PvE Role:  we can help players on PvE which are having issues with bugs / exploits. We are allowed to help with our own items, but this is VERY rare and would rather instead advise on how to accomplish their problems and teach them the cb: server commands.  We have the ability to warp to the starter Systems to offer help, investigate problems

  - PvP Role: we are there to observe only and gather information on exploits / bugs used and to NEVER intervene. We are allowed to defend ourselves but try not to, e.g. if someone is stuck on PvP planet after being shot down - we cant help, instead advise on best course of action

  - If we cannot help with an issue in game due to lack of knowledge or ability to help we will point them in the right direction (create a ticket on forum link)

  - We will always enforce the rules of gameplay and standup for what is right in the game

  - Any heavy exploits used will be passed onto admins for final judgement, but if we ask the community to do something - please follow and make it easier for us

  - We can kick or ban people who don’t follow the guidelines which are set by the admins of the server, although great care MUST be taken
     - First warning and threaten with a kick directly naming the player.
     - If the player ignores this and being a further nuisance in global chat or other rule-breaking, we will kick or ban due to the nature of issue.
     - If that player comes back and keeps ignoring HWP staff, we can ban and report to server owner for investigation
     - If it happens at night and HWP staff wants to go to bed, ban for 9 hours and report back to Server Owners.
     - Rule breaking must be very clearly shown and you must have a proof for a ban;  otherwise, the player will use it against HWP staff and say you ban whoever and whatever you want
     - Even though we have friends on the server, we are loyal to the server and the rules so we will hand in evidence against ANYONE who is not abiding by them to the admins. We will [i]always[/i] be neutral.



[b][u]
HWS Police Structure Showcase[/u][/b]
Go inside and start the hack
Deutsch: Geh rein und Starte den Hack

English:
[url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect]HWS Connect[/url] is your seamless connection between [b]Empyrion[/b] - the game and our exclusive web interface [b]HWS Connect[/b] that allows you to interact in real-time with our HWS servers while outside of the game!   Having dual monitors or Tablet/Smartphone would make usage of the HWS website tools [b]very convenient[/b].
[b][u]How To Use[/u][/b]




[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/1/1bcd9ce6062d5232375f78c918a47bc993a8bc7e.jpg]
hws-connect-steam.jpg1736×976 271 KB[/url]


While you are in game:

  - Press [b]SHIFT[/b] + [b]TAB[/b] (or whatever your hotkey for the steam overlay is)
  - Click on webbrowser ([b]2[/b])
  - Type connect.hws.global in the addressbar and press enter ([b]3[/b])
  - Click on the “Login through Steam” button ([b]4[/b])
  - Or just click on the link in the multiplayer lobby description before you start to play on HWS ([b]1[/b])

[b][u]Steam Web API[/u][/b]

[b][fdb100]Important: HWS Connect authenticates with Steam Servers and this is managed by Valve Inc. There is integration between your Steam ID and the game.  No personal information is shared or stored by HWS at any time.[-][/b]*

By allowing Steam to verify that you are actually who you claim to be, Steam passes HWS a steam session ID which confirms your actual identity. With this ID we link your character to a secure identity and this allows HWS to protect both you and the community.  It also grants you access to all of the benefits and features of HWS Connect !
[b][u]HWS Connect Feature List[/u][/b]

  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-universe/21252]HWS Universe[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-online-players/21256/2]HWS Online Players[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-hunter-board/11555/2]HWS Hunter Board[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-kill-board/11552/4]HWS Kill Board[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/orbital-auto-miner-oam/4393/3]Orbital Auto Miner (OAM)[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/orbital-cargo-drone-ocd/4394/2]Orbital Cargo Drone (OCD)[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-marketplace/4376/2]HWS Marketplace[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/structure-commander/6236/2]Structure Commander[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/vote-for-hws-rewards-inclusive/11743/19]Vote for HWS | Rewards inclusive[/url]
  - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-skill-tree/9696/2]HWS Skill Tree[/url]

This topic will contain a table of contents
Homeworld is a trademark and integral system of the HWS Universe. Players can count on its continued presence from season to season.  It remains one of the richest sectors in the galaxy, possessing every resource - there for the taking for those who dare.



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/0/05088049c896aa4cb8509b4b92c0a84534a44be8.jpeg]
HWS-9X-Homeworld.jpg1926×1056 401 KB[/url]

[b][u]Homeworld Moons[/u][/b]
[b][u]Iceworld[/u][/b]

Once a thriving training ground for Aliens, this low gravity planet allowed them to train for orbital operations, and to this day you may find their technology as well as possible remnants of Alien activity.

Travelers seeking the rare element Erestrum would be wise to check Iceworld.

[i]"If you can maintain a [b]1000+ Block Base[/b] for at least [b]24 hours[/b] on Iceworld, you will be rewarded with [b]5 RP[/b] and [b]5000 Credits per day![/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

[].[-]
[b][u]Lavaworld[/u][/b]

A favorite of the Aliens and still used by them for training operations, but with opposite conditions from Iceworld, the intense gravity, lack of water, and abundance of deadly lava make it ideal for testing troops in harsh environments. Rare resources are sure to be found here. If you come to Lavaworld, come prepared.

The difficulty experienced on Lavaworld is compensated for by the presence of important resources such as Zascosium.

[i]"If you maintain a [b]1000+ Block Base[/b] for at least [b]24 hours[/b] on Lavaworld, you will be rewarded with [b]5 RP[/b] and [b]5000 Credits per day![/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

[].[-]
[b][u]Desertworld[/u][/b]

This dry moon has plenty of Neodymium. It was never highly developed due to the fact that the atmosphere, while good for humans, is uncomfortable for Alien life.

[i]"If you maintain a [b]1000+ Block Base[/b] for at least [b]24 hours[/b] on Desertworld, you will be rewarded with [b]5 RP[/b] and [b]5000 Credits per day![/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

[].[-]
[b][u]Waterworld[/u][/b]

Once a space travel hub of the Universe, it boasts a wealth of Pentaxid in the moon’s crust to satisfy the energy needs of even the most ambitious of Space Travelers. Today, however, this moon is mostly flooded due to a failed geomagnetic experiment which caused the ice caps to melt.

[].[-]
[b][u]Homeworld[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/8/86e11beec5afaf4a1f32cb458e66f2467acccf0a.jpeg]
HWS-9X-Homeworld-Planet.jpg1926×1056 370 KB[/url]


The central nervous system of it all: [b]Homeworld Planet[/b].

Who will be able to control the most important entrance into the lucrative [b][019245]HWS Biome[-][/b]?



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/4/4750c98bc493b9e1cf3bb3ab2223a9cab68a0549.jpeg]
HWS-9X-Homeworld-Biome.jpg1926×1056 538 KB[/url]


The planet is optimized for PvP performance. However, it’s heavily guarded with Rocket Drones and frequent Bomb Drone Base attacks.  Take these factors into consideration if you plan to settle on one of the most resource rich planets in the HWS Universe.

[i]"If you settle here and are able to maintain a 1000+ Block Base for 24 hours, you will be rewarded with [b]7 HWS RP[/b] and [b]7000 credits per day![/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

Good Luck!
Russian:
Homeworld является торговой маркой и неотьемлемой системой Вселенной HWS. Игроки могут рассчитывать на её постоянное присутствие от сезона к сезону.  Она остаётся одной из богатейших секторов галактики, обладая всеми ресурсами - для тех, кто достаточно смелый.


HWS-9X-Homeworld.jpg1926×1056 401 KB
 ([i][u][019245]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/0/05088049c896aa4cb8509b4b92c0a84534a44be8.jpeg[-][/u][/i])


[b][u]Луны Homeworld [/u][/b]
[b][u]Iceworld[/u][/b]

Когда-то процветающая тренировочная площадка для инопланетян, эта планета с низкой гравитацией позволила им тренироваться для орбитальных операций, и по сей день Вы можете найти их технологию, а также некоторые остатки инопланетной деятельности.
Если вам когда-нибудь понадобится Erestrum, попробуйте исследовать планету в определенных местах…

[i]"Если вы держите [b]1000+ блоков Базу[/b] хотя-бы [b]24 часа[/b] здесь, вы получите [b]5 HWS RP[/b] и [b]5000 Кредитов[/b]"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Lavaworld[/u][/b]

Любое место инопланетян и до сих пор используется ими для учебных операций, но с противоположными условиями от ледяного мира. Тяжелая гравитация, отсутствие воды и обилие смертоносной лавы делают его идеальным для тестирования войск в суровых условиях. Здесь наверняка можно найти очень редкие ресурсы. Будь готов.
Трудности, с которыми ты здесь столкнёшься, компенсируются важными ресурсами, такими как Zascosium.

[i]"Если вы держите [b]1000+ блоков Базу[/b] хотя-бы [b]24 часа[/b] здесь, вы получите [b]5 HWS RP[/b] и [b]5000 Кредитов[/b]"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Desertworld[/u][/b]

Имеет много неодима. Он никогда не был высокоразвит из-за того, что атмосфера, хотя и хороша для людей, неудобна для инопланетной жизни.

[i]"Если вы держите [b]1000+ блоков Базу[/b] хотя-бы [b]24 часа[/b] здесь, вы получите [b]5 HWS RP[/b] и [b]5000 Кредитов[/b]"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Waterworld[/u][/b]

Когда-то центр космических путешествий Вселенной, он может похвастаться большим количеством Пентаксида в коре планеты, чтобы удовлетворить все желания космических путешественников. Сегодня, однако, планета в основном затоплена из-за неудачного геомагнитного эксперимента, который заставил ледяные шапки таять.

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents[b][u]1. Stealing / Infiltration / Sabotage[/u][/b]

[][b]1.1[/b][-] Backpacks: You are NOT allowed to steal backpacks or structures from players on [b]PvE Starter Playfields (planets and orbits)[/b].  [b]This rule only applies to PvE Starter Playfields, not PvP Starter Playfields[/b].

[][b]1.2[/b][-] Blueprints:  You are allowed to capture the blueprints of other players (in PvP) and use them on HWS (this includes selling them via HWS Garage), but you may NOT post the blueprints in the public space (Workshop, Discord, Steam for example). It is still their intellectual property. You must ask for and receive their permission before doing so.
This affects especially our [b]HWS Blueprints[/b]. If you blueprint a Penthouse or POI, you are not allowed to share it in any way outside of HWS! This will be punished heavily since incredible amount of time, intellectual property and efforts are went into HWS specific blueprints.

[][b]1.3[/b][-] Intra-faction Gameplay:  If you think you have a thief in your own faction, it is [b]YOUR[/b] responsibility to protect / keep track of your property and assets.  HWS CAN’T help with intra-faction gameplay (ie. internal faction politics), being that there are so many players.

[][b]1.4[/b][-] Sabotage and / or Infiltration:  You are not allowed to sabotage and / or infiltrate other factions. If clear proof and evidence is provided, we may investigate suspected violations of this rule.

[fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Prison / Guilty / Ban / Loss of Game Progress[/b][-][b][u]2. Griefing & Ammo Draining[/u][/b]

[][b]2.1[/b][-] Do not grief!

[][b]2.2[/b][-] Players on Outcast-Cryo-X with over [b]50 playhours[/b] after a fresh wipe are forced to leave the system or at least not visit the planet anymore to ‘farm noobs!’

[][b]2.3[/b][-] Faction Tags (Abbrev.) can be quite fundamental for some players / organizations. If your only intention after a full wipe is to steal their faction tag, we consider this to be griefing and will remove you from that faction. In doing so, we will first check your history and try to communicate with you beforehand.

[][b]2.4[/b][-] Do not ammo drain enemies!

  - anything over 10 deaths within a [i]short time frame[/i] is considered excessive and is ammo draining.


[][b]2.5[/b][-] Do not stay for too long in the NPC Trader menu, preventing other players from having trader access! If you get reported for doing this too often and for too long, we will check the logs and take action. Use common sense and be courteous / considerate.

 [fdb100] [b]Possible Punishment: Prison / Guilty / Temp Ban / Loss of Game Progress[/b][-][b][u]3. Warp Camping[/u][/b]

[][b]3.1[/b][-] Do not warp camp. The warp entrance area is about 3 square km (randomness +/- 1.5km.) This is a TRANSIT-ONLY ZONE – so you MUST be moving or refueling/remapping.

[][b]3.2[/b][-] [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/supergate/11596]Supergates[/url] only [i]are excluded[/i] from this rule. They have a 6x6x6 km warp area you get randomly warped in.  (Hint: when you warp by using a supergate, be prepared!).

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Temp Ban / Seizure / Prison / Guilty / Loss of Game Progress[/b][-][b][u]4. Offline Protection (OP)[/u][/b]

[][b]4.1[/b][-] [b]No alternate / family share accounts[/b] are allowed to have [b]offline protected Bases[/b] (private / faction) on hotspot playfields. Offline protected bases are defined as Bases with an [b]Offline Protection Device[/b] built in.

[][b]4.2[/b][-] You are [b]NOT allowed[/b] to use an [b]Offline Protection[/b] (OP) Device on a [b]private structure[/b] (BA/CV). You have to set that structure to faction!

[fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Temp Ban / Seizure / Prison / Guilty / Loss of Game Progress[/b][-][b][u]5. Multiple Accounts / Faction splitting[/u][/b]

[][b]5.1[/b][-] We allow up to 1-3 accounts (family share or alternative accounts) on HWS. However, [b]you are not allowed to use these multiple accounts to sabotage, infiltrate others, gain massive personal advantage (fa:supply, etc.)[/b] from them or employ other abuses derived from having them.

[][b]5.2[/b][-] You are not allowed to [b]split a big faction into smaller to circumvent our Limit system[/b] (gain more vessels to steamroll the enemy)

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Loss of Game Progress on All Accounts / Temp ban / Perma ban[/b][-][b][u]6. Illegal items[/u][/b]

[][b]6.1[/b][-] You are not allowed to acquire, possess, use, trade or sell any illegal items. If you discover an illegal item (Examples: debug tools/weapons, exceeds normal stack size, etc.).  Do not pick it up ---- report it immediately to HWP, Admins, Rex or Jascha.

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Auto Ban / Loss of Game Progress[/b][-][b][u]7. Tackling / Docking[/u][/b]

[][b]7.1[/b][-]  Do not tackle other ships with your ships! This notion of ‘tackling’ is considered an exploit, and it is an [b]ILLEGAL[/b] tactic when used intentionally and frequently to disable or hinder the movement of a vessel.
[i][i]More info[/i]
  - [b]Note[/b]: When reporting violations, please include [b]ENTIRE[/b] video evidence (Screenshots are not sufficient evidence). Video evidence that you clip not showing the entire fight will not be used. It is on the accuser to provide complete evidence. Please provide timestamps of the [b]REPEATED[/b] collisions.


Tackling is the [b]REPEATED[/b] attempt of one ship to stop another ship’s movement. If you change directions and collision occurs, that is your fault and theirs. If you are going toward someone who is also going toward you and you collide even if you turn your ship around at the last minute and you both collide, it is both parties’ fault. Tackling is one ship clearly not moving toward another ship and the other ship colliding REPEATEDLY into you. [b]Last but not least, this rule only applies if you get forcefully pinned down for a long time so the enemy can destroy your ship preventing you from doing anything.[/b]
[/i]
[][b]7.2[/b][-] Do not dock your SV to enemy CVs. Due to bad game mechanics, this will instantly stop a ship and the enemy can’t do anything about it. It’s worse offense than ramming / tackling.

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Seizure / Prison / Guilty / Loss of Game Progress / Temp Ban[/b][-][b][u]8. Illegal Building / Spawning[/u][/b]

[][b]8.1[/b][-] You are not allowed to [b]clip anything inside bases[/b].

[][b]8.2[/b][-] You are not allowed to use the [b]Filler Tool[/b] in any way on or around existing buildings & structures.

[][b]8.3[/b][-] [b]Bases:[/b]  Bases may be constructed using the ‘N connect — Attach to Base’ feature.  For example – turrets, core, solar panels may be built or placed using ‘N connect’.  Separated sections of a base (a base is everything that is attached to the same base core block) may be built using ‘N connect’.  Turrets may be placed on bare ground.  (Note:  you may not overlap or clip blocks or devices from multiple — that is two or more bases).

[][b]8.4[/b][-] [b]Vessels (CV, SV, HV):[/b] Floating turrets, devices, blocks, or any combinations thereof are not permitted.  All devices and blocks of a vessel must be attached one to the other.

[][b]8.5[/b][-] You are NOT allowed to build / spawn your structures near resource [b]asteroids in PvE space[/b]

[][b]8.6[/b][-] You are NOT allowed to build / spawn / fly your structures [b]Inside of asteroids[/b] or [b]Inside POIs[/b] and park them there (within the bounding box).

[][b]8.7[/b][-] [b]Lag Engineering.[/b]DO NOT build structures with the intent to create lag for other players. (i.e. excessive lights, thrusters, triangles, etc.)  Structures reported for possibly being created to generate lag will be examined by admins and decisions will be made & actions taken on a case-by-case basis.

[][b]8.8[/b][-] [b]Proximity Alert Decoy.[/b]
DO NOT build proximity alert decoys [b]only[/b] with Flares or other Devices, which have a bad render distance. Make sure to use regular blocks for them. DO NOT change the center of your object by moving the core or other things away as well. The HUD marker needs to be directly bound to your object.

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Removal of Structure(s) / Guilty / Ban / Loss of Game Progress[/b][-][b][u]9. Living in PvP[/u][/b]

[][b]9.1[/b][-] With the exception of Fairplay Rules, Bugs and Exploiting, almost all bets are off in PvP playfields, and you should be prepared to risk it all if you dare to venture there.

This topic will contain a table of contents[b][u]1. Language & Chat[/u][/b]

[][b]1.1[/b][-] Please use [b]only English in global chat[/b]. You can use whatever language you want in faction or private chat.

We tolerate other languages as well, but once you use vulgar words in other languages you will be warned & then punished if the adult language continues.

[][b]1.2[/b][-] [b]Don’t spam[/b] - you should reasonably space your messages apart  to allow others conversation.

[][b]1.3[/b][-] Obvious [b]Advertisement[/b], [b]Troll Posts[/b] or [b]Troll Behavior[/b] identified by admins may result in a player being instantly removed without warning.  All chat is recorded and available for later review by admins.

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Kick / Temp Ban / Perma Ban[/b][-][b][u]2. Toxicity[/u][/b]

[][b]2.1[/b][-] [f2ca4e][b]We do not tolerate toxicity on HWS[/b][-]. While a few pokes are part of PvP and are acceptable - any excessive and frequent harassment, blaming, insulting, name calling, etc. are NOT okay.

How our Anti-Toxicity System works:

  - [b]If you respond[/b] to toxic chats, you are part of it too and are [b]also guilty[/b].  Who started it does not matter.
  - If you experience toxicity, [b]take a screenshot[/b] of it, press B and [b]MUTE the toxic person(s)[/b].
  - [b]Post the screenshot[/b] and names as soon as possible here: [url=https://help.hws.global/]https://help.hws.global/[/url]
  - The toxic person(s) will be [b]warned the first time[/b], followed by a [b]temporary ban the second time[/b] and [b]permanently banned the third time[/b].


[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/6-consequences-disclaimer/4367]Here is further info[/url]. There is plenty of toxicity in real life and many other stresses in game. Do not express your frustration and aggression in game! Any further smack talk, toxicity can be handled in [b]Your Own[/b] Discord server, E-Mail or whatever.

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Kick / Temp Ban / Perma Ban[/b][-][b][u]3. Behavior & Community[/u][/b]

[][b]3.1[/b][-] Please be respectful to others, even those not in your direct global conversation. This means: No racism, no sexist remarks, no shaming or verbal abuses.

[][b]3.2[/b][-] HWS is a family-friendly server. There are minors and women who play on the server. Do not  curse/swear or use other bad words in global chat - Keep it Clean!

[][b]3.3[/b][-] Religion, Politics, Gender Topics, Etc. do NOT belong in the game or HWS Discord! Use Reddit or other discussion pages on the web if you wish to discuss these topics.

[][b]3.4[/b][-] You may not use vulgarity, swear words or defamatory words/phrases in [b]your structure/vehicle names[/b], [b]steam account[/b], [b]forum name[/b], or other naming opportunities.

Regardless of whether or not Steam allows it, usernames which violate this rule will be warned and banned if the user does not comply.  This of course applies to faction names as well. We also reserve the right to warn / ban accounts which have the obvious intent to cover identity or other suspicious activity.

This decision is strictly up to the judgement of admins available, and is NOT a matter up for debate.

[][b]3.5[/b][-] Forum & Discord Accounts: When you join our Discord Server, [f3ca4e] [b]Please use your in-game name![/b] [-] Otherwise, we don’t know if you are a spambot, and can’t help you with your in-game problems.

 [fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Kick / Guilty / Temp Ban / Perma Ban[/b][-]

This topic will contain a table of contents
[b]Elemental Capital City[/b] ([b]ECC[/b]) is the Mecca of the Universe!  It holds every secret, every service, and every treasure that you could hope to acquire.  Visiting the Capital City is part of the daily lives for many players and some Origins cannot operate without it.
[b][u]ECC Features[/u][/b]

The Elemental Capital City System has several attractions:
[b][u]HWS Garage HQ (Space)[/u][/b]

There you will find special CV ships for sale from HWS Garage or players.
[b][u]EGS Recycle & Repair Station[/u][/b]

In ECC System you will find the EGS Recycle & Repair Station. Around it, you have a large area for your ships to be recycled.  Be sure to first undock any ships located within!  You will receive a welcome message  when you are within range of this service.Additional, on the platform, you will find a public Repair Station to use.
[b][u]Elemental Galactic Services HQ[/u][/b]

The EGS Headquarters provides an easy way to purchase RP. The ease of access and high demand for services in the hub of the Universe makes commerce more expensive here, however.  Another important service available at EGS HQ is to have your [b]guilty[/b] status removed by paying it off.  Only in the large central room between the bank and trade center can you get ores down from your Orbital Auto Miners without being charged a retrieval fee.



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/6/6317bdf731adfc3172ffd733c9e2e48fc9d8d7d0.jpeg]
HWS-EGS-HQ.jpg1920×1080 507 KB[/url]

[b][u]Elemental Bank[/u][/b]

The financial lifeblood of the galactic economy flows through this bank.  Visiting the EB provides a discount on many transactions which otherwise are not free.  These include paying in, paying out, sending credits and converting coins.
[b][u]HWS Garage HQ[/u][/b]

Purchase exclusive HWS ships at the HWS Garage!   These exclusive one-of-a-kind ships cannot be found or built anywhere else in the galaxy and some have features which exceed usual class limitations.  Shop wisely and bring your Elemental Bank Credits… bring a [b]LOT[/b] of  them.
[b][u]EGS Flying City[/u][/b]

This special City is always under construction and offers all the time not only puzzles and missions but also good loot along the way. Always worth the discovery!



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/6/676349d81539f36f969f0d4642877fa12a201df9.jpeg]
HWS-EGS-Flying-City.jpg1920×1080 178 KB[/url]


[i]"ECC is also home to several other points of interest that are worth looking into.  Exploration is encouraged.
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Tax System[/u][/b]

ECC and ECC System is visited by around 150 players per day. Imagine they would leave all of their structures at the special ECC Buildings.
That is why the ECC Orbit and ECC Planet is taxed.
The tax is assessed at [b]8:50AM-9:10AM (server time)[/b] and visitors are advised to be off world and not in the surrounding space when the taxes are charged. Pay heed to the warnings you will see and hear whenever you enter the orbit / planet.

[b][u]Elemental Prison[/u][/b]

Prison is the hellhole where offenders are sent when they find themselves on the wrong side of the Law.  This occurs when players break laws, fail to pay taxes, or when they are a menace to society.   This purgatory has broken the most hardened criminals and convinced them to alter their twisted thinking and bad behavior.

Some even claim that the Elemental Galactic Services [b]hires[/b] aliens to monitor their criminals… Is escape possible?  Perhaps.

Do not find yourself on the Prison Space… If rebellious ignorance lands you here, prepare for a tough…lonnnng… sentence.

This topic will contain a table of contents[b][u]1. Structure Limits[/u][/b]

[i]"[b]Introduction[/b]: [i]HWS has structure limits to grant a smooth game experience for thousands of players and to fix some gameplay related problems not yet addressed.[/i]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u][][b]1.1[/b][-] Blueprint spawn restriction on HWS - [fdb100]Class 7[-][/u][/b]

  - This is the global server max class size of HV/SV/CV/BA that may be spawned via F2 ([url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/tools/emp-class-calculator]Click here to use the Empyrion Class Calculator to determine the class size of your structure and by how much you need to adjust it to fit within a specific class size. [/url] )

[b][u][][b]1.2[/b][-] Playfield structure limits[/u][/b]


Playfield structure limits may have higher or lower maximum class restrictions than what is shown above. Please refer to the [b]playfield description in the lower right corner on the ingame map (press M)[/b] for information and limits specific to that particular playfield.

Also note that the Class size is rounded and has a range. Class 3 for example goes from 2.50 to 3.49.
[b][u][][b]1.3[/b][-] Global structure limits[/u][/b]



  - [b]Left two columns[/b]: [i]What amount of min. structures your faction can spawn globally[/i]

  - [b]Center two columns[/b]: [i]What factor your faction can have additionally to the left columns.[/i]
     - [i][b]Example[/b]: A 3 man faction could have 2+(3*1,00) = 5 faction Bases globally (PvP and PvE).[/i]


  - [b]Right two columns[/b]: [i]What amount of max. private structures you can have[/i]

  - Whatever limit is the [b]lowest[/b] (playfield limit or global limit) is the one which is active.


[b][u][][b]1.4[/b][-] Seizure / Removal of Structures[/u][/b]

In the event any of the above and/or ingame stated limits are exceeded, the server will take the following actions:

  - [b]PvP Planets[/b]: After [b]Two 2-minute warnings[/b] your structure will be set to HWS faction ([b]6 minutes[/b] in total after placing the structure)
[b]PvP Space[/b]: After [b]Two x 3-minute warnings[/b] your structure will be set to HWS faction ([b]8 minutes[/b] in total after placing the structure)

  - [b]PvE Planets & Space[/b]: After [b]Five x 15-minute warnings[/b] your structure will be set to HWS [b](90 minutes[/b] in total after placing the structure)

  - [b]Structures set to HWS faction will be deleted[/b] in
[b]PvP[/b]: after 6 minutes
[b]PvE[/b]: after 3 days

  - [b]Limit abuse[/b]: If you place structures with the intent that HWS will capture it to attack enemies, you will be  punished.



A penalty which involves Credit and RP loss (per the buyback formula) will apply to you if it was set to private and will apply to all faction members if it was set to faction.
Check the method to buy your structures back yourself here: [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/structure-buy-back/11593]Structure Buy Back[/url]

[fdb100][b]Possible Punishment: Temp Ban / Perma Ban / Loss of Game Progress / Guilty / Prison[/b][-][b][u]2. Server limits[/u][/b]
[b][u][][b]2.1[/b][-] [b]6-Hour Deletion Timer for Micro-Structures[/b][/u][/b]

Structures consisting of [b]less than 10 blocks or without a core[/b] are considered "‘micro-structures’.  If not ‘touched’(interacted with), these structures/vehicles will be [b]deleted[/b] by the server after 6 hours.
[b][u][][b]2.2[/b][-] [b]15-Day Deletion Timer for Not ‘Touched’ Structures[/b].[/u][/b]

After 15-days, a structure not ‘touched’(interacted with) will be deleted by the server.  You or others must minimally ‘touch’ a structure every 15-days to avoid deletion.

  - [b]touch[/b] means literally standing on top of the structure or walking on the blocks. HWS Structure Commander (via HWS Connect) displays the number of days since a structure was last touched. Using the Control Menu ( P ) is NOT considered touching.

[b][u][][b]2.3[/b][-] If a Structure is Deleted[/u][/b]

You may [url=https://goo.gl/3zWXif]submit a support ticket[/url] on the HWS Forum — it can be likely restored for free if you report it within 3 days.However, if it was your mistake and you repeat this mistake, it will cost you ingame credits + HWS RP as follows:

[i]"[b]Blocks * Devices * Days not touched + Class as RP cost[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

[fdb100][b]We strongly encourage you to go to [url=https://connect.hws.global/]HWS Connect[/url] > choose your server > click on the HWS Universe Card and check all other limits there![/b][-][b][u]3. Weapon  limits[/u][/b]

[i](Numbers shown are the MAX allowed of each type of weapon, drill, tool, etc.)[/i]

[b][u][][b]3.6[/b][-] Empyrion Weapon Limits[/u][/b]

Empyrion only allows 21 weapons / turrets to shoot at the same time. If you have more than 21, the game picks randomly which weapons / turrets will fire.

[i]"[b]Choose[/b] means a decision between the [b]normal Turret[/b] or the [b]retractable Turret[/b].
For BAses and CVs it also means certain [b]type decisions[/b].
[i]For example either 5 Pulse Laser Turrets + 5 Plasma Turrets or only 10 Plasma Turrets => You can pick the amount of Turrets out of a group limit.
[b]Choose wisely[/b] with our [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uxoPbrFKitNpAbOTHwXrMG4Ms1bHQsd1jzPt1v40kzw/edit?usp=sharing]Effective Weapon System[/url] in mind![/i]
"[/i]
