This topic will contain a table of contents
Here are a few of the more common instances of rule-breaking, ignoring in-game warnings, or just good practices to employ to be safe ‘just in case’:

------------------------
[b][u][][b]1.1[/b][-] Your Structures are seized by the “HWS” faction or gone for “No reason”!?[/u][/b]

The possible reasons for this are listed and explained on the previous pages, but you have basically two options:

  - [url=https://goo.gl/3zWXif]Create a Get Help ticket[/url] if you are unsure about the why and what
  - You are in front of “your” ship/structure, but it says HWS?


[b]Type[/b]
   egs:buyback:<ID>
The cost for this command is:

[i]"(Blocks * Devices) / 2 credits + RP* (in Starter system 1000 credits + RP*)
*[i]RP cost = Class size of structure[/i]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u][][b]1.2[/b][-] Ingame warnings[/u][/b]


[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/1/11b73382e1be573b3511813b4f572f6afdd635e4.jpg]
image.jpg467×651 61 KB[/url]
  - Player: [i]"I visited a planet and was warped off and lost my ship![/i]

  - There is normally no way to lose your ship in this situation, except you didn’t read the Map description before you jumped / entered a planet and left your cockpit.
[b]Heed Warnings![/b]  They are audible and visual.

  - [d09019][b]Consequence[/b][-]: Ask your faction members or the player community to help you. We assist only in rare cases and are not obligated to do so.


[b][u][][b]1.3[/b][-] How to get the ID of a Structure[/u][/b]

  - Type “di” in the console and check the ID at the top middle screen:


[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/3/3a2fa41781c2428e4a74becce45236392635c116.jpg]
image.jpg795×544 37.1 KB[/url]
  - [d09019][b]Tip[/b][-]: If you’re concerned about ship loss when warping, always warp with ‘di’ enabled in the console so you can screenshot your exact location and relay that information to us via support ticket.

  - Check the statistics page of the structure:

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/e/e2b4d84c410a50357ea904e41ed705c905b6c7a3.jpg]
hws-rules-statistics.jpg1900×1005 220 KB[/url]


  - Check the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/structure-commander/6236]HWS Connect Structure Commander[/url]


[b][u][][b]1.4[/b][-] Warp camping[/u][/b]


  - You have 3 mins to get 1.5k m away out of the warp zone. No exceptions.

  - [d09019][b]Consequence[/b][-]: If caught, you will lose your ship and possibly more if it’s a repeat offense.


[b][u][][b]1.5[/b][-] Server Warnings[/u][/b]


[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/b/be013f0dec633f4a39914f51355fbe66ab38f62b.jpg]
image.jpg722×89 10.8 KB[/url]
  - Even though they are not always easy to read, make sure to read all red ingame warnings! You can always re-read them by pressing , (comma) or . (period) and then click on the Server Tab on the far right.

  - [d09019][b]Consequence[/b][-]: the red warning that Black Hole wipes every 24 hours is one example where help/rescue will not likely be offered.


[b][u][][b]1.6[/b][-] Faction Thief[/u][/b]

  - Taking faction property when leaving a faction leads to accusations of stealing which can can cause bigger problems for you AND your new faction. Griefing / Sabotage is not allowed!

  - [d09019][b]Tip[/b][-]: If you leave a faction - Don’t take what doesn’t belong to you!


[b][u][][b]1.7[/b][-] Ammo draining[/u][/b]


[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/f/ff8278d2e71efc7c1155b6cf695084340565467f.jpg]
image.jpg525×801 30.5 KB[/url]
This can be done in several ways. It can be a valuable tactic if used correctly. (Example: if you are attacking and are dodging the incoming rounds) Most of the time it is done illegally. It has to be fair, and will be dealt with accordingly when solid evidence is presented.

This is an example of the most common type of ammo drain:

  - You’ve decided you want to attack/grief/spy/visit an enemy structure
  - You are killed by automatic turret fire
  - You are presented with options to respawn and choose “Current location”
  - You are killed by the automatic turret fire again
  - You repeat steps 3 and 4 until there is no ammo left / too much ammo wasted


This situation is always considered ammo draining and is NEVER considered to be griefing against the ‘trapped victim’ because the invading player has 3 alternatives when dying.  Not setting a spawn point is no excuse, and turrets are, of course, automatic-fire. The invading / ammo-draining player has the power of choice.

Keep the option of setting a “Home” spawn point in mind.
Read more about it at the [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]Command Page[/url]

[d09019][b]Consequence[/b][-]: anything over 10 deaths within a [i]short time frame[/i] is considered excessive and is Ammo Draining. It is punishable by a sentence to Elemental Prison, loss of property and/or a Ban.

[b]Note: Signal Logic is an extention of the Signal/Trigger mechanic, offering new ways on how to connect sensors and triggers in certain, more elaborate ways. Hit the SIGNAL LOGIC button on top of the Control Panel to access.[/b]

[i]Q: What is the purpose of SIGNAL LOGIC circuits?[/i]
They allow you to do things that the standard device-based signal-dropdown would not allow you to do, like connecting different sensors to a several other devices.

[i]Q: How do i use it?[/i]
Pretty much the same as you would set up a sensor-trigger array..but with more paramters/options/gates, like AND, OR, XOR, Inverter, Delays (more planned).

[i]Q: How do i set it up?[/i]
Same as above: Have some sensors placed at your structure. Access them directly or via Control Panel and give them a unique signal name. Then open SIGNAL LOGIC, add a new circuit. Select your sensor signal on the left side. Add a name for the output signal on the right side. Got to the devices that you want to manage with the circuit and add the output signal to your devices signal dropdown.

[i]Q: What are the different gates do?[/i]
AND = All sensors added to the circuit need to trigger for the signal to be send. Example: If you have 2 trigger plates, the light will only be on if both plates are triggeret at the same time (on player standing on each)
OR = If one or more of the added sensors are triggered, the signal is send to the device. Example: A light is illuminated if you stand on of the trigger plates, but also if both plates are triggered.
XOR = sends signal only if only ONE of the two attached sensors is activated. Does not trigger if both sensors are active. Example: the light will only illuminate if exactly one plate is triggered. If both are triggered, no signal is sent and the light remains dark.
  INVERTER = inverts the signal (f.ex. to OFF if an ON signal is sent). Example: A light is switched off if you step on a trigger plate. Also ueful when you have two triggers and you need them both to be the same in order to pass an AND gate.
SET/RESET Latch = Use for two sensors: sensor A sets and sensor B resets if triggered.
DELAY = creates a simple delay modificator for a single-signal. Click on the button-box to add a value (seconds)

[i]Q: Can i combine the singals coming from a circuit and use it in a new circuit?[/i]
Of course! Just use the outgoing signal name and select it for the input side. You can create complex circuits this way. Of course you should not delete the underlying circuit for your enhanced circuit or it will break the queue.
Français:
[b]Note: Vous pouvez élaborer des connexions plus compexes entre les capteurs / déclencheurs et les dispositifs grâce à la création de 'circuits', Vous trouverez cette option dans le panneau de contrôle > Signal logique. Utilisez la fenêtre 'Sélectionner le circuit' pour choisir le type de circuit, puis la fenêtre 'Configurer le circuit', pour le paramétrer.[/b]

[i]Q: Que permet l'utilisation de 'circuits' ?[/i]
Des connexions plus compexes utilisant des CONDITIONS (entre plusieurs capteurs / déclencheurs) et autres paramètres spécifiques.

[i]Q: Comment paramétrer un circuit ?[/i]
Comme vu précédemment : placez vos capteurs / déclencheurs et vos dispositifs sur vore structure. Accédez-y via le panneau de contrôle puis onglet 'Signal logique'. Donnez leur un nom unique. Puis sélectionnez un circuit (fenêtre du bas) et ajouter le à la fenêtre 'Configurer le circuit'. Dans cette fenêtre, la partie sur la gauche du circuit vous permet de saisir le nom de votre ou vos capteurs / déclencheurs ou même le nom d'un signal de sortie d'un autre circuit. La partir sur la droite du circuit vous permet de saisir le nom du signal de sortie. Ensuite pour les dispositifs concernés, dans la fenêtre 'Configurer le signal', il suffira de sélectionner le signal de sortie du circuit que l'on veut associer.


Les différentes TYPES de CIRCUIT : (exemple avec 2 plaques à déclenchement)

- AND = Les 2 plaques ajoutées à ce circuit doivent être activées TOUTES LES DEUX pour que le signal soit envoyé. 

- NAND = Inverse de AND. Si les 2 plaques sont activées TOUTES LES DEUX, aucun signal n'est envoyé.

- OR = AU MOINS UNE plaque doit être activée pour que le signal soit envoyé. 

- NOR = Inverse de OR. Le signal sera bloqué si UNE ou les DEUX plaques sont activées.

- XOR = Le signal sera envoyé si une SEULE plaque est activée. 

- XNOR = Le signal sera envoyé si le statut des 2 plaques est IDENTIQUE (ON ou OFF).

- INVERSER = permet d'inverser le signal. Ne s'applique qu'à un seul capteur / déclencheur ou à un autre signal de sortie.

- SET/RESET LATCH = S'utilise avec 2 capteurs / déclencheurs. le 1er envoie le signal et le second le bloque.

- DELAI = Permet de modifier le DELAI (secondes) d'envoi du signal. Ne s'applique qu'à un seul capteur / déclencheur ou à un autre signal de sortie.

[u]Note :[/u] vous pouvez créer des circuits plus complexes encore en utilisant plusieurs circuits qui seront utilisés en séquence, chacun utilisant en entrée le signal de sortie du précédent, pour avoir en fin de séquence un seul signal de sortie utilisable par un ou plusieurs dispositifs.
Russian:
[b]Примечание: Логические сигналы это расширение механики Сигналов/Сенсоровc, предлагающее новые способы подключения сенсоров и триггеров определенными, более продуманными способами. Нажмите кнопку ЛОГИЧЕСКИЕ СИГНАЛЫ вверху Панели Управления для доступа к ним.[/b]

[i]В: Какова цель схем ЛОГИЧЕСКИХ СИГНАЛОВ?[/i]
О: Они позволяют делать то, что не позволяют стандартные сигналы на основе самих устройств, например, подключать разные датчики к нескольким устройствам.

[i]В: Как я могу это использовать?[/i]
О: Практически так же, как бы вы установили массив с сенсером-триггером.. но с большим количеством параметров/опций/схем, таких как AND, OR, XOR, Inverter, Delay (более спланированно).

[i]В: Как я могу настроить всё это?[/i]
О: Так же, как и выше: установите некоторые сенсоры в вашу структуру. Получите доступ к ним напрямую или через Панель Управления и дайте им уникальное имя сигнала. Затем откройте Логические Сигналы и добавьте новую схему. Выберите сигнал сенсора с левой стороны. Добавьте имя для выходного сигнала с правой стороны. Перейдите к устройствам, которыми вы хотите управлять с помощью схемы и добавьте выходной сигнал к выходу сигнала вашего устройства.

[i]В: Чем отличаются схемы?[/i]
О: AND = Все датчики, добавленные в схему, должны испускать сигнал для того, чтобы схемы отправила сигнал. Пример: если у вас есть две триггерные пластины, индикатор будет гореть только в том случае, если обе пластины одновременно срабатывают (игрок, стоящий на каждой)
OR = Если срабатывает один или несколько добавленных датчиков, сигнал отправляется на устройство. Пример: свет загорается, если вы стоите на одной триггерной пластине, но также сработает при обеих пластинах.
XOR = посылает сигнал только в том случае, если активирован только один из двух подключенных сенсоров. Не срабатывает, если оба сенсора активны. Пример: свет загорается только в том случае, если срабатывает ровно одна пластина. Если сработали обе, сигнал не посылается, и свет не зажигается.
INVERTER = инвертирует сигнал (то есть на выходе сигнал OFF если на входе сигнал ON). Пример: свет выключается, если вы наступаете на триггерную пластину. Также полезно, когда у вас есть два триггера, и вам нужно, чтобы они оба были одинаковыми для прохождения логического элемента AND.
SR-trigger = Использует два сенсера: сенсор А включает и сенсор Б выключает при сигнале.
DELAY = создает простой модификатор задержки для одиночного сигнала. Нажмите на кнопку, чтобы добавить значение (в секундах)

[i]В: Могу ли я объединить сигналы, идущие от контура, и использовать в новой схеме?[/i]
Конечно! Просто используйте имя исходящего сигнала и выберите его для входа. Таким образом, вы можете создавать сложные схемы. Естественно, вы не должны удалять базовую схему для вашей расширенной схемы, иначе это сломает схему.
Chinese (simplified):
[b]注意：信号逻辑电路是信号与触发原理的拓展技术，对于精巧复杂的传感和触发设计方案提供了新的编程途径。点击控制面板上面的“信号逻辑电路（Signal Logic）”按钮进入相应界面[/b]

[i]问：信号逻辑电路有何用途？[/i]
它们能让你实现基于一般设备的信号下拉菜单不能实现的编程，比如把不同的传感器连接到一个设备上。

[i]问：如何使用？[/i]
与你设计一般设备的传感触发程序几乎一样..但有更多的参数/选项/门电路，如“与”、“或”、“异或”、“反相”、“延迟”（还有更多逻辑运算计划加入，汗一下）。

[i]问：如何编程？[/i]
跟上一个实例雷同，在你的建筑里安装一些传感器，给每个传感器的信号都单独命名，然后打开信号逻辑电路界面，添加一个新电路。从左面下拉菜单选择你的信号，给右面输出的信号也命名，然后点选你需要触发的设备，从左面的下拉菜单中选择你刚才电路的输出信号。

[i]问：那些门电路有什么不同？[/i]
与 = 所有输入信号都触发，电路才会产生输出信号。举例：还是刚才实例的设定，假如你有两个触发板，那么灯具只有在两个触发板上同时都有人的情况下才会开启。
或 = 输入信号其中一个触发了，电路就产生输出信号。举例：那两个触发板你可以放在一间房间的两个入口处，无论你从哪里进门灯都会开。
异或 = 仅当两个输入信号中的一个被触发时电路才产生输出信号，如果两个输入信号都被触发，电路倒不会产生输出信号。举例：刚才的灯具只会在一个触发板被触发时开启，如果两个触发板都有人，灯不会开启。
反相 = 颠倒输入信号输出（其实就是非门）。举例：灯具会在你触发一个触发板时开启，否则关闭，如果你中间加了反相电路，那么含义就是灯具在你触发这个触发板时保持关闭，你离开之后会开启。非门一般与其它门电路组合使用。
复位/置位触发器 = 两个传感器组合使用：触发信号时，传感器A和传感器B不同状态，输出信号不同（官方没解释，详情请自己百度）。
延迟 = 当一个信号输入时，输出信号会在一个可设定的延迟时间后发出。

[i]问：电路信号能接新电路么？[/i]
当然，要不你现在用的计算机怎么来的？很简单的就是你把一个电路的输出信号，选择为新电路的输入信号，注意，先前的电路不能删除，否则会出错。
（通篇电路理论，译者没完全按原文翻译，有些是自己的解释，门电路比这游戏复杂，请淡然处之）
Greek:
[b]Σημείωση: Η Λογική Σημάτων είναι μία επέκταση του μηχανισμού Σημάτων/Πεδίων Ενεργοποίησης, η οποία προσφέρει νέους τρόπους, πιο συγκεκριμένους, για να συνδέσεις αισθητήρες κα μοχλούς. Πάτησε το κουμπί ΛΟΓΙΚΗ ΣΗΜΑΤΩΝ στην κορυφή του Πίνακα Ελέγχου για να αποκτήσεις πρόσβαση.[/b]

[i]Ε: Ποιος είναι ο σκοπός των κυκλωμάτων ΛΟΓΙΚΩΝ ΣΗΜΑΤΩΝ;[/i]
Σου επιτρέπουν να κάνεις πράγματα που οι προεπιλεγμένες συσκευές βασιζόμενες στη λίστα σημάτων δεν σε αφήνουν να κάνεις, όπως το να συνδέσεις διαφορετικούς αισθητήρες σε πολλές άλλες συσκευές.

[i]Ε: Πώς το χρησιμοποιώ;[/i]
Σχεδόν με τον ίδιο τρόπο όπως προγραμματίζεις αισθητήρες-μοχλούς...αλλά με περισσότερες παραμέτρους/επιλογές/πύλες, όπως η AND, η OR, η XOR, η Αντιστροφή, η Καθυστέρηση (πιο προγραμματισμένο)

[i]Ε: Πώς μπορώ να το ρυθμίσω;[/i]
Όπως και παραπάνω: Τοποθέτησε μερικούς αισθητήρες στην κατασκευή σου. Απέκτησε πρόσβαση σε αυτές απευθείας ή από τον πίνακα ελέγχου και δώσε τους ένα μοναδικό όνομα. Μετά άνοιξε την ΛΟΓΙΚΗ ΣΗΜΑΤΩΝ, και βάλε ένα νέο κύκλωμα. Επέλεξε τον σήμα αισθητήρα από την αριστερή πλευρά. Βάλε ένα όνομα εξόδου σήματος στη δεξιά πλευρά. Πήγαινε στις συσκευές που θες να διαχειριστείς με αυτό το κύκλωμα και βάλε το σήμα εξόδου στις συσκευές σου από τη λίστα σήματος.

[i]Ε: Ποιες είναι οι διαφορές μεταξύ των πυλών;[/i]
AND = Όλοι οι αισθητήρες που έχουν προστεθεί στο κύκλωμα πρέπει να ενεργοποιηθούν για να σταλθεί το σήμα. Παράδειγμα: Εάν έχεις 2 πλάκες ενεργοποίησης, το φως θα είναι ενεργοποιημένο μόνο αν και οι δύο πλάκες είναι ταυτόχρονα ενεργοποιημένες (ένας παίκτης σε κάθε πλάκα)
OR = Εάν ενεργοποιηθούν ένας ή περισσότεροι από τους προστιθέμενους αισθητήρες, το σήμα αποστέλλεται στη συσκευή. Παράδειγμα: Το φως ανάβει εάν βρίσκεσαι επάνω σε μία πλάκα ενεργοποίησης, αλλά και όταν βρίσκεσαι επάνω και στις δύο πλάκες.
XOR = στέλνει σήμα μόνο αν είναι ενεργοποιημένος ο ένας από τους δύο συνδεδεμένους αισθητήρες. Δεν ενεργοποιείται εάν είναι ενεργοί και οι δύο αισθητήρες. Παράδειγμα: Το φως θα ανάβει μόνο αν ενεργοποιηθεί ακριβώς μία πλάκα. Εάν και οι δύο ενεργοποιούνται, δεν στέλνεται σήμα και το φως παραμένει κλειστό.
 ΑΝΤΙΣΤΡΟΦΗ = Αντιστρέφει το σήμα (για παράδειγμα σε ΚΛΕΙΣΤΟ εάν το σήμα που έχει σταλθεί είναι ΑΝΟΙΧΤΟ). Παράδειγμα: Ένα φως είναι σβηστό όταν στέκεσαι επάνω σε μία πλάκα ενεργοποίησης. Επίσης χρήσιμο όταν έχεις δύο πλάκες ενεργοποίησης και χρειάζεσαι και οι δύο να έχουν ακριβώς την ίδια εντολή για να περάσεις μία πύλη AND.
Μάνταλο Ορισμού/Επαναφοράς = Χρησιμοποιείται για δύο αισθητήρες: ο αισθητήρας Α και ο αισθητήρας Β επανέρχονται σε περίπτωση ενεργοποίησης.
ΚΑΘΥΣΤΕΡΗΣΗ = δημιουργεί μία απλή καθυστέρηση αποστολής ενός σήματος. Κάνε κλικ στο πλαίσιο κουμπιού για να προσθέσεις μια τιμή (δευτερόλεπτα)

[i]Ε: Μπορώ να συνδυάσω τα σήματα που προέρχονται από ένα κύκλωμα και να τα χρησιμοποιήσω σε ένα νέο κύκλωμα;[/i]
Φυσικά! Απλώς χρησιμοποίησε το όνομα εξερχόμενου σήματος και επέλεξέ το για την πλευρά εισόδου. Μπορείς να δημιουργήσετε πολύπλοκα κυκλώματα με αυτόν τον τρόπο. Φυσικά δεν θα πρέπει να διαγράψεις το υποκείμενο κύκλωμα για το ενισχυμένο κύκλωμά σου ή να σπάσεις την σειρά.

English:
The PDA remains one of the most powerful tools in the HWS Universe.

[i]"Hit the [b]F1[/b] key to bring up the PDA.
"[/i]

------------------------

Our goal is to provide you with a compelling story and interesting gameplay as well as complete immersion via the PDA.  The Personal Digital Assistant is not just a story teller or task checker, but an integrated part of HWS gameplay.

Keep your eyes on the PDA and check it often to see newly available missions!



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/1X/043b9d393e93dd4fe579a7a3870267e7a71585e4.jpg]
blob.jpg1157×869 90.6 KB[/url]




[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/1X/102072967e36036a8ea96966c48ba250be18b658.jpg]
blob.jpg1145×874 98.1 KB[/url]

The [b]HWS Marketplace[/b] (Elemental Trading & Black Market) concept was originally developed by HWS and was adopted by Eleon into the official version of Empyrion to some degree.
[b][u]Video Tutorial (new version coming soon)[/u][/b]

[b][u]How does HWS Marketplace work?[/u][/b]

There are 2 important facts about the HWS Marketplace:

  - It can be only used with [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect.php]HWS Connect[/url].
  - It is way more powerful than the ingame Marketplace, which can be seen almost as replaced.

[b][u]Integration[/u][/b]

  - To be able to [b]sell[/b] something [b]for free[/b] you have to go to a HWS Marketplace ZoneYou can sell something outside of the Zone but have to pay a Fee as compromise
  - To be able to [b]buy[/b] something [b]for free[/b] you have to go to a HWS Marketplace Zone. You can buy something outside of the Zone but have to pay a Fee as compromise
  - You can stop your order only if your are in a HWS Marketplace Zone. Even then you have to pay a Fee
  - You can change the price of your order [b]for free[/b] in the HWS Marketplace Zone. if you are outside of it, you have to pay a Fee

[b][u]Fees[/u][/b]

  - You pay 10% credits and 1 HWS RP per item fee to sell your order  [b]outside of the HWS Marketplace Zone[/b]
  - You pay 10% credits fees to stop your order
  - You pay 10% credits fees to change your order [b]outside of the HWS Marketplace Zone[/b]
  - You pay from 1% to 10% credits and 1 HWS RP per 10-100 items fees if you buy something [b]outside of the HWS Marketplace Zone[/b] - dependent from your [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/elemental-bank-eb/4395]Elemental Bank Level[/url]

[b][u]Notes[/u][/b]

  - After you changed the price of your order you have to wait 1 hour before you can stop it

[b][u]Patreon Benefits[/u][/b]

To enhance the experience and convenience we implemented some benefits for HWS Patrons.Dependent on your Patron Tier you can unlock:

  - Stop your order straight back in your OCD instead of your Backpack

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/5/5512e6e0866bcf4e657f1d6baaec30a9be8d2f9d.jpeg]
image.jpg1390×441 41.6 KB[/url]
  - Sell items from your OCD straight to the HWS Marketplace

image.jpg1151×428 32.6 KB[/url]
  - See the HWS Marketplace prices straight in your OCD for your items

[b][u]Where can I use the HWS Marketplace?[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/8/8d82117657baf3ef91091ffbffa01fa080634d49.jpeg]
HWS-Market-Zone.jpg1920×1080 355 KB[/url]


  - ECC Planet > Elemental Galactic Services HQ POI > Market Zone (screenshot above)
  - Starter Systems - HWS Marketplace POI
  - Homeworld System > EGS Star POI > EGS Trading Outpost Zone

[b][u]HWS Sale Discounts[/u][/b]

Prices fluctuate throughout the season, but most sellers do not update their prices accordingly, so we there is an automated sale/discount feature implemented:

The item unit price is dropped

  - by [b]25%[/b] after 15 days

  - by [b]50%[/b] (of the previous value) after 30 days

  - by [b]75%[/b] (of the previous value) after 60 days



These automated discounts ensure that an item for sale increases its bargain value over time.


[b][u]Full wipe disclaimer[/u][/b]

Be sure to get all your items from the EGS Market & Blackmarket before a full wipe.
[b][u]Sell Your Ships[/u][/b]

You can sell your own ships at these locations:

[i]"ECC > EGS HQ > in the Garage Zone (SVs)
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"ECC System > HWS Garage HQ POI (CVs)
"[/i]

------------------------

The process requires that you fly your ship to one of the zones mentioned above, wait for the confirmation / welcome message, and then type [b]ts:sell:xxx[/b] (xxx = amount of credits you are charging for that ship)

  - Ships you sell are not taxed for being in the area

  - If you fly the ship you have available for sale, it remains tracked by the HWS Connect Structure Commander and is therefore still taxed when left on ECC.  Once it is tagged for sale, do not fly it on or off of ECC afterwards.



This topic will contain a table of contents

The [b]Orbital Auto Miner[/b] (OAM) is a HWS developed feature specifically designed to grant end-game players the ability to enjoy late game content by reducing the need to mine for resources and help new players to dive into PvP faster.

The OAM allows players to autonomously mine resources via the HWS website, eliminating the time and effort required to physically mine ores or to place in-game Tier 1-3 Auto Miners.   To begin using HWS OAMs, simply buy or upgrade ([b]am:buy:gold[/b] for example) the various OAMs to the level you want or can afford.  The first level is FREE and it must be fueled with [b]Auto Miner Cores[/b] for it to produce ore.  You can collect OAMs Ores for free at the proper EGS Zone, but a fee is required if you wish to collect Ore when you’re not in an EGS Zone. To collect Ore from the OAMs, use the [b][url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/orbital-auto-miner-commands/19311]AM:Get[/url][/b] commands or just simply use [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect.php]HWS Connect[/url].


[i]"View all commands here: [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]https://cmd.hws.global[/url]
You can also find these commands by checking your PDA (F1 key) > Guide > HWS Commands or type [b]am:?[/b] in faction chat [i](hit comma for faction chat field)[/i] for all available commands.
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]OAM Ore Production[/u][/b]

The following list indicates the ore amount produced per hour at each increasing OAM level.Rare resources give less than common resources.

[b]Common resources:[/b] Iron, Silicon, Copper, Cobalt, Sathium, Promethium
[b]Rare resources:[/b] Gold, Pentaxid, Erestrum, Zascosium, Neodymium, Magnesium

  - Upgrade level 1 - [b]10[/b] ([b]1[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 2 - [b]15[/b] ([b]2[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 3 - [b]20[/b] ([b]3[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 4 - [b]30[/b] ([b]5[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 5 - [b]40[/b] ([b]6[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 6 - [b]50[/b] ([b]8[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 7 - [b]70[/b] ([b]11[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 8 - [b]100[/b] ([b]16[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 9 - [b]150[/b] ([b]25[/b] rare resources) / hour
  - Upgrade level 10 - [b]200[/b] ([b]33[/b] rare resources) / hour

[b][u]OAM Upgrade Cost[/u][/b]

  - Upgrade level 1 - [b]Free[/b]
  - Upgrade level 2 - [b]50k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 3 - [b]100k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 4 - [b]200k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 5 - [b]250k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 6 - [b]300k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 7 - [b]350k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 8 - [b]400k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 9 - [b]450k[/b] CR
  - Upgrade level 10 - [b]500k[/b] CR

[b][u]OAM  Cargo[/u][/b]

The follow list shows you the maximum amount of ore the OAM can store per level:

  - Upgrade level 1 - [b]300[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 2 - [b]600[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 3 - [b]900[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 4 - [b]1200[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 5 - [b]1700[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 6 - [b]2500[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 7 - [b]3500[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 8 - [b]5000[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 9 - [b]7000[/b] Max Ores
  - Upgrade level 10 - [b]10000[/b] Max Ores

The formula to calculate the cost of withdrawing ore if you are [b]not[/b] in an EGS zone is:

  - PvP: [b]5 credits * amount of ore requested[/b]
  - PvE: [b]10 credits * amount of ore requested[/b]

The [b]Orbital Cargo Drone[/b] is an HWS exclusive feature and it is arguably the most useful tool available to players.  With the Orbital Cargo Drone (OCD), a player can store their assets (some restrictions apply) in a virtual Cargo Box accessible via the [b]HWS Connect[/b] interface or ingame commands. Items stored here are safe and they persist through wipes !  [i](*see note at bottom of this section)[/i]

Note: You have to login for HWS Connect to actually update. Otherwise things like Structure Commander might show wrong info.

There are 10 upgrade levels determining the cost of each level, the slot count, and the number of items that can be stored in each slot.See details below.

[b][u]Orbital Cargo Drone Commands[/u][/b]

 |  | 
ocd:? | Provides you with useful information regarding Orbital Cargo Drone. | 
ocd:info | Shows you the current level and slot count of your Orbital Cargo Drone. | 
ocd:upgrade | Allows you to purchase and upgrade OCD. To upgrade a current OCD, simply type the buy command for it again and make sure you have enough credits in your bank account to buy it. | 
ocd:get:SLOT*AMOUNT | Gets a certain amount of that item from the OCD slot. | 
ocd:get:SLOT[i]AMOUNT#SLOT[/i]AMOUNT#SLOT*AMOUNT … or ocd:get:SLOT#SLOT#SLOT … | Gets multiple items / or whole slots out from your OCD at once. Make sure to have enough room in your inventory. (You can combine them) | 
ocd:get:SLOT | Gets all items from that OCD slot. | 
ocd:get:all | Gets all items from the OCD if possible. | 
ocd:trash:SLOT*AMOUNT | Trash a certain amount of that item from the OCD slot. | 
ocd:trash:SLOT[i]AMOUNT#SLOT[/i]AMOUNT#SLOT*AMOUNT … or ocd:get:SLOT#SLOT#SLOT … | Trash multiple items / or whole slots out from your OCD at once. (You can combine them) | 
ocd:trash:SLOT | Trash all items from that OCD slot. | 
ocd:put | Opens a window to interact and put your items to the OCD. | 
ocd:put:HAND-SLOT | Puts all items from your Hand-Slot (1-9) into a free OCD slot. Example: ocd:put:1 for the first slot of your hand. | 
ocd:put:all | Puts all items from your Backpack into free OCD slots. Make sure to wait at least 30 seconds after you placed items into your hand slots! | 
ocd:sort | In case you have some unused slots you can clear the empty space between these slots with this command. | 
ocd:swap:ID-from:ID-to | Swaps two slots in your OCD with the given IDs. | 

[i]"Visit [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]https://cmd.hws.global[/url] or check your PDA > Guide > HWS Commands or type ocd:? for all available commands
"[/i]

"[/i]

HWS has an [b]active Economy[/b] and players are allowed to store their credits independently from the game.  This convenient and valuable feature is called the [b]Elemental Bank[/b].

[b]Credits[/b] are very important because they allow players to purchase increasing levels of HWS features such as the [b]Orbital Cargo Drone[/b], [b]Reputation Points[/b] from EGS,  [b]NoGuilty[/b] status, EGS [b]Recycle Levels[/b], [b]Orbital Autominer[/b] upgrades, [b]HWS Garage ships[/b] and more.

The main branch of the bank is located in the Elemental Capital City ([b]ECC[/b]).   Explore the universe and/or the HWS Guide to learn of other bank branch locations.

[b][u]Elemental Bank Commands[/u][/b]

 |  | 
eb:? | Provides you with useful information regarding the bank and its features. | 
eb:info | Displays your Account #, your credits on hand, and your bank balance. | 
eb:upgrade | Upgrades your Elemental Bank level | 
eb:send | Teaches you how to send credits to other players. (e.g. eb:send:account-nr-of-target:AMOUNT). You / your partner get the account number by typing eb:info in chat. | 
eb:cointocr | Removes your gold coins from your inventory and deposits them directly into your bank account. (5% transaction fee unless you are in the Elemental Bank) | 
eb:payout:X or eb:payout:all | Withdraw credits from your bank account. (5% transaction fee unless you are in the Elemental Bank) | 
eb:payin:X or eb:payin:all | Deposit credits into your bank account. (5% transaction fee unless you are in the Elemental Bank) | 
eb:interest | ONLY available with Elemental Bank level 5. Activates your daily interest for delivery globally. No need to visit EB zones anymore. | 

[i]"Visit [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]https://cmd.hws.global[/url] or check your PDA > Guide > HWS Commands or type eb:? for all available commands
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"Make sure to stay in the Bank Zone for transactions if you don’t have the proper EB Level
"[/i]

------------------------



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/5/55e5c8be3e06b6eb68ff7e4123394fab3c1b7ed0.jpeg]
HWS-Bank-Zone.jpg1920×1080 360 KB[/url]

[b][u]Send credits to other players[/u][/b]

You can instantly transfer Bank credits to other players [b](they must be online)[/b] by using their exact name (case sensitive) or their bank account number. (find this number with the command [b]eb:info[/b])

[b]Examples[/b]
[b]eb:send:12345:4500[/b] = send player with account number 12345 4,500 credits.
[b]eb:send:StarCitizen:4500[/b] would work as well.   ([i]eb:send:starcitizen:4500[/i] would result in an error)

[b][u]Faction Bank[/u][/b]

To enhance the economy also within factions it’s possible for you to store your credits in a “Faction Elemental Bank” - [b]only per season though! (Credits stored in the FEB are wiped after a full wipe)[/b]

The permission system is adapted from the game:

  - Owner & Admins can pay in and out
  - Member can only pay in


Type eb:? In-game for more information.
[b][u]Upgrades[/u][/b]

[i]All fees etc. are meant if you are not in the Bank / Trading Zone[/i]
[b][u]Level 1[/u][/b]

[b]Keep 2,5m credits after a full wipe => Free as default[/b]

  - Interest: [b]10%[/b]
  - Max Interest: [b]250 000 credits[/b]
  - Send money: 10% fee
  - Payin/Payout: 10% fee
  - Usability: visit the Bank zone
  - eb:cointocr: 10% fee
  - eb:ingottocr: 20% fee not in zone / 10% in zone
  - Marketplace Credits: 10% fee (if you buy items from HWS Marketplace not in the trading zone)Marketplace RP: 1RP per 10 item (if you buy items from HWS Marketplace not in the trading zone)

[b][u]Level 2[/u][/b]

[b]Keep 5m => cost 1,7m + 25 RP[/b]

  - Interest: [b]9%[/b]
  - Max Interest: [b]350 000[/b]
  - Send money: 9% fee
  - Payin/Payout: 9% fee
  - Usability: visit the Bank zone
  - eb:cointocr: 9% fee
  - eb:ingottocr: 19% fee not in zone / 9% in zone
  - Marketplace Credits: 9% fee (if you buy items from HWS Marketplace not in the trading zone)Marketplace RP: 1RP per 20 item (if you buy items from HWS Marketplace not in the trading zone)

[b][u]Level 3[/u][/b]

[b]Keep 10m => cost 2,5m + 50 RP[/b]

  - Interest: [b]8%[/b]
  - Max Interest: [b]500 000[/b]
  - Send money: 8% fee
  - Payin/Payout: 8% fee
  - Usability: visit the Bank zone

[i]Q: Is it possible to place blocks as a line or in a larger plane?[/i]\nYES! HOLD the left mouse button to drag a line of blocks. Hold STRG+left mouse button to create a plane area of blocks. Important [c][fdb100]Tip:[-][/c] when creating a plane are, make sure your stand is higher than the area you want to place. This makes it a lot easier to drag the plane from the start- to the end-point without getting in trouble with your view. And: you cannot place an endless line or an endless plane.
Russian:
[i]Q: est-il possible de placer plusieurs blocs en une seule fois ? [/i]
Oui ! il y a 2 méthodes : 
1- maintenez bouton gauche souris pour créer une ligne de blocs.
2- maintenez Ctrl + bouton gauche souris pour créer une surface plane de blocs.

[u]Astuce :[/u] lors de la création d'une surface plane de blocs, assurez-vous d'être plus haut que la zone que vous souhaitez créer, car ce sera plus pratique et vous permettra de mieux exécuter la manip.
,[i]P: É possível montar blocos em uma linha ou numa área maior?[/i]
Sim! Segure BotãoEsq do mouse e arraste uma linha de blocos. Segure Ctrl+BotãoEsq pra criar uma área de blocos plana. Dica Importante: quando estiver criando um plano, tenha certeza de ficar em um nível mais alto do que área a ser preenchida. Isto torna muito mais fácil de arrastar do início ao fim sem atrapalhar sua visão. E ainda: Você não pode criar uma linha ou plano infinito.,[i]В: Возможно ли устанавливать сразу линию или даже плоскость из блоков?[/i]
ДА! ЗАЖМИТЕ левую кнопку мыши, чтобы нарисовать линию из блоков. Зажмите CTRL+ЛКМ, чтобы нарисовать плоскость из блоков. [u]Важный совет[/u]: когда создаете плоскость, удостоверьтесь, что находитесь выше, чем устанавливаемая вами плоскость. Так гораздо легче растянуть плоскость правильно от начала и до конца без каких либо проблем с полем зрения. И: вы не можете установить бесконечную линию или бесконечную плоскость.,,[i]问：柱梁和墙面有没有快捷的建造法？[/i]
有的。在放置方块的时候，按住鼠标左键可以快速拉出一个柱梁，或者按住Ctrl+鼠标左键，斜向可以拉出一面墙或板。专业贴：快捷建造时尽量站高处，把自己的视角调高调远，否则你拉的长度和面积因无法超出视角会中断，用玩家无人机是最方便的。

[b][u]
Tips & Tricks[/u][/b]

  - If you are new to HWS, don’t hesitate to ask questions in chat. You will most likely get an answer from someone in our helpful community. Discord and the HWS Forum are your other options.

  - If you want to restart your character completely, type [b]cb:reset[/b] in chat.  This would be a total wipe of your character. [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/game-wipes/4380]Read here for what is kept and lost[/url].

  - Parking your CV >50km away from the nearest planet in PvP space is [b][i]probably[/i][/b] safe.
Parking near planets in a PvP zone is very dangerous!
Your two other options are to rely on the Offline Protection Device in game OR use the best Offline Protection possible: our [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/egs-stealth/7111]EGS Stealth Feature[/url]

  - It is highly recommended that you have a spare warp sled CV - ready to spawn in your factory at all times! You never know when you need transportation after being stranded in space. Additionally - Don’t forget to plan for fuel and Pentaxid when operating in PvP space!

This notably increases server performance and eliminates problems like playfield bugs.  The restart schedule is the same for all two servers.Just type cb:nextrestart in chat to check the accurate times.

[b][u]My ready-to-spawn blueprint ship/base is gone![/u][/b]

[i]"If you start & finish a blueprint on Computer X and you logout and subsequently play Empyrion on Computer Y, the ship/base spawn will be gone because blueprints are saved locally on the computer where they were created.  Computer Y overwrites the factory contents irreversibly.  We therefore cannot restore locally stored blueprints.
"[/i]

[b][u]My blueprint didn’t spawn.  Its icon is on the map, but it’s invisible!?[/u][/b]

[i]"This happens very rarely.  The ship is likely present, but is not being rendered.   Try relogging.   Try restarting Empyrion.   If these do not work, the scheduled HWS Server restarts will likely eliminate this bug.  [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/blueprint-does-not-spawn-invisible-ship-workaround/4799]Here is a workaround that may help.[/url]
"[/i]

[i]"There are a few reasons why this might happen.  One common cause is that the structures were not touched for 15+ days. [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/game-wipes/4380]Read here to prevent loss of assets.[/url]
"[/i]

This topic will contain a table of contents

To support and manage the [b]monthly server cost of $450[/b], we implemented [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/support-us]Supporter Planets and Supporter Spaces[/url] to provide players with a helpful and meaningful way of saying  [b]“Thank You”[/b].


[b][u]Template[/u][/b]

Supporter Planets & Space playfields have several customizable options:

Players can determine:

  - Planet Appearance
  - Who and what can enter their planet / space playfields
  - Other restrictions such as CV/SV access, what specific players, factions, Origins may & may not enter

[b][u]Example Template for a Planet[/u][/b]

[i]"
  - Name: YourPlanetName
  - Class Size: 2 (2 = max)
  - PvP: No (See options below)
  - Gravity: -5,43
  - Temperature: 5-20°C
  - Biome: Temperate, Desert,…
  - Resources: Iron + Copper
  - POI: Drone Base + Village
  - Plants: Egg, CornDog
  - Animals: Raptors
  - Restricted to: HWS + HWP
  - Weather: Clear + Rain
  - Water Color: Blue
  - Deposit wipe: Yes / No (every Friday 5pm?)
  - Drone Wave Attacks: Yes
  - RP PvE check: yes / no
  - M Description: YourCustomTextGoesHere

"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Example Template for a Space[/u][/b]

[i]"
  - Name: YourSpaceName
  - PvP: No (See options below)
  - Temperature: 5-20°C
  - Asteroid Resources: Iron + Copper
  - POI: Drone Base + Village
  - Restricted to: HWS + HWP
  - RP PvE check: yes / no
  - M Description: YourCustomTextGoesHere

"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Own custom playfield[/u][/b]

Option: [b]Submit your own playfield.yaml[/b] file for review and we will check it and integrate it if approved!  Be sure to read and understand the six playfield types and their accompanying restrictions listed far below.

In general please don’t create an overpowered playfield. That also counts for “decoration” objects like plants (keep it at 0.001 or less).

[i]"Contact [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/rexxxus]@RexXxuS[/url] for further details / info / inquiries
"[/i]

------------------------


[b][u]3 Month Lifespan[/u][/b]

The typical runtime of a Supporter Playfield is 3 months minimum. Regardless of seasons or wipes, [b]we guarantee a 90 day lifespan[/b] of your Supporter Playfield.

A Full Wipe will result in your Supporter Playfield being wiped as well, [b]so try to align the timing of your support with the season cycle to get most out of it.[/b]  If a player acquires a Supporter Planet/Space with only one month remaining in the season, they would still enjoy 2 more months on their Supporter Planet/Space during the next season.

If a player wants to keep their Supporter Playfield after its usual lifespan, they must re-support. HWS needs to plan the next season well in advance, so whether you do or do not plan on keeping your Supporter planet / space, be sure to let [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/rexxxus]@RexXxus[/url]  know your plans for the next season.

[i]Players who wish to support for a playfield to be spawned under special conditions such as obtaining a planet for a period less than 90 days or under other unique conditions, need to discuss their proposal privately with [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/rexxxus]@RexXxus[/url] on a case-by-case basis.[/i]
[b][u]Playfield Guidelines[/u][/b]

  - [b]Stargates / Teleporters are not allowed[/b] unless you have an Event Planet / Event Space playfield or via special request
  - Each faction is allowed a [b]maximum of 1 Planet and / or 1 Space[/b]
  - [b]Supporter Planet / Space for one person[/b] is only possible, if there are enough slots available.
  - You can have a planet inside your own space
  - You can [b]request your own POI[/b] on the Planet / Space or Freighter / AI Vessels in Space if it doesn’t break normal gameplay (e.g. insane loot) - min. reset time is daily.
  - You can choose to have an [b]indestructible surface[/b] on the planet (digging is not possible, but this is good for playfield performance)
  - Plant types, NPCs, and Drones can be requested in [b]moderate quantity[/b]
  - You may [b]request any type of weather, gravity strength, biome type, water color / sea level, etc.[/b]
  - [b]Ingame NPC Trader / Trading Stations / EB or EGS Zones are not allowed[/b] if you have a restricted Planet / Space.  If your planet allows player access, such requests for these types of POIs will be considered.
  - You [b]cannot change your Planet / Space type from unrestricted to restricted or vice versa[/b] during the season to prevent griefing
  - Supporter Playfields are subject to the same [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/game-wipes/4380][b]Wipe[/b] and Decay Times[/url] as all other playfields
  - Structures on restricted Supporter Playfields are [b]not counted towards the global base limit[/b]
  - Class limit for [b]ships is 7, but there is no limit for Bases[/b] restricted Supporter Playfields.  The maximum size for a [b]spawned[/b] base is Class 7.  It can be enlarged beyond Class 7 after it is spawned.
  - If you chose to have an Event Planet or Event Space, please discuss your proposal with [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/rexxxus]@RexXxuS[/url] first.
  - If you select a restricted Supporter  [b]Space[/b] playfield (not Planet), you can [b]request your own Starbase be spawned[/b]. (no Class limit, etc.)
  - If you are [b]guilty[/b] you can’t enter Supporter Playfields
  - [b]Common resources are[/b]: Iron, Copper, Cobalt, Silicon, Promethium, Sathium
  - [b]Rare resources are[/b]: Gold, Magnesium, Erestrum, Zascosium, Pentaxid, Neodymium
  - Asteroids regenerate [b]every 3 hours[/b]
  - [b]Deposits can be reset once a week via a surface wipe[/b].   This means Autominers, Water Generators, etc. will be wiped.


[b][u]Planet / Space Types[/u][/b]
[b][u]1. PvE Restricted (only your faction can enter)[/u][/b]

  - Choose [b]2 common resource types: deposits / or meteorites[/b](maximum ~50k deposit amount & maximum of 3 ore nodes / asteroids per type)

[b]Example 1[/b]: 3 Iron and 3 Sathium each up to 50k ore per deposit
[b]Example 2[/b]: 3 Copper and 3 Cobalt Asteroids in Space*see common and rare types above

  - You can have [b]3 POIs with infinite drone waves[/b] on the Planet / Space. There will be an endless stream of drones attacking player bases providing limited loot.  Structures will need to be protected.  This is optional and  the alternative is [b]NO POI’s[/b].




[b][u]2. PvE unrestricted (every player can enter)[/u][/b]

  - Choose [b]5 common resource deposit / or meteorites types[/b](maximum ~50k deposit amount & maximum 3 ore nodes / asteroids per type)

[b]Example 1[/b]: 3 Iron, 3 Sathium, 3 Copper, 3 Cobalt, 3 Prom each up to 50k ore per deposit
[b]Example 2[/b]: 3 Copper, 3 Cobalt, 3 Prom, 3 Silicon, 3 Iron Asteroids in Space*see common and rare types above

  - Only [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/4-limits-restrictions/4363]Global[/url] limits are active to give everyone a chance to enjoy the playfield.

  - You can have up to [b]7 POIs with infinite drone waves[/b] on the Planet / Space. There will be an endless stream of drones attacking player bases providing limited loot.  Structures will need to be protected.  This is optional and  the alternative is [b]NO POI’s[/b].



[b][u]3. PvP restricted[/u][/b]

  - Choose [b]2 common resource types: deposits / or meteorites[/b](maximum ~50k deposit amount & maximum of 3 ore nodes / asteroids per type)

[b]Example 1[/b]: 3 Iron and 3 Sathium each up to 50k ore per deposit
[b]Example 2[/b]: 3 Copper and 3 Cobalt Asteroids in Space*see common and rare types above

  - You can have up to [b]3 POIs with infinite drone waves[/b] on the Planet / Space. There will be an endless stream of drones attacking player bases providing limited loot.  Structures will need to be protected.  This is optional and  the alternative is [b]NO POI’s[/b].




[b][u]4. PvP unrestricted[/u][/b]

  - [b]Choose up to 7 total common and rare resource types[/b] ([b]all except Gold[/b])(maximum ~50k deposit amount - maximum 3 ore nodes / asteroids per type)

[b]Example 1[/b]: 3 Iron, 3 Pent, 3 Cobalt, 3 Prom, 3 Neo, 3 Eres, 3 Zasc each up to 50k ore per deposit*see common and rare types above

  - Only [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/4-limits-restrictions/4363]Global[/url] limits are active to give everyone a chance to enjoy the playfield.

The spirit of supporting is to help with server costs and thereby enhance gameplay for all players. HWS is intent on [b]not being[/b] a ‘pay-to-win’ server.   Therefore, the owner/admins will ensure that the current meta fits this goal and they reserve the right to adjust support packages if necessary.

[i][b]Thank you so much for supporting us.  It is truly appreciated[/b]![/i]

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents[b][u]How it works[/u][/b]
[b][u]Becoming Guilty[/u][/b]

With Season One, the possibility of being labeled ‘Guilty’ introduced a whole new dimension of gameplay and it’s a feature found only on HWS !  There are now undesirable consequences and conditions for players who (role)play the evil & chaotic side.   Both law-abiding and lawless playstyles are valid choices that make gameplay much more enjoyable for all involved.  When villains are caught committing crimes or acting in a vile manner, they will be labeled ‘Guilty’. Once a player is deemed ‘Guilty’, their name will be broadcasted to the Hunter Board for all to see – EVEN IF THEY LOG OUT.  If the posted bounty is high enough, the Guilty player’s [b]estimated coordinates[/b] will be posted !

Players can earn fame and fortune by hunting those on the Hunter Board.  Different origins gain various benefits & take different penalties for hunting / being hunted, but one thing is certain: It’s a bounty hunter’s [b]Dream[/b] out there.

Check the [b][url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/story]different Origins[/url][/b] for details regarding punishments and rewards for ‘Flying the Guilty Flag’.
[b][u]General Info[/u][/b]

  - Players can be rewarded up to 10 times per day for guilty kills.  (limit prevents exploits)
  - Players MUST have the proper Origin Epic / Enhanced Weapon in their inventories to gain RP.
  - The Hunter Board is visible only on HWS Connect and it gets updated every minute
  - The coordinates on the website are somewhat randomized:  They vary a maximum of 3000 meters in space and 1000 meters on a planet.
  - Only if the victim was guilty and had a 10 million bounty on his head he will lose his guilt on death
  - Structures which are not controlled/piloted by you or your passengers do not trigger the RP / Guilty system. (manual fire only)
  - You can kill the same guilty guy repeatedly, but you are limited to one RP bonus per day for that kill (prevents family farming)
  - If you are guilty you can’t enter PvE playfields (Supporter playfields included)
  - Lose 5 RP as soon as you become guilty

[b][u][019245]EGS - Not Guilty[-][/u][/b]

[i]"Visit [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]https://cmd.hws.global[/url] or check your PDA > Guide > HWS Commands or type egs:? for all available commands
"[/i]

------------------------

Yes, EGS offers private… [b][i]services[/i][/b] for the shady types who’d like their records to be altered - because who here has never committed any crimes?

Becoming guilty can be a drag.  It is tattooed to your forehead and follows you around everywhere!  Why not just [b]buy your way out of it[/b]?

Using the [ff6600][b]EGS:NOGuilty[/b][-] command, you can have a clean record and be ready to hit the streets and space routes once again without those pesky hunters on your back.

Your Guilty status is removed if you die at the hands of Bounty Hunters or you can just buy yourself NotGuilty.  We won’t call it a bribe.   Bribe is such an ugly word.  [b](suicide or cb:reset won’t help)[/b]

[i]"[b]egs:noguilty[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

Buying your way out of trouble costs both credits and RP.   [b]Note:[/b] The more often you use the command, the more expensive it gets! So consider your options and credit balance carefully before purchasing your innocence.

First Usage Cost:  100,000 credits and 1 RP
Second Usage Cost: 200,000 credits and 2 RP
Third usage it costs: 300,000 credits and 3 RPand so on…

This climbing expense resets when a new season starts.
[b][u][b]General Info[/b][/u][/b]

  - You can use the command from anywhere
  - After you purchase NoGuilty,  please allow for [b]up to[/b] 1 minute for your name to be removed from the Hunter Board. It is [b]not[/b] instantly removed from HWS Connect.

With the release of Alpha 7.5 we are now able to adjust properties for almost everything in the game by ourselves. Player joining on HWS are playing with our [b]HWS Config[/b] and a [b]completely different gaming experience[/b].

It allows us to change some game aspects such as damage, hitpoints, rate of fire and more to fit better into the Multiplayer purpose than it was before.For a rough overview please watch our Teaser for HWS 7.X and check this topic frequently out for changelogs about our config.


[b][u]HWS Config overview[/u][/b]

Main things about the [b]HWS Config[/b] are

  - Improving PvP by taking performance, damage and armor into account

  - Make each weapon effective against other weapons or components or blocks

  - Make Aliens more of a threat in MP and giving them even in end game a meaning

  - Creating different new aspects for PvE regarding enforcing POI raids to get Epic weapons etc.

  - Convenience changes such as faster Drill, Multi Tool, higher stack sizes, etc.


[b][u]Reworked Shield[/u][/b]

  - Shields work on HWS differently than in vanilla or other servers. Our goal is to provide the best experience for new players and veterans. The baseline is that the shield on HWS is powerful and very helpful for quick banter / POI fly-by actions.But if you are involved in a longer and bigger battle, you need to think carefully about tactics and overall shield management.

[b][u]ShieldPerCrystal[/u][/b]

  - SV = 10000 = 200 Pentaxid in total
  - HV = 13333 = 300 Pentaxid in total
  - BA = 37500 = 400 Pentaxid in total
  - BAT2 = 60000 = 50 Pentaxid in total
  - CV = 41666 = 600 Pentaxid in total
  - CVT2 = 71429 = 700 Pentaxid in total


===
[b][u]Shield Capacity[/u][/b]

  - SV = 2m
  - HV = 4m
  - BA = 15m
  - BAT2 = 30m
  - CV = 25m
  - CVT2 = 50m


===
[b][u]Recharge back to 100%[/u][/b]

  - BAT2 = 10 seconds
  - BA = 20 seconds
  - CVT2 = 30 seconds
  - CV = 40 seconds
  - HV = 50 seconds
  - SV = 60 seconds


===
[b][u]Cooldown[/u][/b]

  - 10 seconds cooldown for BAT2
  - 20 seconds cooldown for BA
  - 30 seconds cooldown for CVT2
  - 40 seconds cooldown for CV
  - 50 seconds cooldown for HV
  - 60 seconds cooldown for SV

[b][u]Effectiveness Weapon System (EWS)[/u][/b]

To implement a popular and successful concept into Empyrion “rock-scissor-paper”, I’ve reworked the HWS Config completely regarding it. Check this sheet regular out to see what weapon is good against which material:
        [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uxoPbrFKitNpAbOTHwXrMG4Ms1bHQsd1jzPt1v40kzw/edit?usp=sharing]docs.google.com[/url]        [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uxoPbrFKitNpAbOTHwXrMG4Ms1bHQsd1jzPt1v40kzw/edit?usp=sharing][/url][b][u][url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uxoPbrFKitNpAbOTHwXrMG4Ms1bHQsd1jzPt1v40kzw/edit?usp=sharing]HWS Config | Effectiveness Weapon System (EWS)[/url][/u][/b]

EWS AllType Gun / Weapon Name,Head,Body,Alien,Shield,Metal,Metal Light,Metal Hard,Plastic,Hull,Hull Armored,Hull Combat,Concrete / Concrete Armored,Wood,Stone/Rocks,Terrain,EWS Info - Latest Changelog: SV Gatling Gun,Very Effective,Very...
    
  
[b][u]Effectiveness Factor[/u][/b]

  - Not Effective = Factor 0.1*
  - Base Damage = Factor 1*
  - Effective = Factor 5*
  - Effective = Factor 10*
  - Ultra Effective = Factor 100*


[i]"Keep in mind that the “Damage” you see by weapons while hovering with your mouse over it, is [b]not the real damage[/b]! That numbers is roughly devided internally by 15 and on top of that multipliers are applied.
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Intellectual Property[/u][/b]

The work [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/a.f.t]@A.F.T[/url] and I put into the HWS Config are already [b]over 1000 hours[/b]. It is very specialized for and to HWS and changes are made with feedback of the community to create the [b]best Empyrion MP experience possible[/b] [i](because the default Config was made with SP mainly in mind)[/i]

That is the reason we only share the Config with active and trusted players on HWS and only via a PM request to [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/rexxxus]@RexXxuS[/url]. He will come back to you after an indefinite time.

[i]"If we see someone shares our hard work without our permission to others he / she is [b]permanently banned[/b]!
"[/i]

------------------------

------------------------
[i][i]Initial changelog[/i]
[b]The main changes:[/b]

  - Overal rebalance of the weapons	urrets, rate of fire (ROF), damage, blast damage (AOE), shells\projectiles speed, hitpoints (HP) of the: devices, weapons, turrets - to reduce lags and makes fights more hot.  Some weapons have new homing ability.

  - Bases (BA) - more HP for turrets and more damage from it. Rebalance of the turrets purpose. Overal turrets range raised. Changed all projectiles weapons (PRW) purpose.

  - Capital vessel (CV) - more HP for turrets and more damage from it. Rebalance of the turrets purpose. Overal turrets range raised.

  - Small vessel (SV) - overal rebalance of all weapons. Every weapons have strong and weak sides. All weapons have the different: damage, range, ROF, weight, energy consumption, HP. All weapons can shoot and hit the targets in the space.

  - Hover vessel (HV) - overal rebalance of all turrets. More HP, damage for plasma and artillery. Changed range, speed, ROF.



[b]Detailed information:[/b]  (will be filled for some time)

Overal HP for all turrets\weapon\devices, damage was raised at least to 200%. ROF was reduced from 80 to 150%. The main devices have more tight materials to prevent logshoots from AOE damage.

[b]1. Changes for BA.[/b]

[b]Raised HP for:[/b] Turrets, fuel tank, generators, o2 tank, ammo box, cargo box, advanced constructor, shutter doors, hangar gates, core, concrete armored blocks.

[b]Artillery turret[/b] - [b]reduced[/b] ROF,  damage and AOE damage to players [b](to match to raised damage)[/b]. [b]raised:[/b] HP, damage, AOE damage, AOE range, damage to armored hull blocks, rotation speed, max count, shell speed. Add homing ability. Artillery it is high range main defence turret with most HP.

[b]Plasma turret[/b] - [b]reduced:[/b] ROF, reloading time, damage and AOE damage to players. [b]raised:[/b] HP, damage, AOE damage, damage to armored hull blocks, rotation speed, plasma ball speed. Plasma it is high range turret against heavy armored target with big blast damage to all types of armored hull blocks.

[b]Rocket turret[/b] - [b]reduced:[/b] ROF, reloading time, damage and AOE damage to players. [b]raised:[/b] HP, damage, AOE damage, damage to armored hull blocks, rotation speed, rocket speed, range. Rocket it is high range turret against all types of the maneurabile targets.

[b]Flak turret[/b] - [b]reduced:[/b] ROF, reloading time, damage and AOE damage to players. [b]raised:[/b] HP, damage, AOE damage, rotation speed, shell speed, range. Adds some homing ability to hit a low speed targets. Flaks it is a very high range main anti-air defence turret against small targets like SV or HV.

[b]Pulse laser turret[/b] - [b]reduced:[/b] ROF, reloading time, damage to players. [b]raised:[/b] HP, damage, rotation speed, range. Pulse lasers it is a very high range anti-air defence turret against small fast targets with insta hit.

In response to community requests, HWS has implemented Single player and Co-op opportunities for our multiplayer server.  Our specific approach to this goal:  [b]Missions![/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/b/b7fa5f8c73682ea3d879c90657f2bee8cb5b89ad.jpeg]
HWS-Stargate-Missions.jpg1879×1057 626 KB[/url]


[i]"Missions are described by Stargate panels which indicate how many people or what Origin can enter to attempt these missions. Each Mission has a time limit and some have special conditions which apply.   Some examples are: “[i]No blueprint spawn allowed[/i]” or “[i]Lose your entire inventory if you fail to find the final Stargate[/i]”.
"[/i]

------------------------

Every Mission is different. Some are supported by the PDA (F1), telling you exactly what is required and what the mission reward is. Some missions are open-ended, allowing you to complete it by any means necessary.

Currently there are over 10 of these Missions spread throughout the HWS Universe, and with every new Season there may well be more added.

[i]"No commands needed anymore! It’s fully integrated in HWS Connect now. Read the announcement about it here:
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/huge-hws-patch-hws-marketplace-v5-gameplay-changes-part-3/20246]Huge HWS Patch | HWS Marketplace v5 | Gameplay Changes Part 3[/url]
"[/i]

------------------------

Chat Command | Description | 
ti:? | Provides you with useful information regarding trading items. | 
ti:sell:HAND-SLOT(1-9):PRICE | Let you sell your item at the given HAND-SLOT (1-9) for a given PRICE. Example: ti:sell:7:100 would sell your item in your 7th hand slot for a price of 100 credits. | 
ti:sellall:HAND-SLOT:PRICE | Let you sell all items of your given HAND-SLOT (1-9) for a given PRICE. Example: ti:sellall:7:100 would sell your item in your 7th hand slot for a price of 100 credits and every item of the same type in your backpack. | 
ti:buy:ID:AMOUNT | Allows you to buy the items with the given ID and the AMOUNT you want | 
ti:list | Display you the items which are on sale. | 
ti:edit:ID:PRICE | Change the price of your trade with the given ID and the new PRICE. Only works in the trading zone. | 
ti:stop:ID | If you are in the Marketplace you can stop your order with this command. E.g. ti:stop:3. It will cost you 10% credits per item. | 
ti:stopocd:ID | If you are in the Marketplace you can stop your order with this command and send them back to your OCD instead of your backpack. Only available for HWS Patrons. It will cost you 10% credits per item. |

[b][u]Introduction[/u][/b]

HWS Traders are available via [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/support-us]a support package[/url] and grant players a solid income by selling server-provided items to other players.

Players wishing to purchase HWS Trader packages will use [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect]HWS Connect[/url] where package contents and price info is available.
[b][u]How it works for the Seller[/u][/b]
[b][u]Step 1 - Check HWS Connect[/u][/b]

After you purchased the HWS Trader package, go to “Your HWS Trader” in HWS Connect

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/8/836e7d076c3c2dfc4ea5f4adf76b9dc83c65ade2.png]
image.png1158×236 30.1 KB[/url]

[b][u]Step 2 - Rename your HWS Trader[/u][/b]


[b][u]Step 3 - Add items to your HWS Trader[/u][/b]




[b][u]Step 4 - Submit your HWS Trader[/u][/b]



The price for Credits and RP as well as the quantity is calculated automatically and can’t be changed. Max. 49 slots is a fixed value as well.
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/rexxxus]@RexXxuS[/url] just have to approve your package and all is done.In case your HWS Trader got rejected you will see a message:


[i][i]Content Package Details[/i][b][u]Package Credit Prices[/u][/b]

After your package content is set, the “Server” calculating the price, other players have to pay for it. Each category has a different price.
[b][u]Weapons & Ammo[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]200,000[-][/b] credits per slot (previous season stack sizes, see other packages for reference - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - Epic Weapons
     - Booster
     - Armor
     - See [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Trading Commodity[/url]



[b][u]Building Blocks[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]20,000[-][/b] credits per slot (1000 stack sizes - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - Xeno / Alien Blocks
     - Carbon Blocks (S + L)



[b][u]Components & Items[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]50,000[-][/b] credits per slot (1000 stack sizes - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - Money Cards
     - Gold Coins
     - Gold Ore
     - Gold Ingot
     - Auto Miner Cores
     - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Every Trading Commodity[/url] (Diamond, Stone Statues, Auto Mining Device, etc.)



[b][u]Devices[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]100,000[-][/b] credits per slot  (1000 stack sizes - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - Alien Devices (Alien Core, Spawner, Turret, etc.)
     - Explosive Blocks
     - Stargates (Portal, Teleporter, etc.)
     - See [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Trading Commodity[/url]



[b][u]Decoration Blocks[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]20,000[-][/b] credits per slot  (1000 stack sizes - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - See [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Trading Commodity[/url]



[b][u]Medicine[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]60,000[-][/b] credits per slot (previous season stack sizes, see other packages for reference - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - See [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Trading Commodity[/url]



[b][u]Farming[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]60,000[-][/b] credits per slot (previous season stack sizes, see other packages for reference - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - See [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Trading Commodity[/url]



[b][u]Food[/u][/b]

  - Base Price: [b][fdb100]60,000[-][/b] credits per slot (previous season stack sizes, see other packages for reference - will be reworked next)
  - Not for sale:     - See [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Trading Commodity[/url]



[b][u]Package HWS Reputation Point Prices[/u][/b]

Each slot in your offered package costs the Buyer 1 RP.
[b][u]Example[/u][/b]

  - 10 Iron Ore slots (50000 * 10) would cost the Buyer 10 RP.

[/i][b][u]How it works for the Buyer[/u][/b]

  - Buyers spend credits and RP to buy HWS Trader packages

  - Buyers will use [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect.html]HWS Connect[/url] to purchase the packages with just a button click. Packages will be instantly delivered if he is in PvE or in a trading zone, but the Buyer must be online / ingame to accept delivery.

  - Read the different [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-story]Origin[/url] descriptions to find out how many packages your Origin (you) can buy per day.


[b][u]Additional Information[/u][/b]

  - The package can only be bought in a trading zone or [b]globally in PvE[/b]

  - Whenever a package is bought, the Seller get [b]50%[/b] of the full price.

  - The HWS Trader will be active and available as long as [b]the Seller[/b] is active (played the last 7 days). [i][b]This applies only to the Server where you have a HWS Trader![/b][/i]

  - The Seller [b]can’t buy[/b] his own packages

  - Depending on the game updates or economy, the prices may change

  - The Seller [b]can[/b] change his package content once per week - [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-npc-trader/4396#step-4-submit-your-npc-trader]just resubmit your HWS Trader in HWS Connect[/url]

  - A Maximum of 4 HWS Trader supporter packages per server, per player, is available for purchase.

  - [url=https://patreon.com/hws]HWS Patrons have the benefit[/url] to get their HWS Traders listed above Non-Patrons. They are marked green in the list then.

HWS Garage is a very unique way of getting extremely special ships and is only available in certain locations and for some serious credits. These are ships you probably cannot find ANYWHERE else in the universe, and are coveted for their special abilities.Most of them have Alien NPC Cores, CV components in SVs or a SV with HV Drills for example.

HWS Garage now offers 2 ranges; our legacy range and running along side it our new DX Space-Craft range aimed at the more fashion conscious player.


[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-garage-ships/4642][/url]

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-garage-ships/4642][] See all available HWS Garage ships here[-]  [/url]

[b][u]How does it work[/u][/b]

As soon as you enter the HWS Garage zone you can buy a ship you want.

[i]"Visit [url=https://cmd.hws.global/]https://cmd.hws.global[/url] or check your PDA > Guide > HWS Commands or type [fdb100][b]ts:?[/b][-] for all available commands
"[/i]

------------------------

  - The ship credit price can be seen also in HWS Connect > HWS Garage
  - It cost you as many RP as you bought one ship already * 10
[i]Example:[/i] you bought the V-Wing 2 times and want to buy it a third time - this would cost you credits + 30 RP
  - Each faction can sell 1 ship per Garage Zone


[i]"[b][u][fdb100] [b]IMPORTANT![/b][-]: before you type cb:yes to buy a ship make [b]ABSOLUTELY[/b] sure you are buying the correct one. Watch the chat [b]VERY[/b] closely! Once bought, the ship needs to be moved [b]IMMEDIATELY[/b] out of the purchasing zone otherwise it will be overwritten when the replacement spawns.[/u][/b]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Locations[/u][/b]

  - The HWS Garage is currently located on the ECC planet and in space. You can reach the two locations also via a Teleporter in the EGS HQ  > HWS Garage room. On ECC planet, you can find Hover Vessels and Small Vessels. In space you can find CV’s.

  - In the HWS Garage HQ all HWS Garage Ships are free to enter. (Please make sure, that you remove the public 0000 - Code of all doors, ramps, shutter doors and hangar doors after your purchase.)


[b][u]Warranty[/u][/b]

Although you may modify your garage ship, HWS will no longer support that ship once altered from its original design.Any damaged components, intentional or by accident can’t be restored or refunded as well.

[ff0000][b][/b][-]

[ff0000][b]NO REFUNDS - NO RETURNS.[/b][-]


However with the Repair Bay + Console you can repair your HWS Garage ship to a certain degree.Keep in mind that everything which is over the limit (e.g. drills) are only restored to the server limits.



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/3/3c17461903d483385f70c6990a7a2257a8e6fe39.JPG]
HWS Garage Repair Bay.JPG1549×826 198 KB[/url]


------------------------
[b][u]HWS Garage ship submission[/u][/b]

[i]"[]     Closed     [-]
[]     Closed     [-]
[]     Closed     [-]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Initiative[/u][/b]

As you can hopefully read from above, the submission is officially closed. [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/ju]@Ju[/url] is busy with building POIs and making PDA missions for HWS. But if you think, you have a better ship than you can actually find in the garage, you can still try and submit… if you dare.If you have an awesome ship, that you want to share with the HWS Community there are some strict guidelines.

  - Your structure has to enrich the actual HWS Garage. It should be better than one actual ship, because we have limited places for all Garage Ships. One actual Ship has to go, when a new one joins.

  - Structures that were build in less than ~30 hours will not make it to the garage.

  - Appealing design with at least one of the following attributes: [FF7800]extra ordinary[-], [2DACBD]unique[-], [36E482]futuristic[-], [E2AF02]aesthetic[-], [7278FF]convenient[-], [D02E61]smart[-]

  - The usability of the rooms and the technology should also be practically designed

  - Build a comfortable entrance into the ship

  - Your structure needs to have [b]“exposed thrusters”[/b] (thrusters which have no blocks behind them).Only one layer of:
     - vertical shutter window (transparent ! )
     - or slope shutter window (transparent ! )
     - or Vent (Deco)
     - or SVDecoVent02
behind them is allowed to build.
No other blocks and blockshapes are allowed. Even no thin blocks or rounded edges. The whole way till the end of your ship shape: please build no obstacles. Please build tunnels, if your thruster is in the very middle of your ship. Thrusters have to be visible even from the very far away. Tunnels have to be as wide as the thruster itself is. See some images at this post: [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/giant-great-hws-garage-ship-contest/18785/15]🏆 Giant Great HWS Garage Ship Contest 🚀[/url]


  - Built-in Polarized Hull Shield with pentaxid tank

  - Build on category: Miner, Utility, Explorer, Fighter or Tank: [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-garage/4643#categories]HWS Garage[/url]

  - Built to fit limits: Drills, Weapons, Devices, Materials have specific limits per ship type: [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/4-limits-restrictions/4363#3-weapon-limits]4. Limits & Restrictions[/url]

  - Your structure needs to have [b]Controller + Extension Container[/b] to meet the Mass & Volume standards. Make sure the ship is still flying when it’s loaded. (SV ➝ minimum 5 Stacks 50000 Gold Ingots, CV ➝ minimum 20 Stacks 50000 Gold Ingots as measurement - except fighters and tanks)



  - Signal logic available: Levers and sensors facilitate the handling of the ship
  - If the Thrusters dazzle, please cover them with blocks on the sides and shutter windows or SV DecoVents on the back.
  - Connect constructors, deconstructors, furnaces, food processors with cargo boxes or container controllers
  - Install Landing Gears
  - Sign boxes, preferably with text.


Additional Rules:
!! When submitting a blueprint, you agree not to upload the ship in the steam workshop!!! This is very important, because the HWS garage ships are custom-made for the server and should remain so.

!! In addition, it is forbidden to take ships from the steam workshop or other players to use them for the HWS Garage.!! The ship must have been built by yourself.

 The Reward:
If your ship is successfully integrated in the HWS Garage, you get a copy of this ship for free. Just buy it in the garage, let [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/ju]@Ju[/url] know and she will give you the credits back.

If you still have questions or want to submit your perfect designed ship, please contact [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/ju]@Ju[/url].
[b][u]Categories[/u][/b]
[b][u]Miner[/u][/b]

([b]Federation get 10% discount[/b])Only these extra ordinary items are allowed in that Category:

  - Drill Turrets and Multiturrets from other ship type
  - max. 10 Harvester Modules (on SV/CV)
  - HV ➝ a maximum of [fdb100]16[-] Drills in total, max. [fdb100]2[-] Tool Turrets
  - SV ➝ a maximum of [fdb100]10[-] Drills in total, max. [fdb100]2[-] HV or 8 CV Tool Turrets
  - CV ➝ a maximum of [fdb100]16[-] Drills in total, max. 8 Tool Turrets
  - Furnaces

[b][u]Utility[/u][/b]

([b]Federation get 10% discount[/b])Only these extra ordinary items are allowed in that Category:

  - Multiturrets from other ship type
  - Constructors
  - Deconstructors
  - Furnaces
  - Plants

[b][u]Explorer[/u][/b]

([b]Freelancer get 10% discount[/b])Only these extra ordinary items are allowed in that Category:

  - Drill Turrets and Multiturrets from other ship type
  - max. 6 Harvester Modules (on SV/CV)
  - max. 6 overlimit Drills (HV=[fdb100]12[-] in total, SV=[fdb100]6[-] in total, CV=[fdb100]12[-] in total)
  - max. 2 Constructor
  - max. 1 Deconstructor
  - max. 1 Furnace
  - max. 18 Plants
  - [fdb100]max. 2 overlimit Weapons in total (also from other ship type allowed)[-]

[b][u]Tank (Only HVs)[/u][/b]

([b]Outcast get 10% discount[/b])Only these extra ordinary items are allowed in that Category:

  - Weapons from other ship type
  - Armored Concrete allowed(we recommend to only build the shell with armored concrete, so that the tank does not get too heavy)

[b][u]Fighter[/u][/b]

([b]Outcast get 10% discount[/b])Only these extra ordinary items are allowed in that Category:

  - Weapons from other ship type
  - +2 overlimit Weapons per Weapon Type


Additionally in every Category the ‘for free’ devices are allowed too (see price list below).
Beside these extra ordinary items, every ship can have all items, that are normally allowed on the given ship type (HV,SV or CV items).
[fdb100]Please place at total maximum 22 Weapons, because over this limit the weapons won’t work reliably.[-]
[b][u] HWS Patron Discount[/u][/b]

If you are HWS Patron you get 1%, 3%, 5%, 7% or 30% discount depending on your [url=https://patreon.com/hws]Patron level[/url] on top of your Origin discount.

I’ve made a small spreadsheets for HWS which you can use to find out pretty much anything about your economy. I use it myself and thought, a lot of others might too.
[b][u]–Soon!–[/u][/b]

[b]Economy Utility Tool 2.0![/b] (W.I.P)

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/c/c19c82234fb1dc87b6f47499dc22d298dc0457a9.png]
image.png1917×924 27.4 KB[/url]

[b][u]Changelog[/u][/b]
[i][i]Changes (Version: 1.05)[/i]
  - Fixed: [b]Daily Interest:[/b] Part was showing wrong values.
  - Fixed: Big mistake from my side. Needed for more interest, when upgrading EB values were wrong. Since nobody reported it, and i didn’t notice it took me long to fix.
  - Removed NA part, and renamed the pages Calculator, and Values. It’s too difficult for me to have 2 servers in one sheet. If you want this, you can just download 2 tools, and have one for EU and one for NA.
  - Fixed issue with people not having access to some values which i hid away.

[/i]
[b][u]How to Download[/u][/b]

[b]1.[/b] Go to [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SixxX92kXlqIqieBB-dC7jY5zVDnpNjYn0QaaJfZ__8/edit?usp=sharing]this Spreadsheet[/url]
[b]2.[/b] Go to the top left corner, and press Files - Download As - and then whatever extension you like. I’d suggest .xml which is Excel. I suggest you use Google Drive, as that was what this tool was made for, and you might experienced more bugs outside Google Drive.
[b]3.[/b] Now you’ve just gotta export it somewhere. If you downloaded as .xml you can either use Excel, or upload it to Google Drive.
[b]4.[/b] Now you  have it installed, but it’ll give you a bunch of errors. To make it work, you need to go to file -> options -> formulas -> check enable iterative calculation --> maximum iterations 10 , maximum change 1If that doesn’t work, try editing one field. That should make the sheets recalculate stuff, so it’ll work.
[b][u]How to use it[/u][/b]

[b]1.[/b] If you want 70% of it to work, you’ve just got to fill 3 cells. [b]Current credits[/b], [b]EB Level[/b], [b]Reputation/RP[/b]. These are the 3 things you need, for most things to work. When you’ve filled those 3 things, you can see on the right, how much cash you will have in the future, how much you’ll earn and Much more!

Else than that everything should be pretty self explaining. Though if you have any questions feel free to ask.
[b][u]Screenshots[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/4/4c55aab70a2cfa541a9ca75ea667b007fc5ba9ad.png]
Screenshot (233).png1826×675 79.5 KB[/url] 
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/0/0f2220f241f3fd36ca318c3795a9e263d1ccf946.png]
Screenshot (234).png1840×771 68 KB[/url]

[b][u]Explanation[/u][/b]

Some things might be a little difficult to understand, so if you have issues please read everything below.
[b][u]Goals:[/u][/b]

Goals are really advanced, and if you look on the screenshots it says that " Item 1 " is my goal, and costs 30 million, but goal is 55? This is because the Economy Utility Tool, want’s you to stay at Max interest which is 25mil for EB lvl 5. Also if you have no goal, please write “None” in the box, since it will say Error overwise.
[b][u]Yellow Cells:[/u][/b]

These are the only once you can, or is allowed to edit. If you edit anything besides yellow cells, you risk breaking a lot of stuff, since most depends on other values.
[b][u]Current Credits:[/u][/b]

Sadly you can’t copy your credits directly from HWS Connect to the Economy Utility Tool. If you do you’ll get a number like this " 50 000 000 ". The spreadsheets doesn’t understand the space’es so you’ll have to edit it to “50000000”

[i]If you have Anymore questions feel free to ask [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/dr.dark]@Dr.Dark[/url].  Also if you have a suggestion, tell me, and i’ll consider implementing it.[/i]
Make use of the Food Processor.

Every Origin can activate the special ability [b]Global Scan[/b]
[b][u]Usage[/u][/b]

Type in chat [b][fdb100]fa:scan[-][/b] to toggle the scan on or off
[b][u]Cost[/u][/b]

  - [b]Consumes 15 RP per day[/b] if activated
  - [b]Consumes 10 RP instantly[/b] when activated / toggled on

[b][u]Additional Info[/u][/b]

  - Can be activated as soon as you have 25 RP
  - Helps find people in the universe by indicating whether a structure is located on the playfield in question (via HWS Connect > HWS Universe)
  - Allows players to view the amount of cores / blocks / devices on every playfield
  - Without global scan, players see only [b]???[/b] on the HWS Universe page in HWS Connect
