[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
[b]The Pentaxid Freighter Heist[/b]
[c][fdb100][b][/b][-][/c]We can't tolerate those nasty buggers, working for Mercenaries! Bring back OUR loot, before it gets traded by ridiculous prices in the market!
Your job is to infiltrate that Freighter, steal all the Ores with a Drill to not detect any Cargo Box Security System and return to the Trader.
Be warned! Traitors and Mercenaries might have captured the Freighter already!

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
HWS Racom - Saon + Unknown Orbit

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
You have only 10 minutes before reinforcement is called. Make sure you have the best Drill equipped and are prepared for any conflict!

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 720m cooldown + 1m delay per success
Russian:
[b][ff0000]!!! Внимание РvP ! Очень Опасно !!![-][/b]

[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
Мы не можем терпеть этих мерзких мерзавцев, работающих на наёмников! Верните нашу добычу, прежде чем она будет продана по смешным ценам на рынке!
Ваша задача состоит в том, чтобы проникнуть в это грузовое судно, украсть все руды с помощью Бура, чтобы вас не обнаружила система безопасности грузового судна и вернуться к торговцу.
Будьте осторожны! Предатели и наемники уже могли захватить корабль!

[b][fdb100]Место[-][/b]
HWS Racom - Система Triton + Неизвестная орбита

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
У вас есть всего 10 минут до вызова подкрепления. Убедитесь, что у вас есть лучший Бур и вы готовы к любому конфликту!

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Да, Бесконечно раз, 720 мин. задержка + 1 мин. пауза за успех

English:
In a game where survival is a factor, Death must deliver a respectable sting.

  - [b]You lose 1 HWS RP per death[/b]
[i](You lose HWS RP only if you are not on a Starter Planet and are Level 25)[/i]

  - Upon death, please be aware that your backpack may drop in a dangerous area.  If this is the case, try to recover it with your Drone (F5). The removal time for a player’s backpack is currently 15 minutes.  Being that this is an alpha game and glitches are always a possibility, you are [b]highly[/b] encouraged to retrieve your backpack as soon as possible!

  - Fewer deaths also mean you might have a chance to get on the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/kill-board/11552]Kill Board[/url]. All PvP deaths are counted, and the more kills and less deaths you have, the higher K-D rate you’ll have.

  - If you die and clicked “Fresh Start” by accident we offer you a friendly feature:

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/f/fb4859ac8057098c8d447b2d2018da7f5694e809.jpeg]
image.jpg1249×271 36.5 KB[/url]
Find the HWS Racom station and enter the Stargate.

On HWS, there are structure limits and restrictions to improve gameplay and server performance.

Limits without enforcement would simply be suggestions, so structures that are in violation are set to the HWS faction after plenty of visible and audible warnings.

The first request for the return of your structure is free.   After that, the next request has a credit cost of [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/4-limits-restrictions/4363#1-4-seizure-removal-of-structures]Blocks * Devices[/url].

The need to contact an admin is eliminated with the command
egs:buyback:<ID>
The pricing model differs depending upon the structure location and size:

[i]"On starter playfields, the cost is [b]1000 credits[/b] and the [b]structure class size as RP[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

For example, if a class 3 ship were seized, it would cost  [b]1000 credits[/b] and [b]3 RP[/b].

------------------------

[i]"On non-starter playfields, the cost in credits is [b](Blocks * Devices) / 2[/b] and the [b]RP cost = Structure Class size[/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

For example, if a Class 6 ship ( 13,310 Blocks and 210 devices) were seized on Golden Globe, it would cost [b]1,397,550[/b] credits and [b]6 RP[/b].

------------------------

Buyback for Black Hole wipe mistakes:

[i]"( [b]Blocks[/b]  *  [b]Devices[/b] ) credits +  [b]RP[/b] **RP cost = Class size of structure
"[/i]

------------------------
Set Origin Planet as new spawn start

Using EGS services, players can set their Starter Planet to be their chosen Origin’s Planet.  Some may choose this option if they don’t wish to return to their Starter Planet if they died and chose “[b]Fresh Start[/b]”.This action eliminates the need to build a warp-capable SV / CV and allows players to join faction mates on their Origin’s home planet.

Trade your money for your time!

The command is:  [b]egs:setstarterplanet[/b]
[i](This command will set your current playfield to your new starter planet. But be aware - the planet has to belong to your origin)[/i]

[i]"[b][u][fdb100][b]
Cost: 100,000 credits[/b][-][/u][/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/e/eda8a9708750da958b40f4b493c95822561fbaaf.jpg]
image.jpg1917×489 107 KB[/url]


[i]"[b][u]
How it works[/u][/b]
"[/i]

------------------------

If you want to convert your [b]Reputation Points[/b] (RP) to [b]Blueprint[/b] (BP) Factory reduction time all you have to do is type this command in chat:
egs:reducebptime:xxx
  - xxx stands for the minutes you want to reduce your current running blueprint in your Factory
  - it cost you 1 RP per 10 minute reduction
Find or build 1 Wood Growing Plot and place it in your Base. It's the foundation of beautiful plants!
Russian: Найдите или создайте 1 деревянный растительный модуль и поместите его на свою базу. Это основа прекрасных растений!

All Penthouses have:

  - ATM
  - Armor Locker + Repair Station
  - All Medic Devices + 1 Shower
  - Wireless Connection
  - Parking Place with Repair Bay T2

[b][u]General Information[/u][/b]

  - You can check every Penthouse out on the ECC Planet (public door)
  - 10 per version on one planet
  - Only Steam ID’s of Penthouse Owners may enter
  - The planet is PvE, terrain indestructible and your house is indestructible and only accessible by you
  - 1 CV + 1 SV + 1 HV ([b]all private[/b]) allowed to park near your penthouse. Activate this toggle in your Registry.

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/5/524a7b2c5048a2f3099cce3e21eaee5ea8c1f34d.jpeg]
image.jpg1641×240 36.1 KB[/url]
  - [b][b]Only Private[/b] Structures allowed there. Do not change it to faction.[/b]
  - You can only have [b]one per server[/b]
  - [b]no[/b] [b]additional bases[/b] allowed there
  - No POIs there
  - Only Common Resource Rocks are available** as resource
  - [b]Always let us know if you changed your ingame name so we can match it again properly to the Penthouse[/b]
  - contact [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/rexxxus]@RexXxuS[/url] please if you want your Penthouse near your friends for example
  - First come, first serve
  - Penthouse won’t be deleted due to visit timer or other. Lasts the entire season.
  - Penthouse cannot be edited or amended in any way (only colorized)
  - Penthouses do not count towards global limits
  - Penthouses do not count towards RP Checks (living in PvE/PvP to get RP)
  - after a season it gets set to Adm faction again if not re-supporting us

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/3/3b91f9be6c5fd24ac05b9215db0076d30bdd058e.jpeg]
HWS-Phoenix.jpg1600×1022 233 KB[/url]


Phoenix is a nightmare or dream or both for PvE players.
It not only contains [b]every resources[/b] and [b]wipes daily at 5PM (EU)[/b] / 11PM (NA) but one of the most difficult Space POIs are waiting for you there, you never ever will succeed alone.

And a Phoenix won’t be a Phoenix if it wouldn’t be hot there. Like [b]really[/b] hot. [i]I’ve heard there is an Epic Heavy Armor around though[/i]  

The hardest challenge at the beginning however will be the question: “how to get there?”

Well… good luck! But as an exclusive tip: Check out your PDA! A special POI will tell you the Coordinates to the Phoenix Supergate - [b]because you can only reach Phoenix with a Supergate[/b]!
[i]Q: Do I need to harvest and gather materials in Creative?[/i]\nNo, you do not. Just click H (Default) and you have all blocks at your disposal (Singleplayer and Server)
Russian:
[i]Q: est-ce que j'ai besoin de récupérer des matériaux de base en mode Créatif ? [/i]
Non, pas besoin. Il suffit de taper 'H' (par défaut) et vous aurez tous les blocs à votre disposition (solo et serveur)
,[i]P: Preciso colher e extrair materiais no Criativo? [/i]
Não, você não precisa. Basta clicar em H (Padrão) e você tem todos os blocos à sua disposição (Singleplayer e Server),[i]В: Необходимо ли мне собирать и добывать материалы в творческом режиме?[/i]
Такой необходимости нет. Просто нажмите H (по умолчанию) и все блоки будут в вашем распоряжении (в одиночной игре и на сервере).,,[i]问：创造模式需要去收获和收集材料么？[/i]
不用，完全不用。按H键（默认）可以随意取任何材料，无论单人还是多人游戏。

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents
On HWS you can play many Events to get new inspirations and gameplay outside the box.
Some of them are automated and handled via Chat commands, some are manually hosted.Check this Guide out from time to time to see all available Events and their conditions.
[b][u]SV / HV / CV Deathmatch Events[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/c/c1992bfede84c84a5efc52a159dfae1193cf8aee.jpeg]
hws-deathmatch-event.jpg1424×641 42 KB[/url]


[b][u]Deathmatch Event Info[/u][/b]

These three events are pure [b]PvP - 1 vs 1[/b] - [b]every 2 hours running.[/b]Both player get the same ship and loadout to be able to fight 20 minutes against each other.

To be declared as winner at the end, it is required to activate the Loot Crate in the Center of the Arena. After you triggered the Motion Sensor by foot, the Loot box will unlock after 5 minutes (plan ahead).Inside there is a Bomb Drone item, you need to keep in your inventory before the event ends. (do not drop it - you can’t pick it up anymore)
[b][u]Deathmatch Event Prize[/u][/b]

  - 100k credits
  - 7 HWS Reputation Points


------------------------
[b][u]Tower Jumper Event[/u][/b]

[b][u]Tower Jumper Event Info[/u][/b]

Every Sunday you have the chance to win a lot of credits and HWS RP in this PvE event in 15 minutes.
All you have to do is to skill your Jetpack very smartly from Tower to Tower.
You will find a lot of resources along the way too.Only if you reach the last Tower, you will be declared as winner.
[b][u]Tower Jumper Event Prize[/u][/b]

  - 7 million credits
  - 100 HWS RP
  - 7000 Xeno Blocks


------------------------
[b][u]Quake Arena Event (FPS)[/u][/b]

[b][u]Quake Arena Event Info[/u][/b]

In this First Person Shooter event you have to kill as many players as possible until the time runs out. Whoever has the most kills by then wins the Event!
[b][u]Quake Arena Event Prize[/u][/b]

  - 1 million credits
  - 50 HWS RP
  - 50k credits per kill


------------------------
[b][u]Eton Capture the Base Event[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/e/e2ddb02e3c6cef11b1bf7def83ca105fa47e940f.jpeg]
HWS-9X-Eton.jpg1926×1056 318 KB[/url]

[b][u]Capture the Base Event Info[/u][/b]

Find the 4 Lever to get to the Core Room!



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/4/49385b457d0c1e2665fe8daf40a8fbb24c334d02.jpeg]
image.jpg835×879 102 KB[/url]


  - Every day on EU at [b]6PM - 7PM[/b] | NA at [b]0AM - 1AM[/b]
  - You can join the event any time during that span but make sure to let the tool know you participate with the ev:start:ctb command.
  - No CVs allowed on Eton
  - Solve the puzzle mentioned above
  - You have to check your surrounding carefully and use all legit options to conquer the Metropolis
  - Protect the Core Room from intruders
  - Stay in the Core Room until the end to be the Winner
  - Everyone who is not in the faction which captured the base will then immediately warped out of Eton. Winner stay
  - The winner has now access to Eton for [b]20 hours[/b] and can farm the deposits of all resources
  - At 5PM (EU) | 11PM (NA) [b]EVERYTHING[/b] on the planet will be wiped to prepare for the next run.
  - The planet can’t be entered by anyone again

[b][u]Capture the Base Event Prize[/u][/b]

  - 1 million credits
  - 100 HWS RP
  - 250k credits per kill
  - Access to the planet which contains all resources as Deposit

[b][u]New Battle Royale Event[/u][/b]
[b][u]Capture the Base Event Info[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/3/3ea7bd7bf84db73722a1896f4f5c946d0ad07aa7.jpeg]
image.jpg2481×1437 219 KB[/url]


  - [b]PvP[/b] Event with [b]First Person Shooter[/b] and [b]building HVs[/b] from scratch as focus
  - [b]Loot and gather[/b] over 200 POI Houses along the way as quick as possible but especially: [b]survive[/b]!
  - [b]No blueprint spawning allowed[/b]. You can only [b]build a HV via Elite Builders League[/b] (by hand) - boosted by non stop falling Meteorites and the POI Loot.
  - [b]Up to 100 Players[/b] will get [b]teleported randomly on the planet[/b] with the barest [b]survival loot[/b] as start
  - [b]The goal is to reach and contest the “Battle Royale Pyramid”[/b] (activate the levers outside to get inside)
  - [b]Stay in the marked red area at the very end to count as winner[/b] and defend this Pyramid with your life!

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/a/a51dd9794847babc78febc7c1c187cc907532487.jpeg]
image.jpg1696×902 136 KB[/url]
  - The [b]event is running daily[/b] and you have [b]2 hours[/b] - from [b]7:30PM[/b] to [b]9PM[/b] EU and [b]1:30PM[/b] to [b]3AM[/b] NA.

[b][u]Capture the Base Event Prize[/u][/b]

  - [b]1 million credits[/b]
  - [b]250k credits per player kill[/b]
  - [b]100 HWS RP[/b]

[b][fdb100]Mission[-][/b]
A Growing Plot alone does not justify the spoiling of nature by humans and those nasty Zirax! We need way more to make Life and Nature happy!

[b][fdb100]Location[-][/b]
Planets

[b][fdb100]Intel[-][/b]
Plants are food. Plants are life. 

[b][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/b]
No
Russian:
[b][fdb100]Миссия[-][/b]
Один только Растительный Модуль не возместит порчу природы людьми и этими мерзкими Зираксами! Нам нужно гораздо больше, чтобы сделать жизнь и природу счастливыми!

[b][fdb100]место[-][/b]
Планеты

[b][fdb100]Детали[-][/b]
Растения это пища. Растения это жизнь. 

[b][fdb100]Возможность повторить[-][/b]
Нет

English:
[i]"These are items which can [b]ONLY[/b] be accquired by [b]trading[/b] or [b]PDA missions[/b] or [b]POI raiding[/b].
Your task is to find out which Commodity Trader offers these items at [b]cheap prices[/b] and find other Commodity Traders somewhere else which buys them for [b]expensive prices[/b]. Creating a positive Trade balance.
"[/i]

------------------------

[i]"[b]Note:[/b] Trade commodities, regardless of rarity, [b]cannot[/b] be put into the OCD at [b]ANY[/b] level.
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Commodity Trader Location[/u][/b]

To give you a hint where a Commodity Trader is located in the Universe, just press M and check the Description.

  - A [b][019245]Wealthy[-][/b] economy can be found mostly in PvP playfields

  - A [b][019494]Sustainable[-][/b] economy can be found in interesting PvE or PvP playfields

  - A [b][d14700]Unpromising[-][/b] economy can be found in PvE playfields



Additionally you can assume to have a better economy on planets or really special orbits than in an orbit.
[b][u]Origin Discount[/u][/b]

Additionally certain [b]Origins[/b] have different Commodity items they can trade for special conditions at very special locations [i](look out for Origin locked Stargates or Supergates)[/i].

  - [b]Federation[/b]: 10% / 30% / 50% better buy and sell price for [b]Robotics[/b] 

  - [b]Freelancer[/b]: 10% / 30% / 50% better buy and sell price for [b]Ancient Relics[/b] 

  - [b]Outcast[/b]: 10% / 30% / 50% better buy and sell price for [b]Liquors[/b] 



[i]The percentage rate is also dependent from the economy level you are in. However 50% is set in Unpromising, 30% in Sustainable and 10% in Wealthy playfields.[/i]
[b][u]NPC Faction Discount[/u][/b]

The Commodity Trader are getting their items from the NPC Factions. So the better your NPC Reputation towards Zirax, Polaris and Talon for example, the more likely you get a trade discount!

  - [b]Honored with Zirax[/b]: 7% Discount on Weapon & Alien Commodity items
  - [b]Honored with Polaris[/b]: 15% Discount on Antique & Component Commodity items
  - [b]Honored with Talon[/b]: 30% Discount on Bio Commodity items

A new Playfield description will show you the Planet Address



Collect, decrypt them and you will discover new worlds!

[i]To decrypt them you have to solve the Puzzle inside the Monolith — keep your eyes open![/i]

To enhance the gameplay and tactics in PvP, we have activated Proximity Alarms to all HWS Servers.

So if enemies fly close to your structures in PvP, you get a chat message, which warns you about it.
[b][u]Example[/u][/b]

[i]"[b]Attention[/b]: Intruders are 424 meter away from !Devil Bot on Golden Globe
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Notes[/u][/b]

  - The proximity on Planets for warnings are 500 meter
  - The proximity in Orbits for warnings are 2000 meter
  - The alerts only trigger if your Proximity Structure has at least 100 Blocks
  - The alerts only trigger if your Proximity Structure is powered on
  - They only trigger on PvP playfields
  - They exclude warnings for Alliances
  - If you have linked your Faction Chat with a Discord Channel, you can get warnings also exported to your Faction Discord channel

HWS Factories is a very unique and new way how to play Empyrion in MP.
[b][u]Feature details[/u][/b]

  - The Factory produces high quality components like CV Thruster XL
  - Every hour you have the chance to either [b]hack[/b] the Factory or [b]trade[/b] inside
  - If you [b]hack[/b] the Factory you get a lot more Component items but your Reputation to the NPC Faction will be [b]reduced by 20 000 Repuation Points[/b] [i](if you don’t plan your escape you will be killed by the unfriendly Faction now)[/i]     - If there are other HWS Factories on the planet you get Reputation Points for the other Factions. Example you lose 20 000 RP for Polaris but get 10 000 RP for Zirax


  - As soon as your PDA Mission is not on cooldown the Mission gets automatically activated if you go inside the Factory
  - Sometimes a Hack also means to deactivate the Land Claim Device, so you can drill around the Factory (Golden Globe)

[b][u]Video showcase[/u][/b]

This Planet is a new late game content for PvE players. It is very harsh, unforgiving and only reachable with a CV.

English:
[i[Q: What do the 2x3 number blocks aka environmental info below the radar minimap want to tell me?[/i]
A1: The upper block is the TEMPERATURE. The big number on the left is the temperature at your CURRENT POSITION. The small upper number is your current BODY TEMPERATURE. The small lower number is only shown if you are inside a base or vessel. This is telling you the OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE. If you are outside a base or vessel, this is of course the same as the CURRENT LOCATION temp (and thus removed from the HUD to reduce confusion)
A2: The lower block is the RADIATION. The big number on the left side is the radiation level on your CURRENT POSITION. The small upper number is yoour BODY RADIATION level. The small lower number is the OUTSIDE RADIATION. Same principle as with temperature: The latter is only shown when you are inside a vessel or a base and is removed if you are outside.

[i]Q: How does Temperature work in general?[/i]
A1: Each Planet has a MAX and MIN temperature. The max temperature is reached at 5 pm and the min temperature at 5 am. If you go higher up in the air, the temperature will decrease. Your suit will protect you from extreme temperatures - depending on its TempMIN/MAX protection. (Can be enhanced by Boosters).
A2: Space always has -270°C for most orbits (except a few) and is not suitable for ANY of the current suits for a longer stay (unboosted)

[i]Q: Am i protected from high/low temperatures inside a base or vessel?[/i]
If it is activated, yes. If a station or vessel is powered, the temperature is heated up to 22-25° (Same for enclosed cockpits for SV and HV). So you are fine even with your interior suit. BUT this will not happen instantly! If your base is cooled to space temperature, it might take quite a while to heat up to a suitable temperature! No instant-heat-up!

[i]Q: What happens if i am outside with a suit that can not protect me from high/low temperatures?[/i]
A1: If the temperature is higher or lower as your protection level, your body temp will slowly rise (or fall) towards the temperature at your current position. At a certain temperature, you will start to feel cold/heated up.
A2: If it is too cold or hot outside, just go back into your base or vessel. This will heat up/cool down your body temp. BUT THIS DOES NOT HAPPEN INSTANTLY. If this takes too long, you'll of course die.
A3: Tip: there are some foods and beverages that increase/decrease body temperature!

[i]Q: Does a hull breach lead to the temperature dropping inside a base or vessel?[/i]A: Yes!
Français:
[i]Q: Que signifient les informations au dessous de la mini-carte radar ? (en haut à droite)[/i]
Le bloc supérieur concerne la température. Le grand nombre à gauche est la température à votre POSITION actuelle. Le petit nombre supérieur à droite est votre température corporelle actuelle. Le petit nombre inférieur à droite a une valeur uniquement si vous êtes à l'intérieur d'une Base ou d'un vaisseau. Il vous indique la température extérieure.
Le bloc inférieur concerne la radiation. Le grand nombre sur le côté gauche est le niveau de radiation à votre POSITION actuelle. Le petit nombre supérieur à droite est votre niveau d'irradiation. Le petit nombre inférieur à droite a une valeur uniquement si vous êtes à l'intérieur d'une Base ou d'un vaisseau. Il vous indique le niveau de radiation à l'extérieur

[i]Q: comment la température fonctionne en général ?[/i]
Chaque planète a une température Mini et Maxi. La température maximale est atteinte à 17:00h et la température minimale à 05:00h. Si vous montez plus haut dans le ciel, la température diminue. Votre combinaison vous protégera contre les températures extrêmes - selon son niveau protection température Mini/Maxi (peut être renforcé par des Boosters).
L'espace est toujours à -130°, pour la plupart des orbites (excepté certaines), et ne convient pour aucune armure (non Boostée), durant une longue période.

[i]Q: suis-je protégé des hautes/basses températures à l'intérieur d'une Base ou d'un vaisseau ?[/i]
Si la structure est alimentée et activée, Oui. Une base est chauffée à 22°/25° (idem pour les cockpits fermés de SV et HV). Vous serez à l'abri même avec une combinaison d'intérieur. Mais attention ! Si votre Base spatiale (non activée et/ou non alimentée) est refroidie par la température de l'espace, ça prendra un certain temps à chauffer pour retrouver une température appropriée !

[i]Q: que se passe-t-il si je suis à l'extérieur avec une combinaison qui ne peut pas me protéger de températures hautes/basses ? [/i]
Si la température est supérieure ou inférieure à votre niveau de protection, votre température corporelle commencera lentement à augmenter ou baisser juqu'à correspondre à la température de votre position actuelle. À une certaine température, vous commencerez à ressentir le chaud/froid. Dans ce cas, il suffira de retourner à votre Base ou votre vaisseau. Cela rétablira votre température corporelle. MAIS CELA N'ARRIVE PAS INSTANTANÉMENT. Si cela dure trop longtemps, vous mourrez bien sûr.

[u]Astuce :[/u] il existe certains aliments et boissons qui peuvent augmenter/diminuer votre température corporelle !

[i]Q: une brèche dans la structure d'une Base ou d'un vaisseau entraîne-t-elle une chute de la température à l'intérieur ? [/i
Oui !!
Russian:
[i[В: Что означает блок чисел, находящийся ниже радара?[/i]
A1: Верхние числа - это Температура. Число слева - это температура в вашей текущей позиции. Число вверху - это температура вашего тела. Число внизу - это температура снаружи базы или судна. Если вы находитесь за пределами базы или судна то это значение совпадает с температурой в текущей позиции
A2: Нижние числа - это Радиация. Число слева - это радиация в вашей текущей позиции. Число вверху - это радиактивность вашего тела. Число внизу - это радиация снаружи базы или судна.

[i]В: Как вообще работает температура?[/i]
A1:Каждая планета имеет Макс и Мин температуру. Максимальная температура достигается в 5 часов вечера и минимальная температура в 5 утра. Чем выше вы будете подниматься, тем сильнее температура будет уменьшаться. Ваш костюм защитит вас от экстремальных температур - в зависимости от его защиты. (Может быть улучшена Усилителями).
A2: Космос всегда имеет -270 ° C для большинства орбит (за исключением нескольких) и не подходит для ЛЮБОГО из текущих костюмов для более длительного пребывания (неусиленные)

[i]В: Я защищен от высоких / низких температур внутри базы или судна?[/i]
Если они запитаны, то да. Если база или судно запитано, то температура прогревается до 22-25 ° (То же самое для закрытых кабин для МС и ПС). Таким образом, вы прекрасно справитесь с обычным костюмом. НО это не произойдет мгновенно! Если ваша база охладилась до температуры космоса, может потребоваться довольно много времени, чтобы нагреть до подходящей температуры! Нет мгновенного нагрева!

[i]В: Что произойдет, если я нахожусь снаружи с костюмом, который не может защитить меня от высоких / низких температур?[/i]
A1: Если температура выше или ниже вашего уровня защиты, ваша температура тела будет медленно подниматься (или падать) до температуры в вашем текущем положении. При определенной температуре вы начнете ощущать холод / жар.
A2: Если на улице слишком холодно или жарко, просто возвращайтесь на свою базу или судно. Это согреет / охладит температуру вашего тела. НО ЭТО НЕ ПРОИЗОЙДЕТ НЕ МГНОВЕННО. Если это займет слишком много времени, вы, конечно, умрете.
A3: Совет: есть некоторые продукты и напитки, которые увеличивают / уменьшают температуру тела!

[i]В: Повреждение корпуса приводит к падению температуры внутри базы или судна?[/i]A: Да!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：屏幕右上雷达地图下面两行信息如何解读？[/i]
答1：第一行是温度状况。最左边的大数字是你当前位置的温度；竖线右边上面小数字是你当前体温，下面小数字提示你当前位置的外界环境温度。如果你离开基地或飞船右下小数字就是当前位置的环境温度，一般会和左面的大数字一致（如果你靠近室外的发电机会不一样）。
答2：第二行是辐射状况。最左边的大数字你当前位置的辐射；竖线右边上面小数字是你当前体感辐射，下面小数字提示你当前位置的外界环境辐射。和温度显示一样，如果在室外，靠近一台翘曲驱动器右下小数字和左边大数字会不一样。

[i]问：温度一般如何设定？[/i]
答1：每个行星都有其最高和最低温度。最高温度一般设定出现在下午五点，最低温度是清晨五点。星球地形越高，或者说你到达的位置越高，温度越低。你的护甲会保护你免受极端温度影响 - 这取决于护甲的极限隔温效果（这个可以通过相关护甲强化器提升）
答2：宇宙空间一般是-270°C左右（接近绝对零度-273.15°C，译者注），除了极少数例外大部分轨道和空间如此，因此任何种类防护服都不会长时间保护一个人，除非你的护甲安装了宇航服出舱强化器。

[i]问：如果我在基地或飞船里是否会受到外界温度影响？[/i]
如果它们是激活状态，你不会受到外界温度影响。因为密封的室内会有默认的空调启动，温度会锁定到20-25°C（各类飞船的驾驶舱一样）。因此，你光着屁股在屋里都没事。但是此温度环境不是瞬间启动的！如果你的基地在太空中关机了太长时间，当你开机后它需要较长时间才能达到上述适宜温度！记住，没有速冻速热效果！

[i]问：如果我到了某处超过护甲极限隔温效果的环境中会发生什么情况？[/i]
答1：如果温度过高或过低超过护甲的防护能力，你的体温会提升或降低到环境温度一样。如果继续作死，你会冻僵或者中暑，甚至直接燃烧！
答2：上述情况只要你迅速返回基地或飞船（驾驶舱亦可）内就可避免。这会使你的体温回复到正常状态，但是也要注意“这不会瞬间发生”！如果你冻的够久，热的够长，你还是会死！
技术贴：有一些食物和药品可以瞬时增加/减少你的体温！

[i]问：如果基地或者飞船的密封性结构被破坏了，室内温度是不是不能保持？[/i]答：没错！
Greek:
[i]Ε: Τι θέλουν να μου πουν οι αριθμοί 2x3 που είναι γνωστοί για περιβαλλοντικά στοιχεία κάτω από τον μικρό χάρτη του ραντάρ;[/i]
A1: Το επάνω τετράγωνο είναι η ΘΕΡΜΟΚΡΑΣΙΑ. Ο μεγάλος αριθμός στα αριστερά είναι η θερμοκρασία στην ΤΡΕΧΟΥΣΑ ΘΕΣΗ που βρίσκεσαι. Ο μικρός αριθμός επάνω είναι η τρέχουσα ΘΕΡΜΟΚΡΑΣΙΑ ΣΩΜΑΤΟΣ. Ο κάτω μικρός αριθμός φαίνεται μόνο όταν είσαι μέσα σε βάση ή όχημα. Αυτός σου λέει την ΕΞΩΤΕΡΙΚΗ ΘΕΡΜΟΚΡΑΣΙΑ. Εάν είσαι έξω από μία βάση ή όχημα, αυτός ο αριθμός αφορά την θερμοκρασία στην ΤΡΕΧΟΥΣΑ ΤΟΠΟΘΕΣΙΑ (και για αυτό αφαιρέθηκε για να μην υπάρχουν συγχίσεις).
A2: Το χαμηλότερο τετράγωνο είναι η ΑΚΤΙΝΟΒΟΛΙΑ. Αυτός ο μεγάλος αριθμός δείχνει τα επίπεδα ακτινοβολίας στην ΤΡΕΧΟΥΣΑ ΤΟΠΟΘΕΣΙΑ. Ο μικρός αριθμός επάνω είναι τα επίπεδα ΑΚΤΙΝΟΒΟΛΙΑΣ ΣΩΜΑΤΟΣ. Ο μικρός αριθμός χαμηλότερα είναι η ΕΞΩΤΕΡΙΚΗ ΑΚΤΙΝΟΒΟΛΙΑ. Η ίδια αρχή με τη θερμοκρασία: Το τελευταίο φαίνεται μόνο όταν είσαι μέσα σε όχημα ή βάση και αφαιρείται όταν είσαι έξω.

[i]Ε: Πώς λειτουργεί η Θερμοκρασία γενικότερα;[/i]
A1: Κάθε πλανήτης έχει μία ΜΕΓΙΣΤΗ και ΕΛΑΧΙΣΤΗ θερμοκρασία. Η μέγιστη θερμοκρασία φτάνεται στις 5μμ και η ελάχιστη θερμοκρασία στις 5πμ. Όσο απομακρύνεσαι από το έδαφος τόσο η θερμοκρασία πέφτει. Η στολή σου θα σε προστατεύσει από τις ακραίες θερμοκρασίας - εξαρτάται από την ΕΛΑΧΙΣΤΗ και ΜΕΓΙΣΤΗ προστασία θερμοκρασίας. (Μπορεί να ενισχυθεί με τους Προωθητήρες).
A2: Το διάστημα έχει πάντα -270°C για τις περισσότερες τροχιές (με εξαίρεση λίγες) και δεν είναι κατάλληλη για ΚΑΜΙΑ υπάρχουσα στολή για να μείνεις εκεί πολύ ώρα (χωρίς προωθητήρες)

[i]Ε: Είμαι προστατευμένος από τις υψηλές/χαμηλές θερμοκρασίες μέσα στη βάση ή στο όχημα;[/i]
Εάν είναι ενεργοποιημένα, ναι. Εάν ένας σταθμός ή όχημα τροφοδοτούνται, η εσωτερική θερμοκρασία είναι 22-25° (Το ίδιο και για όταν βρίσκεστε στην καμπίνα ενός SV ή HV). Έτσι είσαι καλά ακόμα και με την απλή στολή. ΑΛΛΑ αυτό δεν θα συμβεί αμέσως! Εάν η βάση σου έχει κρυώσει στο διάστημα, ίσως πάρει λίγο μέχρι να ζεσταθεί και να έχει φυσιολογικές θερμοκρασίες! Δεν υπάρχει ακαριαία θέρμανση!

[i]Ε: Τι συμβαίνει εάν είμαι έξω με μία στολή που δεν μπορεί να με προστατεύσει από τις υψηλές/χαμηλές θερμοκρασίες;[/i]
A1: Εάν η θερμοκρασία είναι υψηλότερη ή χαμηλότερη από το επίπεδο προστασίας σου, η θερμοκρασία σώματα θα ανέβει σιγά-σιγά (ή θα πέσει) σύμφωνα με την θερμοκρασία της τρέχουσας τοποθεσίας. Σε ορισμένη θερμοκρασία, θα αρχίσεις να ζεσταίνεσαι ή να κρυώνεις.
A2: Εάν είναι πολύ κρύο ή ζέστη έξω, απλά πήγαινε πίσω στο όχημα ή την βάση. Αυτό θα σε ζεστάνει/κρυώσει το σώμα σου. ΑΛΛΑ ΑΥΤΟ ΔΕΝ ΣΗΜΒΑΙΝΕΙ ΑΚΑΡΙΑΙΑ. Εάν αυτό πάρει πάρα πολύ, μπορεί φυσικά να πεθάνεις.
A3: Συμβουλή: υπάρχουν μερικά φαγητά και ποτά που αυξομειώνουν την θερμοκρασία σώματος!

[i]Q: Η παραβίαση του σκάφους οδηγεί σε απώλεια θερμοκρασίας μέσα στη βάση ή το όχημα;[/i]A: Ναι!

English: [i]Q: Is there a way to mark a faction as a 'friendly ally' allowing them to use our devices?[/i]\nYES! You can send a alliance request to a befriended faction!
Russian:
[i]Q: y a-t-il un moyen de marquer une faction comme « allié » permettant aux membres d'utiliser nos appareils ? [/i]
Oui ! Vous pouvez envoyer une demande d'alliance à une faction amie!,[i]P: Existe uma maneira de marcar uma facção como um 'aliado amigável', permitindo que eles usem nossos dispositivos? [/i]
SIM! Você pode enviar uma solicitação de aliança para uma facção amigável!,[i]В: Есть ли возможность отметить другую фракцию в качестве 'дружественного союзника', позволяя, тем самым, использовать свои устройства?[/i]
ДА! Вы можете отправить дружественной фракции запрос на заключение альянса!,コントロールパネル,[i]问：可以设定一个友好派系，使其玩家可以使用本派系的设备么？[/i]
可以！你可以向该派系发送同盟申请。

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/4/4ea1e9e952345d83a88b44c81acc28202e47a1d3.jpeg]
image.jpg1288×874 86.1 KB[/url]


When you access the Kill Board page in HWS Connect, you’ll see the kill board of the server you’re in.
[b][u]Info[/u][/b]

  - It shows ONLY the player (PvP) kills
  - Do not show alliance nor faction kills
  - List the Top 10 for the whole server
  - Are updated every 30 minutes.
  - Show the Kill-Death rate. It is calculated with Kills - Deaths. [i](E.g. 10 kills and 3 deaths = 7 K/D)[/i]
  - If a player is not playing for 7 days he is not listed on the board

[b][u]Reward[/u][/b]

With the start of the HWS 10.X season at the end of a season, the top 3 players are rewarded! They will be applied for the new season.

 10 HWS Ingots
 500 RP 1 000 000 credits

English: Type in chat ev:start:ctb and press F1!
Russian: Введите в чате ev:start:ctb и нажмите F1!

English:
You have to join the CTB event with a chat command.

Make sure you read the conditions first like time and duration with the chat command ev:list.

Only then you get the reward if you succeed.!
Russian:
Вы должны присоединиться к мероприятию CTB с помощью команды чата.

Убедитесь, что вы сначала прочитали условия, такие как время и продолжительность, с помощью команды чата ev:list.

Только тогда вы получите награду!

The [b]Pandora Planet[/b] is one of the recent discovered PvP planet on HWS, which is only reachable with a CV.



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/c/c6ada75fe326d3a95376a2fa29bdfbebd27b7f62.jpeg]
HWS-9X-Pandora.jpg1879×1057 411 KB[/url]


It is inspired by the Cosmic you have a PvP Planet full of strange biomes and incredible lucrative events.
[b][u]The Cosmic Race[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/4/42c36a6cefe7bc4a5cb86afcf0770f29ead10c30.jpeg]
HWS-9X-Pandora-Cosmic-Race.jpg1879×1057 433 KB[/url]


Once you approach the Race Officier you can start the Cosmic Race Mission.
[b]Every 30 Minutes[/b] (with a delay of +10 min on top every time) you can get [b]3 HWS RP[/b] and [b]1000 Gold Ingots[/b]!
[b][u]Living boost[/u][/b]

[i]"[b]Live on Pandora[/b] for 24 hours with a 1000+ Block Base and get [b]10 HWS RP[/b] and [b]10000 Credits per day![/b]
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]Explore the Planet[/u][/b]

Protect the special Cosmic Biomes. [i]I’ve heard there are very valuable resources hidden as a planet crust - extracted out from stars![/i]
[b][019245]HWS Connect: [-][/b]Prepare very well or you will get absorbed!
Russian: [b][019245]HWS Connect: [-][/b]Подготовьтесь очень хорошо, иначе вы будете поглощены!

English: Find and capture the HWS Metropolis!
Make sure to read the details!!
On EU the event starts every day at 6pm | on NA at 0am.!
Russian: На EU мероприятие начинается каждый день в 23-00 | на NA в 5 утра.!

English: With this last lever the Freighter makes sure only qualified members have access to the Bridge and Crew rooms.
Go to the Stargate and prepare yourself
Russian: Следуёте к Звёздным воротам и будьте готовы

English:
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/1/136302813164c161386ad3375cba721508256cd8.jpeg]
image.jpg1280×958 92 KB[/url]

[b][u]Usage[/u][/b]

There are [b]two[/b] main ways to place a bounty on another player’s head.
[b][u]Ingame[/u][/b]

In faction chat: [b]type[/b]
   egs:bounty:playername:creditAmount
[i]"Example egs:bounty:RexXxuS:100000000
"[/i]

------------------------
[b][u]HWS Connect[/u][/b]

Use the HWS Connect web interface to place a bounty on someone



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/5/547e11268ec28e1ea6cc4c5f9a11b49e48ea0ff4.JPG]
bounty.JPG1343×299 19 KB[/url]


Or you can click the little bounty icon, on a players name.

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/8/848ac54bc3696a108c698edaffacbcc4bb2ef3ae.png]
Screenshot_6.png850×42 1.61 KB[/url]

[b][u]Bounty Conditions[/u][/b]

Please review the following tips regarding bounties:

  - A bounty of [b]1 to 9,999,999 credits[/b] will display only the targeted player name and the bounty amount

  - A bounty of more than [b]10,000,000 credits[/b] will display the targeted player name, the bounty amount and the playfield that the targeted player is on but not the coordinates


[b][u]Additional Info[/u][/b]

  - The bounty you place will be subtracted from your [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/elemental-bank-eb/4395]Elemental Bank (EB)[/url] as soon as you set it
  - The [b]bounty[/b] is automatically transferred to the Bounty Hunter when the job is done
  - The higher the bounty, the more likely that the targeted player will be found and exterminated.
  - From HWS Connect Online Players you can watch players, so you get notifications everytime a player comes online! A sound is even played.

English:
Chat Command | Description | 
am:? | Provides you with useful information regarding the Auto Miner. | 
am:info | Displays your current fuel level and shows how to view your current miner levels and resources on [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect]HWS Connect[/url]. | 
am:buy:IR | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Iron Ore | 
am:buy:COP | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Copper Ore | 
am:buy:COB | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Cobalt Ore | 
am:buy:MA | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Magnesium Ore | 
am:buy:PR | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Promethium Ore | 
am:buy:NEO | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Neodymium Ore | 
am:buy:SI | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Silicion Ore | 
am:buy:SA | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Sathium Ore | 
am:buy:ERE | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Erestrum Ore | 
am:buy:ZAS | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Zascosium Ore | 
am:buy:BC | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Blue Crystal | 
am:buy:GO | Buy or Upgrade an Auto Miner Gold Ore | 
am:sell:ORE | Allows you to sell or downgrade a specific Auto Miner where ORE stands for the one you have. | 
am:get:ORE[i]AMOUNT or am:get:ORE[/i]Amount#ORE*Amount#… | Allows you to get a specific amount of one of your mined resources or even more individually. | 
am:get:all | Allows you to recover all mined resources at once. (Make sure you have inventory space). | 
am:fuel:Resource/All:Amount/All | Allows you to fuel all mined resources at once or fuels up your Auto Miner with an amount of fuel from your inventory for specific resources if you want. | 

Example 1: am:fuel:iron:all -> fuels up only your iron auto miner with all Auto Miner Cores your have in your inventory

Example 2: am:fuel:iron:7 -> fuel up only your iron auto miner with 7 Auto Miner Cores from your inventory (if you have them)

Example 3: am:fuel:all:7 -> fuels up all of your resources in your auto miner with 7 Auto Miner Cores from your inventory (if you have them)

Example 4: am:fuel:all:all -> fuels up all of your resources in your auto miner with all Auto Miner Cores from your inventory (if you have them). It will split equally along all of your resources. So if you have 10 resource auto miners and 20 Auto Miner Cores in your inventory each resource would get 2 Auto Miner Cores.

Attention: if you have 10 resource auto mineres and 21 Auto Miner Cores then 2 would go in each resource type but the last am core would go to the resource type you bought first.|

You’ve gotten your base down. You have solid mining plans and can acquire resources. You’ve connected to HWS and, yeah you haven’t read all of it yet - but you get where it is.  Now its time for you to start stepping up into the big leagues. Time to start making real money, building up your reserves, maybe joining a big faction looking like you know what you’re doing, and figuring out when to upgrade which things.
[b][u][b]Welcome to h1myname1sdav1d’s Economic Guide to the Mid-game.[/b][/u][/b]

In this guide: An overview to progressing your economic gameplay and how to prioritize progress.Not in this guide: Advanced Market strategies or where to fit in garage ships. I’ll just say that at some point the Eye or Raider are great investments on your time!

Things you should do before this guide. If you haven’t yet, go do them.  Its expected that you can check these few things off the list early.

  - Get your [url=https://youtu.be/Y1wp8Fx1HME]Epic Heavy Armor and Epic Drill from Atlantis[/url]

  - Check out [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/E:/u/dr.dark]@Dr.Dark[/url]’s [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/economy-utility-tool/11072]Economy Utility Tool[/url] for helpful visualizations and tracking.

  - If you are enjoying the server enough, consider the [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/support-us]HWS Supporter package[/url].  Its €11.00 and helps maintain the server. It gives you a couple of extremely helpful upgrades to get you into the mid-game much quicker including OCD 3, Bank 3, and Recycle 3.  It also gives you the command do:re 10 times which provides quite a bit of free resources. I did this and found that it saved me significant time and was pleased with it. *Note: I’m not staff or anything, just felt that way.


[b][u][b]1. Mining[/b][/u][/b]

Forget HV mining and mining with a hand drill. Your first stop to leveling up your mining game is either a CV miner for asteroids or the [b]FREE[/b] Cave Rewad Ship from the Phoenix mission on ECC (Hint, its a little tricky to start this so when you activate it go to the EGS cave R01X on ECC and take the teleporter in the basement!)  This ship has been my mining and trade running ship for the entire time I’ve had it.  I’d [b]HIGHLY[/b] suggest taking out the regular core and putting an NPC core in it. BUT BE CAREFUL! most of the blocks on this cannot be put back on if removed! (If you do this, remove the cockpit first)  You can add blocks onto it to customize it. 



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/0/0ce19d40e3c748f3a97698449d606161c93f0dc5.jpeg]
image.jpg863×567 48.8 KB[/url]


More efficient mining not only helps you get the materials together you’ll need to take the next steps in the game but it can also be an early source of income. If you find yourself needing a bit of extra cash or have some extra resources that you don’t need. You can visit the Resources & Stuff trader at any space Racom to raise some funds by selling ores.



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/2/26f29d83066cd122b2c9d571b8d8ceb26f203a1b.jpeg]
image.jpg1085×658 64 KB[/url]

[b][u][b]2. Making Money[/b][/u][/b]

Next you need to start making money for real. Forget thousands, its time to talk in millions. Do you look at that OCD 7 upgrade sitting with a price tag of $700M and think you’ll never get it?  Wrong, you will get it.  But first you need to take the steps to get yourself there.  Follow these steps.
[b][u][b]2.1. The Market[/b][/u][/b]


I’m going to assume you don’t have hardly any money at this point. You should be doing your FA:Supply command weekly which is giving you something.  Maybe you’ve raided some POIs. You’ve probably blown your money on dumb stuff so I’m going to just assume we’re starting from scratch here.   For the first couple of steps we need to make you a few million credits.  This can easily be achieved by selling on the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-marketplace/4376]market in EGS HQ[/url] on the ECC planet.

To make your first little bit you can take whatever you have amassed and aren’t using and go to the market zone and using your HWS browser, look at whatever it is you’re wanting to sell and list your item a few credits below the lowest price. When you get better at the market and start learning how it goes, there’s a more advanced way to “play” the market game but for now, just do this.  If you don’t know what to sell, one that seems to do ok is magnesium but the real answer is always gold.

As you get farther into the game, you may notice that setting prices below the next lowest price isn’t the way to make the most money. You’re right. As you grow in the game you may even be able to engage in market strategies like arbitraging, controlling supply, and even negotiating with players that often sell the product you sell to work to raise prices.  There’s no anti-trust laws here, this is a true free market!
[b][u][b]2.2. Gold[/b][/u][/b]

If you don’t want to sell what you already have on the market or its not going fast enough for you, a guaranteed way to get money in the game is to mine gold.  Gold is the only item in the game that the game will pay you directly for. Simply mine gold ore, smelt it into bars, turn the bars into coins, deposit the coins into an ATM.  One gold bar is worth $250 in game.  For my personal mid-game journey, at one point I dedicated 1 hour per day to mining gold.  I was lucky to be in a big faction and was able to mine on Golden Globe planet.  Mining for 1hr/day netted me around $7.5M credits when converted into coins.  Mining deposits and asteroids is slower but its a sure/steady way to get income if nothing else is working for you.

Find your favorite gold location in game and hit it regularly. Asteroid mining gold on Golden Globe space is sometimes easy if you do it when not many people are on and fly out a bit to where nobody else is. But be careful - Its PVP space!  (What is with the Nova system anyways? Does anyone go there that often?) 
[b][u][b]2.3. Gold Orbital Auto Miner (OAM)[/b][/u][/b]


[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/orbital-auto-miner-oam/4393]The OAMs[/url] are a source of free resources for players. For now, just upgrade the Gold OAM all the way to level 10.  This will cost $1.08M credits. You’ll do this in the EGS zone at EGS HQ.  You’ll also need to put a couple of automining cores in it to get it cranking.  This will deliver free gold ore which you’ll need to pick up every couple of days. Convert this free gold into money to keep paying for upgrades.  If you stay on top of this you’re making $30k/day for FREE.
[b][u][b]2.4. The Elemental Bank[/b][/u][/b]

Now notice that the bank upgrades are step 4 in this.  That’s because everything else up to this point is more efficient for your time.  But nothing else makes money as easily as the bank.  Its simple really, deposit money and earn interest.

Where I see a lot of people getting stuck with the bank is knowing if a bank upgrade is worth it.  So here’s how to know if you should upgrade the bank or not.  Before you begin, make sure you’ve reviewed the [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/elemental-bank-eb/4395]Elemental Bank page[/url].
[b][u][b]2.4a Upgrading the Bank without losing Interest Income[/b][/u][/b]

Upgrading your bank level should be done only when you have enough money on hand to 1. Pay for the upgrade and 2. Make max interest at the NEXT level.

Example: Going from bank level 2 to 3.  Bank level 3 costs $2.5M credits. At bank level 3 you can make $500k max interest at an 8% Interest rate.  To calculate how much you need to have in your bank account in order to achieve max interest divide the Max Interest ($500k) by the interest rate (8%). $500,000/.08 = $6,250,000.  I call this the [b]“Max Interest Reserve”[/b] which is how much money you need locked away at each bank level to achieve the max daily interest. To know when its time to upgrade, you add the [b]Upgrade Cost[/b] PLUS [b]Max Interest Reserve[/b] together.  I call this the [b]Maximum Upgrade Threshold[/b].  $2,500,000 + $6,250,000 = $8,750,000.  Therefore, the [b]Maximum Upgrade Threshold[/b] when going from bank level 2 to bank level 3 is [b]$8,750,000[/b]. This is how I recommend most players calculate when to upgrade their bank level.

Some of you very clever people may notice that there is a way to begin making more daily interest than waiting to upgrade at the Maximum Upgrade Threshold. And you’d be right!  There is a [b]Minimum Upgrade Threshold[/b] where you can make slightly more interest than you had previously been making before you hit the [b]Max Interest Reserve[/b].  If you want to min/max your game play I’ll leave that for you to figure out! 

Bank levels 1-5: Get these ASAP. This will have cost you $22.2M and 250 RP.  Congratulations, you’re now making $1.5M credits per day.
[b][u][b]3. Now what?[/b][/u][/b]

This is where I see people kind of… trail off.  At this point, you are at a bit of a cross roads.  $1.5M/day is more than enough to play all aspects of the game and truly enjoy it.  If you want to PVP, you’ll be good.  If you want to run every mission and POI in the server, you’ll be able to do most of them - but money won’t be what holds you back (some of them take a lot of people).  You’ll be able to acquire resources off the market so you don’t have to mine as much if you don’t want to.

To me, this is where the game started to get interesting and fun.  In real life I’ve been fairly involved in the real world of making money, running businesses, and investing - and to me - this point is where the economic game of HWS/Empyrion got fun. I’m not satisfied with $1.5M/day are you kidding me?  I need to make $700M for that OCD 7.  I can’t wait 466 days!  If you want to really make the money in the game its time to buckle down and start working for your money and making the big bucks!
[b][u][b]4. Cross Server Warp[/b][/u][/b]

Did you know there was more than one HWS Server (EU and NA)? Did you know you can “warp” between them? I knew about this early on but didn’t realize how effective this could be to the economic game and lost out on a ton of economic growth early on.  Learning how to [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/cross-server-warp-csw/4398]Cross Server Warp[/url] is pretty easy and does not involve going into PVP space.

The way to effectively use CSW is to upgrade your bank level evenly between the 2 servers.  Also get your Gold OAM upgraded on the other side.  You’ll need to CSW every day to collect interest on both sides. (Or alternatively, $1/month [url=https://www.patreon.com/hws/posts]patron[/url] level do your interest for you daily. Note: Still not employed by HWS or anything but once I got my EU bank upgraded a bit I did decide to become a patron.)  You can also use your time on the other server to sell on the market, collect your OAM and refuel it if needed.

Your checklist for making a basic CSW is this:

  - Bring enough Fuel/Oxygen/and Refined Pentaxid for the trip
  - Bring anything you want to list on the other market
  - Do your eb:interest
  - Empty and refuel your OAMs
  - Say in global chat how much more superior your home server is than the one you’re currently in.

[b][u][b]5. Upgrade your other OAMs[/b][/u][/b]

Now that you’re making some money, upgrade the other OAMs to level 10 each. Prioritize whatever is most valuable on the market or that you struggle to get in game. Don’t bother upgrading them until you can get them all the way from 1 to 10 to maximize the efficiency of the cores you have to feed into them.  Getting $1M shouldn’t be too hard for you at this point.
[b][u][b]6. More Bank Upgrades[/b][/u][/b]

I was talking to someone the other day who had been playing for several seasons and he told me that most mid level players shoot for bank level 5.  [i]record scratching sound[/i] What?  I think what most people run into at this point is that the numbers start to get a bit big compared to what they’d been doing and at [i]some[/i] point the upgrades look like they aren’t worth it (actually, I don’t think EB 10 is ever worth it unless you’re supporting the server so it is technically true).  No worries, I got you.

Continuing to upgrade the bank past level 5 [i]for the sake of making a profit over the cost[/i] becomes a calculation in amount of time left in season.  If you are upgrading your bank levels early in the season the increase in interest pays for the upgrade.  I call this the [b]Payback Period[/b]. Here’s an example.  Bank Level 6 costs $25M and moves the Max Interest from $1.5M/day to $2M/day and lowers interest rate from 6% to 5%.  Make sure you have the [b]Maximum Upgrade Threshold[/b] ($65,000,000). You may be wondering why go to level 6 which costs $25M in order to make an extra $500k/day.  Well easy, if there are more than 50 days left in the season then the upgrade was completely free.  The increase from $1.5M/day to $2M/day is a [b]Net Increase[/b] of $500k.  $25M/$500k = 50. 50 days is the [b]Payback Period[/b] for the upgrade. For bank level 7 its 60 days. ([b]Note[/b] The Payback Periods for multiple upgrades pass [i]concurrently[/i] meaning if you do bank level 6 and 7 upgrades on the same day, the [b]Payback Period[/b] is still only 60 days total. (Not 110).) ([b]ALSO NOTE[/b] The [b]Payback Period[/b] for bank level 8 is also only 50 days. If you are carrying over enough money or can quickly earn additional money, Bank level 8 is still worth getting even a month into a 3 month season!)

Also keep in mind, a higher bank level has other benefits relating to the end of season which I’ll get to in a bit.  Even if the [b]payback period[/b] is exactly the amount of time left in the season or even shorter, it still may be worth buying the upgrade but in terms of doing it for a direct profit, this is how you can tell.
[b][u][b]7. Commodity Trading[/b][/u][/b]

I can hear all you old school players now… “Commodity trading isn’t what it used to be” “Its not worth it”.  Pssssssh. Good, keep thinking that. Leaves more for me! (p.s. when I hear how much you guys used to make I cry inside a little.)

I achieved most of my intro/basic goals this season by mining gold.  At some point, mining gold can get a little bit tiring and you just need something else to do… Maybe something a bit more exciting and dangerous. [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/trade-commodity/13865]Commodity trading[/url] may be for you.

To do commodity trading you need a couple of things. 1. A CV that can run/survive in PvP space with a hangar extremely close to your cockpit and 2. Your cave reward ship from earlier or a similar, small SV.  I LOVE killing people running around in the wrong ships.  DO NOT BRING EXTRA STUFF WITH YOU WHEN YOU COMMODITY RUN.

Commodity running is simple, you go to a Racom in Space/System and you buy items at some and sell them at others.  There’s a complicated system of economic prosperity per system and honestly I just figured out that buying in a wealthy playfield and selling in a wealthy playfield was the only thing worth doing.  After initially figuring out my route, I was making about $10M/hr of gameplay.  After getting a bit better at it and really optimizing the run, how it can interact with the market, additional NPC traders I can buy from, making sure to purchase at a couple of locations during my CSW, etc I’m now able to make $25M-$30M per hour of game play running commodities.

Mining Gold was how I got going, Running Commodities is making me rich!
[b][u][b]8. EGS Recycle[/b][/u][/b]

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/egs-recycle-structures/7112]Recycling[/url] is a HUGE source of income/return on investment for a lot of players.  If you are out in PvP doing things like clearing enemy bases or do PvE POIs that get your ships wrecked, getting your recycle level maxed out might be worth it.  I personally haven’t done this but the couple people I’ve spent time with in game who have upped their recycle levels talk about how its one of their top sources of income.  Basically if an enemy base/ship is defeated, what you can do instead of blowing it up is putting your own core in it, then recycling it.  The materials are sent to your OCD and you can either sell those resources on the market or use them to skip having to acquire them yourself.  Generally, I’d consider this a bit more late-game than mid-game but its worth learning where this could have value at this point.

If you have a badly damaged ship that you can’t get to repair, taking it to a Recycle Zone is better than letting it despawn so it can still be a source of saved wealth.
[b][u][b]9. Orbital Cargo Drone Upgrades[/b][/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/4/44390270de491753eca1c4b0d37e86f7e6e81498.jpeg]
image.jpg947×958 93.6 KB[/url]
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/orbital-cargo-drone-ocd/4394]The OCD[/url] is your personal storage system outside of the boxes in your ships/bases.  Since this guide is an economy guide, I’ll be focusing on how the OCD ties in to your economic strategy.  Basically, its a great upgrade for 3 reasons. 1. It maintains your wealth between seasons, 2. You keep the upgrades between seasons, making this a permanent asset, and 3. Its a very good organizational tool.


Early on as I upgraded my OCD I took an “Upgrade it as I fill it” approach.  There isn’t a specific economic need to get upgrades early and you can save your money for bank level upgrades while using your base for storage just like you’ve been doing.  The OCD is helpful for end of season which I’ll cover in a bit.

Getting to OCD level 5 should be your main goal.  OCD level 5 allows you to use OCD commands in any PVE space without having to go to EGS HQ.  This is extremely helpful when smelting and storing gold or generally getting ready/prepping for a run to the market without having to spend a ton of time loading/unloading a ship.
[b][u][b]10. End of Season[/b][/u][/b]

Everything I’ve said up till this point is how you acquire your income/wealth and can be accomplished in a single season if you really push.  If not, you can work to optimize the wealth you’re building to be maintained across seasons so when the server wipes, you lose the least amount of your wealth possible.  Additionally, the end of season can even be a time for you to have [b]MORE WEALTH NEXT SEASON[/b] than you had in this one.

If you have been crushing the economy, you will have more money than you can keep.  Because of this, the value of money changes towards the end of the season and you need to do a calculation between [b]Next Season Value[/b] and [b]Current Season Value[/b]. This difference I call [b]Season Conversion Value[/b]. An ideal  [b]Season Conversion Value[/b] is 1 (100%) or more but in many cases its less than one and we’re trying to maximize what we can get. For example, if you have Gold that you bought from someone at $250 this season, and next season its worth $250 then $250/$250 = 1(100% of value is carried over). However, if you buy gold at $350 to store for next season and its worth $250 next season then $250/$350 = ~.71 (71%)
[b][u][b]10a. End of Season Bank Levels[/b][/u][/b]

If you have more money than you can carry over, an easy place many people look is at bank levels.  Let’s say you have $200M credits and are bank level 5. Bank level 5 will only let you keep $50M of those credits so you stand to lose $150M credits.  Of those $150M credits in today’s current season, you could carry more of them over by upgrading your bank to level 7.  Bank level 6 and 7 would cost you $55M and it would allow you to carry over an extra $20M credits.  So the calculation would be $20M/$55M = .36 (36% of money spent can be saved into next season).  This is one of the worst conversion values I’ve found so upgrading the bank to maintain your wealth is an area of last resort.

([b]However[/b] if you have more than $100M of extra money and are considering paying to keep credits, you may want to consider upgrading all the way to bank level 9 and then paying to keep your bank level instead. Upgrading from 1 to 9 would cost $152.2M next season, will allow you to make $4m/day on day one, and keep $90M credits. Saving yourself the cost of bank upgrades and keeping the additional credits makes keeping the bank level 9 more efficient than paying to keep $100M.  Of course you could always do both =P)
[b][u][b]10b. OCD Gold[/b][/u][/b]

One of the things I’ve found most interesting is that the way Gold preserves wealth in the game.  For example, all season I realized I was on a path to have more money at the end of the season than I’d be able to carry over so I started paying attention to gold on the market and of the gold I was mining, I stopped selling it.  Since gold has a guaranteed value of $250 I was able to figure out that buying gold off the market with my extra money while the price was low and moving it into my OCD was one of the best ways to preserve wealth.  In fact, I realized that I would be carrying more gold into next season than I would need meaning I am already prepping 2 seasons ahead!  For me, I mined more gold than I bought but as a general rule I bought at $325 and lower on the market.  Most of my gold I got at $300.  Even if it was at $325, I achieved a 76% [b]Season Conversion Value[/b].  If you wait until the end of season when everyone else is desperate to preserve their value, the price of gold could go up lowering the [b]Season Conversion Value[/b].  Also, if the price does go up and you need a bit of cash to achieve a final OCD upgrade, you can do this by selling the gold you’ve stockpiled!
[b][u][b]10c. Utility/Replacement Value[/b][/u][/b]

Don’t overload your OCD with gold though. At the start of next season you don’t want to just be standing there with no ships, fuel, ammo, etc looking like a noob.  Make sure that some of your slots are devoted to things you are going to need early in the season to get you up and rolling.  These things have a solid utility value since you’d have to spend time or your money getting the materials!  Some of the top members of the top factions load very little gold into their OCD and instead load war materials.  Remember that money is nice, but it doesn’t shoot things. At the end of the day, winning a war requires a deep reserve of materials! At the end of the day, if you’d have to spend money next season on buying items then you should consider that the gold you’re stuffing will have a decreased [b]Season Conversion Value[/b] since there is an opportunity cost.
[b][u][b]10d. RP[/b][/u][/b]

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-9-teaser-iii-hws-origins-reputation-universe/15923]RP is still something most people don’t understand.[/url] They just see that Bank/OCD cost RP to upgrade so they figure they need some RP to make sure they can do that.  RP can come from many places and a sure source is from joining a faction that has some active players.  Another source of RP is raiding POIs for RP containers.  RP does offer some mid-season benefits including increasing the value of your fa:supply but I was really surprised when I did the math and realized that I would be getting $31M at the start of next season for the RP I had accumulated! RP converts at a rate of $7000 per RP and RP containers can be bought at EGS HQ and EGS Flying City for around $11k.  This gives it a [b]Season Conversion Value[/b] of 63% which isn’t great but given the value added to fa:supply and upgrades, it can be safely worked on all season as a store of value for the next season.  [b]Note:[/b] You only get RP payout at end of season on your [b]MAIN[/b] server. Not both.
[b][u][b]10e. Upgrade your OCD[/b][/u][/b]

One way to achieve a perfect 100% conversion value is to simply upgrade your OCD again.  If you are close to being ready for the next level and you’re going to lose money otherwise, pushing for a final OCD upgrade by selling stuff you have on the market, mining some gold to sell, or doing extra commodity runs may be more worth it than taking a hit.  OCD levels are permanent so its a permanent value to upgrade it!

Chat Command | Description | 
eb:? | Provides you with useful information regarding the bank and its features. | 
eb:info | Displays your Account #, your credits on hand, and your bank balance. | 
eb:upgrade | Upgrades your Elemental Bank level | 
eb:send | Teaches you how to send credits to other players. (e.g. eb:send:account-nr-of-target:AMOUNT). You / your partner get the account number by typing eb:info in chat. | 
eb:cointocr | Removes your gold coins from your inventory and deposits them directly into your bank account. (5% transaction fee unless you are in the Elemental Bank) | 
eb:ingottocr | Removes your gold ingots from your inventory and deposits them directly into your bank account. (15% transaction fee outside the Elemental Bank, 5% in the Elemental Bank Zone. Check your EB Level regarding reducing the fee) | 
eb:payout:X or eb:payout:all | Withdraw credits from your bank account. (5% transaction fee unless you are in the Elemental Bank) | 
eb:payin:X or eb:payin:all | Deposit credits into your bank account. (5% transaction fee unless you are in the Elemental Bank) | 
eb:interest | ONLY available with Elemental Bank level 5. Activates your daily interest for delivery globally. No need to visit EB zones anymore. |

Chat Command | Description | 
do:? | Provides you with useful information regarding Supporter features. | 
do:info | Displays your Supporter info and packages left. | 
do:re | Uses a resource package. (up to 10. Every 10 hours +1) | 
do:bp | Allows you to instantly spawn the blueprint that is currently in production. (up to 10. Every 10 hours +1) | 
do:rp:ac | If you purchased for an Alien Core this command gives you one. (rp stands for Resource Package.) | 
do:ac:id | After you placed your Alien Core to your structure you have to set it back to your faction in your Control Panel. | 
do:rp:xs | If you purchased for a Resource Package XS, you can claim it with that command. | 
do:rp:s | If you purchased for a Resource Package S, you can claim it with that command. | 
do:rp:m | If you purchased for a Resource Package M, you can claim it with that command. | 
do:rp:l | If you purchased for a Resource Package L, you can claim it with that command. | 
do:rp:xl | If you purchased for a Resource Package XL, you can claim it with that command. |

Chat Command | Description | 
sg:? | Provides you with useful information regarding HWS Supergate Zones, Destinations, etc… | 
sg:warp:destination | Warps you, your Passengers or your docked ships to the Destination Supergate listed with sg:?. Make sure that the Passenger does NOT use this command - only the Pilot. |

[b]Important Note:[/b] Faction Missions are still a work-in-progress feature with one important technical constraint:

[b]Mission progress will not be saved[/b]
This means: Other than for Singleplayer Missions and the Tutorial Chapters, a Faction Mission needs to be completed in ONE pass. If you deactivate the mission, progress will be lost (a warning will be displayed, though). Same happens if the mission leader leaves the server.

This behaviour will be improved as soon as possible. Until then, we have set up the Faction Missions in a way that should allow having fun, but not needing to invest hours and hours and risk loosing progress.
Russian:
[b]Важное примечание:[/b] Фракционные миссии по-прежнему находятся в стадии разработки с одним важным техническим ограничением:

[b]Прогресс миссии не сохраняется[/b]
Это означает: за исключением Сингплеер миссий и Обучающих глав, Фракционная миссия должна быть завершена за один проход. Если вы деактивируете миссию, прогресс будет потерян (хотя будет отображаться предупреждение). То же самое происходит, если Лидер миссии покидает сервер.

Такое поведение будет улучшено как можно скорее. А пока мы создали Фракционные миссии таким образом, чтобы они позволяли получать удовольствие, но не требовали тратить часы и часы и рисковать потерей прогресса.

English:
[i]"Those commands will come handy in the future, if we have local based HWS Trader again. For now use HWS Connect.
"[/i]

------------------------

Chat Command | Description | 
tn:? | Provides you with useful information regarding the HWS NPC Trader. | 
tn:info | Shows you some information like your available credits for example. | 
tn:buy | Buys 1 current package for the given price if you are in the NPC Trading Zone. | 
tn:buy:x | Buys x packages for the given price if you are in the NPC Trading Zone. (obsolete for now). Use [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect.html]HWS Connect[/url] to make full use of this feature! |

Chat Command | Description | 
ts:? | Provides you with useful information regarding Ship Trading in the HWS Garage Zone. | 
ts:price | Shows you the current price of the nearest ship to you in the trading zone. | 
ts:pricelist | Prints a list of all current prices of the ships in the trading zone. | 
ts:buy | Buys the nearest ship to you. | 
ts:buy:id | Buys a specific ship with the given ID. | 
ts:sell:PRICE | Lists your nearest ship for the desired price for others to buy. Use ts:sell 0 to cancel your sale. |

Chat Command | Description | 
fa:? | Provides you with useful information regarding Origin / Faction commands. | 
fa:info | Shows you your actual Reputation Points and other details about you and your faction / origin | 
fa:supply | Every week you can get your Origin supply package by typing this command. However you need at least 1 RP to get it and meet all origin specific conditions. | 
fa:scan | Activates / Deactivates the global scan ability. However turning it on cost you 10RP and keeping it active consumes 15RP per day. To use this ability check [url=https://empyrion-homeworld.net/hws-connect.html]HWS Connect[/url] > HWS Universe. There you see then how many structures are in what playfield. |

English:
This topic will contain a table of contents[b][u]
Empyrion Admin Helper[/u][/b]

Using Jascha’s exclusive Tool :  [b]Empyrion Admin Helper[/b] (EAH), we have modified many of Empyrion’s gameplay elements and enriched the gaming experience to a much higher level - bringing unique features to HWS.

Not only do we provide the best support possible, but we’re actively taking part in the game development process with features that are unique to and created by HWS.   Some of these features include the Orbital Cargo Drone, Origin Planets, Orbital Auto Miners, Reputation Points, Elemental Banking, and much more…  most of them fall under the umbrella of our in-game [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/elemental-galactic-services-introduction/5617]EGS Organization[/url]. These elements, features and tools are what set HWS apart and they are driven largely by [b]Your[/b] feedback and requests!


Below are all four Feature Categories:
[b][u]
Elemental Galactic Services[/u][/b]

[i]As long as you have RP and Credits, you are in business.[/i]

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-features-egs]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-features-egs[/url]

[b][u]
HWS Connect[/u][/b]

[i]Enhance your overall gameplay - with your web browser or mobile device.[/i]

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-connect]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-connect[/url]

[b][u]
Economy[/u][/b]

[i]If you think only war can make you rich, you’re mistaken.[/i]

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-features-economy]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-features-economy[/url]

[b][u]
Special Features[/u][/b]

[i]Set yourself apart from and above the rest.[/i]

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-features-special]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/c/hws-guide/hws-features-special[/url]

We are incredibly proud of our unique and exclusive features and are very happy to offer them in both Europe and North America.  We remain committed to their continuous improvement for the sake and benefit our fantastic community of loyal players.

English: EGS have sent you a little supply, just in case those numbers mean anything...
Take them fast as long as they are hot!

[i]Q: What are map markers?[/i]
A1: You can set notifiactions freely on your map. Just RMB on a spot on the MAP and give it a name. This will add your marker to your personal list.
  A2: When you open the MAP, you will find your Map Markers in the upper right tab.

[i]Q: How do i add a map marker?[/i]
1. Press M
2. RMB on any place on the map
3. Add a name
4. ACCEPT

[i]Q: What is the WAYPOINT checkbox doing?[/i]
If you check this box, the marker will change to orange and will give you a direction. The marker can be seen through the playfield terrain.

[i]Q: What is REMOVE ON APPROACH checkbox doing?[/i]
If you only want to set a temporary marker, check this together with waypoint and the waypoint mode will be cleared from your Hud when approaching (~50m)

[i]Q: What are the 2-letter buttons on the right side doing?[/i]
PV = your private list of markers
PU = public list of markers. Use the SC button to share your PV marker to the PU list
SM = show marker on the map
ED = edit highlighted marker (you can also RMB the marker on the map)
RM = remove highligthed marker (also possible with RMB the marker on the map)
SC = Share marker to PU list

[i]Q: Can i also add a map marker in space?[/i]
Of course!
Français:
[i]Q: Comment utiliser les marqueurs ?[/i]
Les marqueurs sont des points GPS qui vous permettent de définir des lieux sur la carte, afin de pouvoir vous y rendre facilement grâce à votre mini-carte radar.

[i]Q: Comment ajouter un marqueur?[/i]
1- Ouvrez la carte (M)
2- Clic droit sur un lieu choisi sur la carte
3- Donnez un nom au lieu
4- Accepter

Quand vous ouvrez la carte, vous pouvez voir la liste de vos marqueurs dans la fenêtre 'MARQUEURS GPS', en haut à droite (accessible via petite icône).

[i]Q: case à cocher 'Waypoint' ?[/i]
Si vous cochez cette option, le marqueur sera affiché en jaune, et une flèche jaune vous en indiquera la direction sur la mini-carte radar. Cette option est pratique pour distinguer le point à atteindre au milieu des autres marqueurs définis.

[i]Q: case à cocher 'Supprimer en approche' ?[/i]
Si vous cochez cette option, le marqueur sera temporaire, il disparaitra une fois le lieu atteint
Russian:
[i]В: Что такое маркеры карты?[/i]
A1: Вы можете свободно устанавливать маркеры на своей карте. Просто ПКМ на карте и дайте ему имя. Это добавит ваш маркер в ваш личный список.
 A2: Когда вы открываете карту, вы найдете свои маркеры в верхней правой вкладке.

[i]В: Как добавить маркер карты?[/i]
1. Нажмите M
2. ПКМ на любом месте карты
3. Добавьте имя
4. ПРИНЯТЬ

[i]В: Что делает флажок Маркер?[/i]
Если вы установите этот флажок, маркер изменится на оранжевый и даст вам направление. Маркер можно увидеть на игровом поле даже через ландшафт.

[i]В: Что делает флажок УДАЛИТЬ ПО ДОСТИЖЕНИИ?[/i]
Если вы хотите установить временный маркер, включите это и маркер будет удален по достижении этой точки (~ 50 м)

[i]В: Что представляют собой 2-буквенные кнопки с правой стороны?[/i]
PV = ваш личный список маркеров
PU = Открытый список маркеров. Используйте кнопку SC, чтобы перевести маркер PV в список PU
SM = показать маркер на карте
ED = редактировать выделенный маркер (вы также можете ПКМ на маркере на карте)
RM = удалить первый маркер из списка (также возможно с помощью ПКМ на карте)
SC = Добавить маркер в список PU

[i]В: Могу ли я добавить маркер на карту в космосе?[/i]
Конечно!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：地图标记是啥？[/i]
答1：你可以通过地图标记功能自由的标记你的地图。只需要打开地图在地图上按“鼠标右键”并且命名。这样的标记会加入到你的私人标记列表中。
答2：当你打开地图时，你会在右上“地图标记”页面下的列表中找到你的地图标记点。

[i]问：怎样添加一处地图标记？[/i]
第一步，按M
第二步，鼠标右键在地图上点击所需要标记的位置
第三步，输入标记名称
第四步，点击“确认”

[i]问：追踪复选框做什么用？[/i]
如果你点选了复选框，地图标记会变成橘黄色，并给与你一个径直的方向确认。此时地图标记会穿透地形贴图显示。

[i]问：“到达后删除”复选框呢？[/i]
如果你只是要临时标记一处地点，同时点选此框和追踪框，这样地图标记和追踪会在你到达目的附近（约50米范围）时自动删除。

[i]问：地图标记页面下的一系列按键干啥用？[/i]
私人（Private） = 你只能自己看到的标记
公共（Public）= 所有人都能看到的标记。
在地图上显示（Show On Map）= 在地图上显示标记
编辑（Edit）= 编辑点选的标记（你也可以通过再次鼠标右键点击地图标记实现此功能）
删除（Remove） = 删除点选的标记（同样可以通过再次鼠标右键点击地图标记实现此功能）
发布（Share(Public)）= 发布私人标记给公共；复制（Copy to private list）= 复制公共标记到私人列表
共享（Share(faction)）= 发布标记给派系成员

[i]问：在太空中可以地图标记么？[/i]
当然！
Greek:
[i]Ε: Τι είναι ένας δείκτης χάρτη;[/i]
Α1: Μπορείς να ορίσεις ελεύθερα έναν δείκτη στον χάρτη. Απλά πάτα το Δεξί κλικ του Ποντικιού σε ένα σημείο στον ΧΑΡΤΗ και δώσε του ένα όνομα. Αυτό θα βάλει έναν δείκτη στην προσωπική σου λίστα.
 Α2: Όταν ανοίγεις τον ΧΑΡΤΗ, θα βρεις τους Δείκτες του Χάρτη στην επάνω δεξιά καρτέλα.

[i]Ε: Πώς βάζω έναν δείκτη στον Χάρτη;[/i]
1. Πάτησε το M
2. Πάτησε Δεξί κλικ του Ποντικιού οπουδήποτε θες στον χάρτη.
3. Δώσε ένα Όνομα
4. ACCEPT

[i]Ε: Τι κάνει το πεδίο επιλογής ΣΗΜΕΙΟ ΔΙΑΔΡΟΜΗΣ;[/i]
Εάν κλικάρεις αυτό το κουτί, ο δείκτης θα αλλάξει σε πορτοκαλί και θα σου δείξει μία διαδρομή. Ο δείκτης είναι ορατός μόνο στο πεδίο που παίζεις.

[i]Ε: Τι είναι το πεδίο ΑΦΑΙΡΕΣΗ ΚΑΤΑ ΤΗΝ ΑΦΙΞΗ;[/i]
Εάν θες να βάλεις ένα προσωρινό δείκτη, επέλεξε αυτό μαζί με το σημείο διαδρομής και ο δείκτης θα εξαφανιστεί όταν πλησιάζεις στο σημείο αυτό (~50μ)

[i]Ε: Τι είναι το κουμπί με τα 2 γράμματα στην επάνω δεξιά πλευρά;[/i]
PV = λίστα με τους προσωπικούς σου δείκτες
PU = δημόσιοι δείκτες. Χρησιμοποίησε το κουμπί SC για να μοιραστείς εάν δείκτη PV στην λίστα με τους PU δείκτες
SM = εμφάνιση του δείκτη στον χάρτη
ED = Επεξεργασία επιλεγμένου δείκτη (μπορείς επίσης να πατήσεις δεξί κλικ επάνω στον δείκτη του χάρτη)
RM = Αφαίρεση επιλεγμένου δείκτη (επίσης δυνατό με το δεξί κλικ επάνω στον δείκτη του χάρτη)
SC = Κοινή Χρήση δείκτη στην λίστα με τους δείκτες PU

[i]E: Μπορώ να βάλλω ένα δείκτη στο διάστημα;[/i]
Φυσικά!
