English:
[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/3/37e51fb8243770713ba4c1b7097a647afa327731.jpeg]
image.jpg1271×1212 144 KB[/url]

[b][u]Personal Teleportation Device[/u][/b]

  - Let’s you [b]teleport[/b] to given Planets or Orbits
  - The usage cost [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/elemental-bank-eb/4395]Elemental Bank (EB)[/url] credits and [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-reputation-points/4388]HWS Reputation Points[/url]
  - You have to [b]empty your backpack[/b] before usage or it will get wiped by the system
  - It [b]cost you 100 Health[/b] per usage due universal instability

[b][u]Playfield Infos[/u][/b]

  - You can see important information about Planets and Orbits
  - Very interesting to see Playfield specific notes before you even discovered it. For example if a Playfield is PvP or PvE

[b][u]Playfield Stats[/u][/b]

  - Even more statistics about Planets and Orbits can be found here
  - HWS has [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/4-limits-restrictions/4363]4. Limits & Restrictions[/url] so check the Playfields out before even enter them

[b][u]Global Scan[/u][/b]



[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/5/53402a9dc3f3777bdf3581d68a9c4e02302ea09c.jpeg]
image.jpg1257×450 30.7 KB[/url]


  - If you have [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/origin-faction-commands/19315]fa:scan[/url] activated, you will see the number of cores in every playfield instead of [b]???[/b] - shown above
  - Attractive for PvP Hunters
  - The command [b]fa:scan[/b] gives you the best playfield overview and indicates which are PvP or PvE and what restrictions may apply

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/0/02b9026807a914ec6c44b82be08b0808984b2d03.jpeg]
image.jpg1275×657 60.7 KB[/url]


Currently available under the “Hunter Board” page.
[b][u]Who is online[/u][/b]

  - Check who is currently online on the HWS Servers even if you do not play
  - Filter the table as you wish by clicking on the column headers
  - Open the menu at the right (three dots) to get more options

[b][u]Interaction Menu[/u][/b]



  - If you are a [url=https://patreon.com/hws]HWS Patron[/url], you can whisper to that player directly
  - If you are a HWS Patron, you can send [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/elemental-bank-eb/4395]Elemental Bank (EB)[/url] credits to that player directly
  - Set a Bounty on that player

[url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/uploads/default/original/2X/f/f4ae0ba70aa98fb28fe84a341a09a46626189e02.jpeg]
image.jpg1018×524 58.9 KB[/url]


As incentive to use HWS Connect on daily basis and to make it more lucrative for Casual gamer with jobs and family, we have implemented a Daily Loot system.
[b][u]Cycle based[/u][/b]

  - There is always a global 28 days cycle available for everyone
  - If you start at day 1 of the cycle you are able to grab every Daily Loot until the end
  - If you skip one day of 28, you can max. collect 27 loot rewards - you will miss the last x100 HWS RP for example

[b][u]Random Loot[/u][/b]

  - There is a loot table available with random loot for everyone
  - The small loot boxes contains a smaller quantity of those items
  - The big loot boxes contains a larger quantity of those items above and additionally a chance to get Epic loot as well as [url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-ingot/14844]HWS Ingots[/url] 

[b][u]Usage[/u][/b]

  - Go to your Dashboard and click at the Daily Loot button, then on the available loot for that day




  - You have to be online to claim your Daily Loot
  - Exception to get it passively is by becoming a [url=https://patreon.com/hws]HWS Patron[/url]

The HWS Universe offers many places to live - from easy to difficult, from PvE to PvP.To not stop at being a sandbox game we offer you an incentive to explore and settle at special Planets or Orbits.
[b][u]How do you get rewards?[/u][/b]

There are certain criteria you have to fulfill:

  - Your structure needs to be a [b]Base[/b]
  - Your structure needs to be [b]set to your Faction[/b]
  - Your structure needs to have [b]1000 Blocks or more[/b]
  - Your structure needs to be [b]powered[/b]
  - Your structure needs to [b]survive at least for 24 hours[/b]

[b][u]What locations give you rewards?[/u][/b]

  - Pandora - [b]PvP[/b] (Planet)
  - Homeworld - [b]PvP[/b] (Planet)
  - Desertworld - [b]PvP[/b] (Planet)
  - Iceworld - [b]PvP[/b] (Planet)
  - Lavaworld - [b]PvP[/b] (Planet)
  - Triton - [b]PvE[/b] (Planet)

[b][u]What reward do you get?[/u][/b]

  - Pandora: [b]10 HWS RP[/b] and [b]10 000 EB credits[/b] per day
  - Homeworld: [b]7 HWS RP[/b] and [b]7000 EB credits[/b] per day
  - Desertworld: [b]5 HWS RP[/b] and [b]5000 EB credits[/b] per day
  - Iceworld: [b]5 HWS RP[/b] and [b]5000 EB credits[/b] per day
  - Lavaworld: [b]5 HWS RP[/b] and [b]5000 EB credits[/b] per day
  - Triton: [b]3 HWS RP[/b] and [b]3000 EB credits[/b] per day


[i]"[b]Note:[/b] From season to season locations and rewards can get changed. Keep an eye on this guide here.
"[/i]

Press [c][fdb100]F1[-][/c] and find in the [c][fdb100]Empyriopedia[-][/c] the HWS sections
Start by reading the HWS Rules and FAQ to get a first impression.

HWS has its goal to provide you the best Empyrion Multiplayer server. However this means that things are different here than in Singleplayer (Vanilla). With the help of the community and 4+ years experience we changed couple of Config values. NPCs have for example more health, your weapons do damage based on the material (Rock-Paper-Scissors system) and so on.

Nevertheless we try to be as much compatible with Vanilla and thus the workshop as possible.
You can verify what devices might be disallowed or the problem by typing in [b][c][ffffff]Singleplayer [-][/c][/b]in the console
[c][ffffff]prefabinfo 'your blueprint name'[-][/c]
Google "HWS Empyrion Config" to get our HWS Config.
Russian: На HWS много Дилеров миссий и квестов, действующих по всей Вселенной. Эти миссии и квесты являются отличным способом, чтобы познакомиться со Вселенной и особенностями HWS. Однако самое главное: они дают вам большую награду  - если вам это удаётся.

English: There are couple of ways to find out what is different on HWS.\nThe most important thing to check are your blueprints. If it's red or orange in your blueprint factory, you can check what blocks/items are different on HWS.

Или просто подождать до 2 минут, стоя рядом с ним.

[fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-]\nHere you can see your blueprinted structures and prefab ships from the game.\nIf you want even more blueprints, you can go to the steam workshop and subscribe to it.
The Base must be underground. Search for its teleporter, use it and come back.
[019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-] You found the Alien Worm Base Y. Search now for its teleporter, use it and come back.
Open the yellow Shutter Door at the floor of EGS Cave RMX.

The yellow Shutter Door at the floor opens, when all the correct levers are activated.


Find and count all the same symbols in the nine Caves.
Activate the correct lever for the respective symbol.
Find the last seen coordinates of the Alien Worms.\nExamine the Giant Alienworm Research protective Bunker.\nSomewhere the coordinates must have been noted.
At Professor Void's notes wall you found hints. There is a secret room in his house.\nFind it!
Use the correct code to open the door
Solve the Pussle on Prof. Voids Notes Wall.\nYou have to find four POIs and its for numbers.\nThe hints in the secret room, show you the right order of the numbers.
[019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-] You found all relevant POIs for this mission.\nHopefully, you found and noted the four numbers. You will need them soon.
[019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-] Theeeere it is! Wow, finally you found it, good job!\nNow it seems, you need the four numbers in correct order to enter the next door.
Press [b][fdb100]ALT + O[-][/b] again to save your actual structure.

Look at your structure (SV) and press [b][fdb100]ALT + O[-][/b] again to save your actual structure in your Blueprint Library

Did not work? Maybe look straight forward or a bit up.
If you look down, the game doesn't recognize the blueprint, but your body...
Place a [b][fdb100]Cargo Box[-][/b] on your SV
Place a Cargo Box on your SV
Place protecting [b][fdb100]Window Blocks around[-][/b] your cockpit (Rotate: [b][fdb100]Delete[-][/b] and [b][fdb100]End[-][/b] keys)

In space it may be very cold. Make sure, to build an airtight hull around your cockpit.

Use the Rotation Keys to rotate it:

Rotation Axis + = Insert
Rotation Axis - = Delete
Rotate Block + = Home
Rotate Block - = End

[b][c][fdb100]Congratulations![-][/c][/b]
Wow, you have come this far!

Have fun exploring the universe.
Have always enough Fuel and Pentaxid with you.

[b][c][fdb100]You have so much power now![-][/c][/b] 
Please continue learning, my precious Clone.

English:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
To complete your Tutorial, we go through building a Base and CV at the end. I will help you by transporting some core items into your inventory.
[c][fdb100][u]REMEMBER[/u]: everything you build here on the Start Tutorial planet, will be wiped after 7 days[-][/c]. So don't spend too much time with our test base.

To build further Bases later on, you will need to harvest more materials like Iron, Copper, Silicon and Cobalt.
Craft yourself a [b][c][fdb100]Drill[-][/c][/b], it is a bit stronger and faster in harvesting than the Survival & Detector Tool.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]

Почувствуйте себя как дома и постройте свою базу здесь.
На ней не происходят вайпы.


Конечно, вы можете также поискать другие планеты для строительства своего дома.
Там есть несколько хороших.
Для того, чтобы построить свою Базу, вам нужно будет собрать больше материалов, таких как железо, медь, кремний и кобальт.
Вам лучше изготовить [b][c][fdb100]Бур[-][/c][/b], он немного мощнее и быстрее при добыче, чем инструмент выживания.

English:
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] Very well done! 

With your new Level, you get some confidential informations from me:
Your Clone Body is the product of the EGS Corporation. They do not hide this information, but they don't say it publicly either. I think it is because, their efforts do not always end positively... You are lucky, that you are alive and your brain is working well!
Deutsch:
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] Very well done! 
 
With your new Level, you get some confidential informations from me:
Your Clone Body is the product of the EGS Corporation. They do not hide this information, but they don't say it publicly either. I think it is because, their efforts do not always end positively... You are lucky, that you are alive and your brain is working well!
Russian:
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] Очень хорошо сделано! 
Вы почти готовы [b][c][fdb100]исследовать глубины Вселенной[-][/c][/b].
Вам нужен всего лишь Космический корабль теперь, чтобы преодолевать большие расстояния! БС подобен МС, но с более крупными блоками и более мощными устройствами.

Я наградил вас ценными [b][c][fdb100]Компонентами[-][/c][/b].

С новым уровнем, вы получаете некоторые конфиденциальные сведения от меня:
Ваше клонированное тело является продуктом корпорации EGS. Они не скрывают эту информацию, но они не говорят об этом публично. Я думаю, что это происходит потому, что их усилия не всегда заканчиваются положительно ... Вам повезло, что вы живы, и ваш мозг работает хорошо!

English:
[b][c][fdb100]Congratulations! You completed the HWS Tutorial / Prototype Prologue![-][/c][/b]
The HWS Universe is a "living" thing. Depending on your action it can grow or not.

Dive into the HWS Story and what all of that means.
You will see, it is just the beginning...

English:
ECC is an important Planet to know.
It is the location of the Headquarter of EGS - the Hotspot of HWS Feature Zones like [c][fdb100][b]HWS Marketplace[/b][-][/c], [b][c][8000ff]HWS Garage[-][/c][/b], [b][c][0080ff]Elemental Bank[-][/c][/b] and [b][c][019245]EGS Services[-][/c][/b].

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Remember, that I am here to make your feature experience easier. 
My website is free and your data will not be shared:
[c][019245][u]https://connect.hws.global[/u][-][/c]

English: The next mission is a bit more challenging.\nBut with your trained brain, you can master it!
Russian:
[b][c][fdb100]Поздравляем![-][/c][/b]
[c][fdb100][b]
[/b][-][/c]Вы получили новое достижение:
Теперь вы [b][c][fdb100]Клон уровня 7[-][/c][/b]


Следующая миссия является немного более сложной.
Но с обученным мозгом, вы сможете справиться с ней!

English:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Your next step is to leave this planet as soon as possible.
This is important, because it is too dangerous to live here a long time.
[c][fdb100](Planet wipe every 7 days. Type cb:wipe in your private chat for detailed info)[-][/c]
You will find your home planet out there very quick.

Let's build a small vessel (SV) for your short trip through the space!
I have a step by step tutorial for you and teleport core items to your inventory, so you can easily follow.
Russian:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Ваш следующий шаг должен покинуть эту планету как можно скорее.
Это важно, потому что слишком опасно жить здесь долго.
[c][fdb100](Вайп планеты каждые 7 дней. Наберите cb:wipe в вашем приватном чате для информации)[-][/c]
Вы найдете себе родную планету, там очень быстро.

Давайте построим небольшое судно (МС) для быстрой поездки через пространство!
У меня есть пошаговый учебник для вас, так что вы можете следовать ему.

English: Travel through the universe and find the ECC System.
Fly to [b][fdb100]ECC Planet[-][/b] with a SV
Enter the atmosphere of the ECC Planet. Make sure to travel there with a SV, because bigger ships are not allowed.
Find the [fdb100][b]Origin Change Triolith[/b][-] on ECC
Travel around the ECC planet and search for the Origin Change Triolith
Don't forget, that you can choose another container type and size by left clicking before placing it.
Place [b][c][fdb100]10[-][/c][/b] Wood or Stone or Steel [b][c][fdb100]Blocks[-][/c][/b]
Farm trees for wood,\nrocks for cement or\niron for steel.
Press F3 and unlock [b][fdb100]Small Constructor for Base[-][/b]
Needed to craft faster and get more recipes. Make sure, you unlock every following item from the [b][fdb100]Base Tab[-][/b]!
The cargo box is very important and needed to connect with all of the processing devices.
Press F3 and unlock [b][fdb100]Fuel Tank (T1) for Base[-][/b]
Needed to supply the base with energy.
Here you can put in your fuel packs.
Press F3 and unlock [b][fdb100]Small Generator for Base[-][/b]
This is the last device to make your basic base devices complete.

[fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-]
Needed to craft faster and get more recipes. 
[b][fdb100]Connect it with your Cargo Box[-][/b], where you put all the ingredients.
Face it, press F. The Crafting Panel opens.
Choose the Cargo Box at the INPUT Dropdown on the left area.

[fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-]\nThe cargo box is very important and needed to connect with all of the processing devices.\nDon't forget, that you can choose another container type and size by right clicking before placing it.
Place your [b][fdb100]Base Starter Block[-][/b] on the ground
If you are near other POIs the Starter block won't be able to place down. Travel around the planet and search for a free spot.
Press [fdb100][b]ALT + O[/b][-] to save your structure in your Blueprint Library

Press [b][fdb100]ALT + O[-][/b] to save your structure in your Blueprint Library

Did not work? Maybe look straight forward or a bit up.
If you look down, the game doesn't recognize the blueprint, but your body...

[c][fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-][/c]
Now it is to you to [b][c][fdb100]unlock[-][/c][/b] and [b][c][fdb100]craft[-][/c][/b] all needed devices and blocks.
I make you a list of all actually needed blocks on the right of your screen.
Good luck!
[c][fdb100]Hint: Spawn your base near a lake.[-][/c] It is convenient to have a [b][c][fdb100]Water Generator[-][/c][/b] nearby.
[b][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/b]\nThe [fdb100][b]Origin Change Triolith[/b][-] must be somewhere on this planet.

[b][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/b]
Click on the Tab [b][fdb100]Empyriopedia[-][/b].[019245][b]
[/b][-]There you find many important informations about HWS.
Check out the orange Headlines. 
Click on their triangles to see the chapters.
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]\nFollow the yellow waypoint on your HUD\nto the [b][c][fdb100]Info Room[-][/c][/b] and the [c][fdb100][b]HWS Connect Sign[/b][-][/c].

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Please feel free to check out all the different features, that [b][c][019245]HWS[-][/c][/b] and [b][c][019245]HWS Connect[-][/c][/b] have to offer!
I highly recommend to check out and login to the [c][019245][u]HWS Connect Website[/u][-][/c]. https://connect.hws.global.
This is the best and complete HWS experience.

Let's continue where the real fun is, shall we?

[b][c][fdb100]Hello and welcome to HWS![-][/c][/b]
You need more information about how HWS is used to be played?
Then you are right here.

The most features are activatable with commands.
Check them out on the HWS Website:
[u][c][019245][url=https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-commands-info/19304]https://forum.empyrion-homeworld.net/t/hws-commands-info/19304[/url][-][/c][/u]

Also you can login to HWS Connect website to have the best overview:
[c][019245][u][url=https://connect.hws.global/]https://connect.hws.global[/url][/u][-][/c]

Вам необходима дополнительная информация о том, как играть на HWS ?
Тогда вы там, где нужно.


Большинство функций активируется командами.

English:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
HWS has a lot of additional content compared to other servers or regular SP vanilla gameplay.
Hence, the learning curve is higher.
With this Info Room it will help to always check what major additions are implemented in HWS.
Russian:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
В этой миссии я покажу вам злачные места в штаб-квартире EGS -  такие как [c][fdb100][b]HWS Marketplace[/b][-][/c], [b][c][8000ff]HWS Garage[-][/c][/b], [b][c][0080ff]Elemental Bank[-][/c][/b] и [b][c][019245]EGS Services[-][/c][/b].


После этого, вы также получите указатель в комнату Info, где вы можете прочитать о главных особенностях игры на HWS .

English: Travel to the Blue Dwarf System and
Is located in the Blue Dwarf System.\nOnly SVs on Triton allowed.

[b][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/b]
Status of this Planet: 
Completely destroyed human settlements.
It looks as if they had been swallowed up by the ground.
Planet captured by Aliens.

[b][019245]HWS Connect: [-][/b]
Well done! You have reached the famous EGS HQ very fast! 
For this good performance you received a reward! (in your inventory)

Take your time and discover great missions, trades and more!
Russian:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect: [-][/c][/b]
Отлично! Вы прибыли на знаменитый [c][e1a60b]EGS HQ[-][/c] очень быстро! 
За отличную работу ты получил награду (уже в инвентаре)

Потратьте время и откройте для себя больше миссий, сделок и многое другое!

English:
[b][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/b]
Ok, this was a really hard hunt. Some Alien Worms undermined all human settlements on this planet. 
This completely destroyed them. But the story is not finished yet. Search for the Alien Worm Bases, examine them and understand what happened on the opponents side.



Did you found the [fdb100][b]Coordinates of the Phoenix[/b][-] in EGS Cave RMX, too? 
This is part of a side Quest "[4fe4ff]Quest | The Phoenix Mission[-]". It can be found and activated in 'SoloMission' Tab of your PDA (F1)
Manually activate the side Quest for now, do its first two tasks.
Afterwards reactivate this actual Mission again "[4fe4ff]Triton Adventure Mission[-]" and go on finding the other Caves on Triton.
You can finish the Phoenix Mission later by activating it again.

[b][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/b]
Congratulations, you have activated the correct levers![019245][b]
[/b][-]The yellow shutter door at the floor opened.
Run run, what can you find down there?
Use one of the [c][fdb100]5 Story Teleporter[-][/c]
The difficulty on the planet you will travel is dependent on the Teleporter you choose. [c][fdb100]Check the preview images[-][/c] to get more information.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Phew, this was tough!!!

You won against the alien worms, which only were Professor Voids Drilling machines. 
The aliens stole and converted them to destroying machines. 
Now you cleaned all the bases good Job!

[c][4fe4ff]·····✧···············✧···•´`•. *•.¸`•.¸ ✺ ¸.•´¸.•*.•´`•···✧···············✧·····[-][/c]

Explore the universe, find other challenging Quests everywhere.
The story goes on in the next season.

Now you can go on and finish for example [c][4fe4ff]The Phoenix Mission[-][/c].
Russian:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Уф, это было трудно!!!


Вы победили инопланетных червей, которые были всего лишь буровыми машинами профессора Void.
Инопланетяне похитили и превратили их в разрушающие машины.
Теперь вы очистили все Базы, отличная работа !
[c][4fe4ff]·····✧···············✧···•´`•. *•.¸`•.¸ ✺ ¸.•´¸.•*.•´`•···✧···············✧·····[-][/c]

[c][4fe4ff]·····✧···············✧···•´`•. *•.¸`•.¸ ✺ ¸.•´¸.•*.•´`•···✧···············✧·····[-][/c]

[c][4fe4ff]
[-][/c]
Теперь вы можете пойти дальше и закончить, например [c][4fe4ff]Миссию Феникс[-][/c]. 

Исследуйте Вселенную, ищите другие квесты повсюду.
История продолжится в следующем сезоне.

English: Unlock the Medical Devices in your Tech Tree. To be found in Base tab.\nThe Tech Tree also tells you in which constructor the device is craftable. Watch out for the [b][c][fdb100]colorful squares[-][/c][/b]. [b][c][fdb100]Legend[-][/c][/b] is at the bottom of the Tech Tree window.\nA Medical Device is craftable in a [b][c][fdb100]Large Constructor[-][/c][/b] and an Advanced Constructor.You can use it to increase your health.

[c][fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-][/c]
Unlock the Medical Devices in your Tech Tree. To be found in Base tab. Then craft it in your Constructor.
With [b][c][fdb100]RMB[-][/c][/b] you can choose what Type you want to have.
You can use it to increase your health.
These ones can heal different status effects.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Wow, you did this great!
Look at this awesome ship!
It will be your loyal companion.
Russian:
[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Ничего себе, вы сделали это великолепно!
Посмотрите на этот удивительный корабль!
Он будет вашим верным спутником.

English:
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] Very well done! 

You are almost there to [b][c][fdb100]explore the depths of the universe[-][/c][/b].
You only need a Spaceship now, that can warp large distances: A [c][ffffff]Capital Vessel (CV)[-][/c]!
The CV is like a SV, but with bigger blocks and more powerful devices, able to jump more Light Years.
Russian: [c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] Очень хорошо сделано! \nВы почти готовы, чтобы исследовать Вселенную.

English:
Add another 2 Steel Blocks. You find some in your inventory.
[b][c][fdb100]Retrieve[-][/c][/b] Blocks with the [b][c][fdb100]Multitool T2[-][/c][/b].
Hint:
Make sure to have [c][fdb100]Retrieve[-][/c] selected. [c][fdb100]Salvage[-][/c] only gives you the [c][fdb100]Components[-][/c] back.

Add 2 Steel Blocks. You find some in your inventory.\nYou can click the [b][c][fdb100]RMB[-][/c][/b] while a building block is selected in your toolbar. \nA window opens, where you can [b][c][fdb100]choose another shape[-][/c][/b].
For [b][c][fdb100]retrieving blocks[-][/c][/b] it is necessary to be in a free to build area.\nHit M and make sure, you are [b][c][fdb100]NOT in a yellow colored area[-][/c][/b] near another base.
For [b][c][fdb100]retrieving blocks[-][/c][/b] it is necessary to be in a 'free to build' area.\nHit M and make sure, you are [b][c][fdb100]NOT in a yellow colored area[-][/c][/b] near another base.

Use the Rotation Keys to rotate the thrusters:

Rotation Axis + = Insert
Rotation Axis - = Delete
Rotate Block + = Home
Rotate Block - = End
Add [b][c][fdb100]2 additional Thrusters[-][/c][/b] backwards for more power to fly forward.
More thrusters gives your ship more power/speed to fly. If your ship is heavy or loaded - add more thrusters.\nHint:\nYour inventory is better for storing, because the ship counts it as 'weightless'

[c][fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-][/c]
Very well. Now make sure, to rotate your next thrusters. You need 6 of them in 6 different directions to be able to fly properly.Use the Rotation Keys to rotate the thrusters:
Rotation Axis = [b][c][fdb100]Insert[-][/c][/b] or [b][c][fdb100]Delete[-][/c][/b] key
Rotate Block = [b][c][fdb100]Home[-][/c][/b] or [c][fdb100][b]End[/b][-][/c] key

[c][fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-][/c]\nIf you want to [b][c][fdb100]retrieve[-][/c][/b] accidentally wrong placed thrusters, you can use the [b][c][fdb100]Multitool T2[-][/c][/b]. Make sure that it has 'Retrieve' mode active. Click right mouse button RMB to check and choose.

You have to stop the resource gain from the Protoz to destroy them.

Make sure to place one Growing Light in the middle over a 3x3 plots field.

Place a [b][c][fdb100]Water Generator[-][/c][/b] in a lake

Unlock the Water Generator in your Tech Tree. To be found in Misc tab.
Place it in water at the edge of a lake.

You can use it to gain water for Food, Sprouts and Oxygen.

And craft it in your Constructor.

You can use it to [b][c][fdb100]gain water[-][/c][/b] for Food, Sprouts and Oxygen.

Fill the Water Generator with Fuel Pack (Promethium) to make it gain some water automatically over time.
Let it stay there and wait. Remember to loot it regulary.

There is a planet called Shaon in the Nebula System.

It has become quiet on the planet.
Check if everything is alright there.

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
A few years ago, Prof. Void visited the planet Shaon. Some families of Japanese origin lived there. He made friends with them and they stayed in touch. 

But there have been no messages from there for a few months. The EGS company is worried and asks you to check if everything is OK.

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Shaon Planet - Nebula System
Mission activatable in the Clone Room in the EGS HQ Building on the ECC Planet.

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Travel around the Shaon Planet and search for the twelve Japanese Houses. 
Check, if the twelve Families are all doing good.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
No

[b][c][fdb100]Clone Points[-][/c][/b]
Remember to Claim your Clone Point at the Clone Guide Terminal. [b][c][fdb100][-][/c][/b]
You find it somewhere at the end of the mission.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
What a mean story. The Aliens injected mutation gas to the gas vulcano, so every human mutated to a brainless creature... That nobody survived is a blessing for the inhabitants of the planet, because nobody has to mourn.
But the criminal aliens must be caught urgently so that this planet can become a paradise again.
But for now, you have done a good job!

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b] Welcome to a quick side Guide about your Blueprint Library or Factory.\nIf you want to spawn a blueprint but it is [c][fb2016]red [-][/c]or [c][ff8000]orange[-][/c], it could mean you have to adapt it to our [c][ffffff][b]HWS Config[/b][-][/c].
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] That's it. Check your PDA if you want to re-read it. Continue where I interrupted before...

On HWS you will play with an EWS. It means some weapons do more damage against specific materials. Try it yourself. Shoot with Laser against a shield for example.\nYou can check all weapon stats the quickest in your Techtree
To make exploration more fun there is an advanced Warp Drive in HWS. It is more efficient for AU jumps and has an increased range.
The economy is changed to a Commodity and hauler system. The goal is to develop a "Trader" job system for a main salary.
The economy is changed to a Commodity and hauler system. The goal is to develop a "Trader" job system for your main salary. Checkout special NPC Traders. They will tell you more.
To make exploration more fun there is an advanced Warp Drive in HWS (Warp Drive T2). It is more efficient for AU jumps and has an increased range.

On HWS you will play with an EWS. It means some weapons do more damage against specific materials. Try it yourself. Shoot with Laser against a shield for example.\nYou can check all weapon stats the quickest in your Techtree (press F3)

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]\nYou made your choice! Still, this is your LAST CHANCE to rethink your decision!\nI can't tell you what is waiting for you ahead, I just know that it won't be easy.
[b]Thank you[/b] for your patience and please [b]enjoy your stay on HWS[/b]!

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
Try to avoid the guards unseen. 

[c][C80000]Never go into the Red Zones![-][/c]


Red alarm lights come on, if you were too close. In that case, you may even have to restart the mission because too many enemies will appear.

[c][019245]Yellow Zones can be entered, when lights are off![-][/c]

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Outpost of a dark Alien Culture.

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Don't fall off the Cloud later.
There are 7 Easter Eggs hidden in the Japanese Residence.
The cloud is guarded and defended by aliens - be prepared.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
Yes, Infinite times, 60m cooldown + 30m delay per success
There is a planet called Ori in the Nebula System.\n\nTiny little suns form there regularly. These must be destroyed before they get too big.

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]

This planet has a strange phenomenon. Tiny suns appear out of nowhere. They grow relatively quickly and threaten to destroy the planet.

If the planet exploded, it would disrupt the structure of the rest of the solar system with unpredictable consequences.
The EGS company relies on everyone to help keep these tiny suns at bay.

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Ori Planet - Nebula System
Mission activatable in the Clone Room in the EGS HQ Building on the ECC Planet.

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Travel around the Ori Planet, find and destroy some suns.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
No

[b][c][fdb100]Clone Points[-][/c][/b]
Remember to Claim your Clone Point at the Clone Guide Terminal. [b][c][fdb100][-][/c][/b]
You find it somewhere at the end of the mission.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Thank you for your effort, it has been a great help!
Unknown cultures have built strange sun temples here. It seems as if the little suns were born because they were conjured up. This summoning energy continues to this day and has spread beyond the boundaries of the temples. We can only hope that one day this process will end ...


[c][4fe4ff]·····✧···············✧···•´`•. *•.¸`•.¸ ✺ ¸.•´¸.•*.•´`•···✧···············✧·····[-][/c]

Now you can go on and finish for example the Solo Mission [c][4fe4ff]Clone Story | Zion[-][/c].
Find some tiny suns and destroy them
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] \nYou found the first Sun Temple. \nAncient cultures have built these temples here, which are now listed buildings.
Find a big tiny sun field
Find a big tiny sun field
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] You found many tiny suns. They grow fast, destroy them, before they destroy the planet!

[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] 
Well done! 
You destroyed a huge amount of suns and helped a lot to save the Ori Planet!

Although the builders of the sun temples are no longer here, these suns still arise. One hypothesis is that the builders have summoned suns through a ritual. But this went out of control and the builders fled this planet. They suspected that if the sun continued to grow, the planet would explode.
Go to the Watch Tower at Ori Planet.
Now register your effort at the Clone Guide Terminal.
Claim your Clone Point at the Clone Guide Terminal
Go to the Clone Guide Terminal and claim your Clone Point.

On the Ori Planet you can do the [b][c][ffffff]Adventure Mission Ori[-][/c][/b].
If you want, the mission starts now. 
You can earn a [b][c][4fe4ff]Clone Point[-][/c][/b] by successfully completing this mission.

[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] Welcome to a quick side Guide about placeable devices, which you just placed on the terrain. \n[c][e1c211]Keep in mind that placeable devices will be removed with the next Planet Surface wipe![-][/c]
To provide clean and smooth planets in Multiplayer, some popular ones need a Surface Wipe. Technically it means placeable Devices will be removed then.

Pick them up before the [c][fdb100]Surface Wipe[-][/c] occurs. Type [b][c][ffffff]cb:nextwipe[-][/c][/b] to know when.\nTo provide clean and smooth planets in [c][fdb100]Multiplayer[-][/c], some popular ones need a Surface Wipe. Technically it means all placeable Devices like [c][fdb100]Water Generators[-][/c], [c][fdb100]Portable Constructors[-][/c], [c][fdb100]Auto Miners[-][/c], etc. will be removed then.

English:
[i]"Knowledge is the power nobody can steal"[/i]

Your choice was reasonable, Clone.
There is a LOT to learn and explore on HWS.

But no worry, the Tutorial is designed in such a way, that it will guide you through the most most common questions like "How to build a ship? How to get Credits? How to survive? How does HWS Feature XY works?".
It is for sure not 100% complete but always expanding. So even if you call yourself a Veteran or be a returner, this is a great first start.

Italiano: [b]Benvenuto su [019245]HWS [-]- [fdb100]Homeworld Server[-]![/b]

English:
You can always check your progress of your PDA Missions with [b][c][fdb100]F1[-][/c][/b].
Make yourself familiar with all the informations you can get from this information center. 

CONTENT = Missions / Informations:

1) click on the Missions Title - shows a description text on the right box.
2) click on triangles - shows tasks
3) click on a task - shows specific informations for the task and its checkboxes
4) click on tasks checkboxes - the ones with a * can be finished manually

You also have a [b]Log[/b] Button there on the top right. 
Please make sure to [c][fdb100]change back to the PDA Info Button[-][/c], if you want to see the mission and task descriptions.
You can complete tasks with a [c][fdb100]*[-][/c] by clicking the checkboxes manually (in the PDA menu).

[fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-]
You successfully pressed the [fdb100][b]TAB[/b][-] Key and found your Player Panel.
On the [b]left side[/b] you see your [b][fdb100]Inventory[-][/b].
On the [b]right side[/b] are your [b][fdb100]Stats[-][/b] and a [b][fdb100]Survival Constructor Menu[-][/b]. (Select tabs)
Down [b]below[/b] is your [b][fdb100]Toolbar[-][/b].
When ready press [b][fdb100]ESC[-] [/b]and proceed with the last and most important basic: the [b][fdb100]Map[-][/b]. Press [b][fdb100]M[-][/b].

[c][fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-][/c]
You successfully pressed the [c][fdb100][b]M[/b][-][/c] Key and found the map of your actual Planet.
Leftclick, hold and move the mouse to rotate the planet. Use the mouse wheel for zoom.
On top screen you can see an active [c][fdb100][b]Compass Icon[/b][-][/c].
To its right is a [b][c][fdb100]Planet Map[-][/c][/b] and a [b][c][fdb100]Galaxy Map[-][/c][/b].

[u]VERY IMPORTANT[/u] is the bottom right Description panel. Very specific HWS details are listed there.

English:
Stay healthy an sated.
You have two ways to consume something:
1) At your inventory - [b][fdb100]SHIFT LEFT + RMB[-][/b] Right Mouse Botton
2) From your [b][fdb100]Toolbar[-][/b] - select the slot with food by using your mousewheel and click [b][fdb100]LMB[-][/b] Left Mouse Button.

English: Speak with the Shooting Tutorial Clone

[c][fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-][/c]
1) Drag and Drop a Weapon from your inventory (TAB) to your [c][fdb100][b]Toolbar[/b][-][/c].
2) Exit inventory and [b]select[/b] the Weapon with your mousewheel or number keys.
3) Clicking or holding [b][c][fdb100]LMB[-][/c][/b] Left Mouse Button shoots.
4) Holding [b][c][fdb100]RMB[-][/c][/b] Right Mouse Button aims.
5) [b][c][fdb100]R[-][/c][/b] reloads.
6) If the crosshair is red, your target is within range.
Learn more about the serious aspect of Survival!
Kill at least one test objects

1) Drag and Drop a Weapon from your inventory (TAB) to your [c][fdb100][b]Toolbar[/b][-][/c].
2) Exit inventory and [b]select[/b] the Weapon with your mousewheel or number keys.
3) Clicking or holding [b][c][fdb100]LMB[-][/c][/b] Left Mouse Button shoots.
4) Holding [b][c][fdb100]RMB[-][/c][/b] Right Mouse Button aims.
5) [b][c][fdb100]R[-][/c][/b] reloads.
6) If the crosshair is red, your target is within range.
The Jetpack only works, when you have an armor on you.
One of the most powerful utility of your Armor is your Jetpack. Make frequent use of it!
Activate your Jetpack with [b][fdb100]J[-][/b] and jump to the next building.

Follow the white arrow on a green wall.
Activate your Jetpack with J.
Wait until the Jetpack Icon on the bottom left HUD is fully loaded.
Jump over the wall.
Walk to the balcony and make a long jump to the next building.
By hitting the space key in short repetations, your jump can be extended.
Reach the other buildings balcony.
Elevator or Ladders are often found in POIs. You can build them too!\nPress [b][c][ffffff]Spacebar [-][/c][/b]and [b][c][ffffff]C[-][/c][/b] for up and down.
There are Day and Night cycles. Make use of your equipment to always see everything!
Go to the Commodity Trading Tutorial
Commodity Trading in HWS is one of the backbone of every Trader and how to become rich!\nWatch out though, it comes with risks and Adventures.
Look around and choose your destiny!\nWe from [b][c][019245]HWS[-][/c][/b] wish you all the Best and a lot of Fun!
Craft & use the Survival Tool & Detector Tool

1. Open your personal Survival Constructor with [b][c][fdb100]TAB[-][/c][/b].
2. Click on '[b][c][fdb100]Survival Constructor[-][/c][/b]' at top right
3. Craft a [b][c][fdb100]Survival & Detector Tool[-][/c][/b] for free.
4. Grab it from the [b][c][fdb100]Output[-][/c][/b].
Russian: 1. Откройте свой персональный конструктор выживания с помощью TAB.\n2. Создайте SurvivalTool бесплатно.*

English: Put your Survival & Detector Tool into your [b][c][fdb100]Toolbar[-][/c][/b]
1) Open your Survival Constructor at [b][fdb100]TAB[-][/b].\n2) Drag your finished Tool from the [b][fdb100]Output[-][/b] field.\n3) Drop it into your [b][fdb100]Toolbar[-][/b].

Collect 2 Wood Logs with the survival tool. \nChange to [b][fdb100]defence Mode[-][/b] by clicking the [b][fdb100]RMB[-][/b] Right Mouse Button and clicking on upper circle part. (Shield Icon)\nChop down a tree or a shrub. It may need a bit longer to chop down a tree.
Russian: Нужно добыть 2 деревянных бревна с помощью инструмента выживальщика (SurvivalTool). \nПереведите его в режим защиты, щелкнув правой кнопкой мыши. \nРубите дерево или кустарник.

English: Collect 2 Crushed Stone with the survival tool. \nChange to  [b][fdb100]Resource Drill[-][/b] by right clicking and clicking on down right circle part. (Axe on Rock Icon)\nDrill on a rock. Pick up the fallen down Crushed Stone pieces.
Russian: Соберите 1 Битый камень с помощью инструмента выживальщика (SurvivalTool). \nУстановите режим `Удаление камней` с помощью правого клика мыши. \nРаздробите какой нибудь камень.

English: Collect 2 Ores with the survival tool. \nChange to [b][fdb100]Resource Drill[-][/b] by right clicking and clicking on down right circle part. (Axe on Rock Icon)\nDrill on an ore bearing like Iron, Silicon, Copper or Cobalt bearing.Pick up the fallen down Ore pieces.
Craft an Energy Bar in your [b][fdb100]Survival Constructor[-][/b] at TAB.\nYou will need 2 Plant Protein for that. Maybe you have to search for some on the planet.

1) Go to your TechTree at F3.
2) Open the "[b][fdb100]Misc[-][/b]" tab and search for the Portable Constructor.
3) Select the Portable Constructor and click the "[b][fdb100]Unlock[-][/b]" Button in the top right.


Unlock Points are like Experience Points that you get from everything you do like Crafting and Harvesting.

[fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-]\nVery Good! Now go to your [b][fdb100]Survival[-] Constructor[/b] at [b][fdb100]TAB[-][/b] and craft a [b][fdb100]Portable[-] Constructor[/b].\nIf it is still red, you may need some more or other materials. Check in the description what you need.

1) Go to your [b][fdb100]Survival Constructor[-][/b]  with TAB.
2) Click on the blue Icon containing the Portable Constructor.
3) Wait until it finished crafting, then grab it from the Output.
You need at least following raw materials: 5x Iron Ore, 5x Silicon Ore, 5x Copper Ore, 4x Plant Fibers, 5x Crushed Stone
Put your Portable Constructor into your [b][fdb100]Toolbar[-][/b]
[b][fdb100]Drag and Drop[-][/b] your finished Portable Constructor from your Survival Constructor in your Toolbar.
[b][fdb100]Place[-][/b] your Portable Constructor on the ground
Select the Portable Constructor in your Toolbar and place it with LMB on the ground.\nMaybe you have to walk a bit to find a free spot.

[fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-]
[b][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/b] Well done. 
Now you can put some [fdb100][b]Materials[/b][-] in the [fdb100][b]Input[/b][-] field of the Portable Constructor.
Search for the [fdb100][b]Motorbike[/b][-] template and let it be craft by clicking on it. (tab: Circuit/Devices Icon)

Use your Portable Constructor.\nYou need at least following raw materials: 5x Iron Ore, 5x Silicon Ore, 5x Copper Ore, 4x Plant Fibers, 5x Crushed Stone\nor: 2x Iron Ingot, 2x Silicon Ingot, 2x Copper Ingot, 4x Carbon Substrate.
Russian: Используйте свой портативный конструктор и комплект для сборки мотоцикла

English: Put your Motorbike into the Toolbar, then LMB to place it.
Russian: Положите свой мотоцикл в нижнюю панель инвентаря и левым кликом мыши поставьте его на землю

English: Face your Motorbike, hold [b][fdb100]LEFT SHIFT + F[-][/b].
Russian: Встаньте лицом к мотоциклу и, зажав кнопку Shift, нажмите F

English: Empty your Portable Constructor, then pick it up by facing it and press [b][fdb100]LEFT SHIFT + F[-][/b].

[fdb100]······································································································· HWS Tutorial ·······································································································[-]
Now let us craft a motorbike, for faster exploring the planet. 
For that you first need to [b][fdb100]unlock[-][/b] a better Constructor: The [fdb100][b]Portable Constructor[/b][-].
1) Find your Tech Tree at [b][fdb100]F3[-][/b]. The Portable Constructor is listed at [b][fdb100]Misc[-][/b]. 
2) Select the [b][fdb100]Portable Constructor[-][/b] and click the [b][fdb100]Unlock[-][/b] button.
You skipped the Tutorial. Take this for your journey.

[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c]\nFor now, follow the [c][ffffff]Clone Academy[-][/c] [c][019245]Tutorial Start [-][/c]path ahead and check the right side of your screen for your Actions.\nJust make sure to follow my instructions closely.

[c][ffffff]If you started on Prototype, you have to skip this section.[-][/c]\nTo boost your Empyrion Multiplayer experience, we have implemented a command, that helps you starting.\nPress on your Keyboard the [c][fdb100]. (dot)[-][/c] key and type [c][ffffff][b]o:supply[/b][-][/c] to trigger the Bot command.

[c][ffffff]If you started on Prototype, you have to skip this section.[-][/c]
HWS has a special own currency, the [c][fdb100]HWS Reputation Points[-][/c]. There are many ways to earn them, but the main one is with the [i][c][fdb100]Sacrifice of the Alien[-][/c][/i] feature.
For that, equip the proper [c][019245]Alien Container[-][/c] in your Inventory, together with your [c][019245]Origin Weapon[-][/c].
After a short amount of time, the Alien Container(s) will get converted for HWS RP - as happened few seconds ago.
Check it yourself with the command [c][ffffff][b]o:info[/b][-][/c]

HWS has a [c][fdb100]Rock-Paper-Scissors principle for combat[-][/c]. Some weapons do more damage against components than others.\nPlasma and Laser weapons for example do massive bonus damage against Shields.

Now for your next task, you need some sensitiveness. Activate your Jetpack with [b][c][fdb100]J[-][/c][/b].

Jump high over the wall. Afterwards make a long jump to the next balcony.
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] That's it. Check your PDA if you want to re-read it. Continue where I interrupted before...
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] It's time to travel to the Stars, Clone!Once ready, [c][fdb100][b]fly to the Orbit of this planet[/b][-][/c] and start your Journey!
The Universe is vast and navigation through it is the key.

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
If EGS take care of the inhabitants of their universe in order to maintain the peace and to distribute the prosperity appropriately, they are always interested in the well-being of the inhabitants of the planet Zion and ready to help if they need anything. This time you can do the job.

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Zion Planet - Blue Dwarf System
Mission activatable in the Clone Room in the EGS HQ Building on the ECC Planet.

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Visit the planet and make sure everyone is fine.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
No

[b][c][fdb100]Clone Points[-][/c][/b]
Remember to Claim your Clone Point at the Clone Guide Terminal. [b][c][fdb100][-][/c][/b]
You find it somewhere at the end of the mission.
A respectable little people have settled on the planet Zion. \n\nSee if everything is okay there.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Thank you for your effort, it has been a great help!
The two Citys know each other again and are working together to bring the planet back to a livable state.
They are sure to become a good role model for all other planet dwellers.

[c][4fe4ff]·····✧···············✧···•´`•. *•.¸`•.¸ ✺ ¸.•´¸.•*.•´`•···✧···············✧·····[-][/c]

After that I recommend the Solo Mission [c][4fe4ff]Clone Story | Shaon[-][/c].

Enter Planet Zion in the Blue Dwarf System
Visit the Mayor of Zion City
Find the Lifeguard at Swimming Pool

English:
Fill the pentaxid tank with Pentaxid (refined).

How to warp to your Hub System System:
Hit M (galaxy map) to figure out where the next Orbit lies and Lock Target. 
An orange arrow appears above your targeted Playfield. Also there is an orange Target Marker at your hud. 
Follow the orange arrow at the sides of your screen to find the orange Target Marker.
(Maybe relog, if you entered the moon or planet afterwards)
Fly directly in the direction of the Target Marker.
While flying press K to warp.
Good Luck!
Russian:
Это задание можно отметить выполненным вручную.

Поставьте на своё МС Варп Двигатель и Бак Варп Двигателя.
Заполните их Пентаксидом (переработанным).

Совершите Варп прыжок на орбиту HQ планеты вашей расы.
Нажмите `M` чтобы выяснить, где находится ближайшая Орбита и поставить цель на неё. 
Двигайтесь в направлении установленного маркера.
Нажмите `K` чтобы совершить Варп прыжок.
Желаю удачи!

English: You skipped the Tutorial. Take this for your journey.
Russian: Вы пропустили обучение. Оно вам пригодится для вашего путешествия.

English: Search for the Origin Decision Triolith

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]\nYou made your choice! Still, this is your LAST CHANCE to rethink your decision!\nI can't tell you what is waiting for you ahead, I just know that it won't be easy.

[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c]
You are awake my important Clone! Very well then: Welcome to your new Universe!

If I may introduce myself: I am your tool that makes your life easier. I guide you through your tutorial and am always available on the website [u][url=https://connect.hws.global/][c][019245]https://connect.hws.global[-][/c][/url][/u].

Once you established on the Tutorial Planet your goal is to survive, build a ship and [c][fdb100]leave the planet as soon as possible.[-][/c] Because of the 'starter wipe' every [c][fdb100]7 days.[-][/c]

[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c]
You are awake my important Clone! Very well then: Welcome to your new Universe!

If I may introduce myself: I am your tool that makes your life easier. I guide you through your tutorial and am always available on the website [u][url=https://connect.hws.global/][c][019245]https://connect.hws.global[-][/c][/url][/u].

Once you established on the Tutorial Planet your goal is to survive, build a ship and [c][fdb100]leave the planet as soon as possible.[-][/c] Because of the 'starter wipe' every [c][fdb100]7 days.[-][/c]

[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c] Very well done! 

With your new Level, you get some confidential informations from me:
Your Clone Body is the product of the EGS Corporation. They do not hide this information, but they don't say it publicly either. I think it is because, their efforts do not always end positively... You are lucky, that you are alive and your brain is working well!

[c][fdb100]Remember: fly to the Orbit once you are ready to continue your Journey![-][/c]

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b] 
Now you can travel the sky and near spaces, awesome!
Have fun with your self-built new ship!

It is time to leave the starter system. When you are ready and packed everything, fly to the orbit of this planet first.

[c][ed1e1e]Once you left this starter System, you can't come back![-][/c]

Why are you a Prototype? Who created you? What is your task? Why are the other 3 Origins so different?

The Prototype Start on HWS is the first attempt for a long time goal of mine: create a [c][fdb100]Campaign within Multiplayer[-][/c].
While still working on it and not finished at all yet, be sure that Prototypes will get a fundamental role element within HWS!

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Your next step is to leave this planet as soon as possible.
This is important, because it is too dangerous to live here a long time.
[c][fdb100](Planet wipe every 7 days. Type cb:wipe in your private chat for detailed info)[-][/c]
You will find your home planet out there very quick.

Let's build a small vessel (SV) for your short trip through the space!
I have a step by step tutorial for you and teleport core items to your inventory, so you can easily follow.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
To complete your Tutorial, we go through building a Base and CV at the end. I will help you by transporting some core items into your inventory.
[c][fdb100][u]REMEMBER[/u]: everything you build here on the Start Tutorial planet, will be wiped after 7 days[-][/c]. So don't spend too much time with our test base.

To build further Bases later on, you will need to harvest more materials like Iron, Copper, Silicon and Cobalt.
Craft yourself a [b][c][fdb100]Drill[-][/c][/b], it is a bit stronger and faster in harvesting than the Survival & Detector Tool.

If EGS take care of the inhabitants of their universe in order to maintain the peace and to distribute the prosperity appropriately, they are always interested in the well-being of the inhabitants of the planet Zion and ready to help if they need anything. This time you can do the job.

1. Open your personal Survival Constructor with [b][c][fdb100]TAB[-][/c][/b].
2. Click on '[b][c][fdb100]Survival Constructor[-][/c][/b]' at top right
3. Craft a [b][c][fdb100]Survival & Detector Tool[-][/c][/b] for free.

English: Put your Survival & Detector Tool into your [b][c][fdb100]Toolbar[-][/c][/b]

On the Ori Planet you can do the [b][c][ffffff]Adventure Mission Ori[-][/c][/b].
If you want, the mission starts now. 
You can earn a [b][c][4fe4ff]Clone Point[-][/c][/b] by successfully completing this mission.

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
This planet has a strange phenomenon. Tiny suns appear out of nowhere. They grow relatively quickly and threaten to destroy the planet.

If the planet exploded, it would disrupt the structure of the rest of the solar system with unpredictable consequences.
The EGS company relies on everyone to help keep these tiny suns at bay.

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Ori Planet - Nebula System

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Travel around the Ori Planet, find and destroy some suns.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
No

[b][c][fdb100]Clone Points[-][/c][/b]
Remember to Claim your Clone Point at the Clone Guide Terminal. [b][c][fdb100][-][/c][/b]
You find it somewhere at the end of the mission.

On the Shaon Planet you can do the [b][c][ffffff]Adventure Mission Shaon[-][/c][/b].
If you want, the mission starts now. 
You can earn a [b][c][4fe4ff]Clone Point[-][/c][/b] by successfully completing this mission.

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
A few years ago, Prof. Void visited the planet Shaon. Some families of Japanese origin lived there. He made friends with them and they stayed in touch. 

But there have been no messages from there for a few months. The EGS company is worried and asks you to check if everything is OK.

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Shaon Planet - Nebula System

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Travel around the Shaon Planet and search for the twelve Japanese Houses. 
Check, if the twelve Families are all doing good.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
No

[b][c][fdb100]Clone Points[-][/c][/b]
Remember to Claim your Clone Point at the Clone Guide Terminal. [b][c][fdb100][-][/c][/b]
You find it somewhere at the end of the mission.

On the Triton Planet you can do the [b][c][ffffff]Adventure Mission Triton[-][/c][/b].
If you want, the mission starts now. 
You can earn a [b][c][4fe4ff]Clone Point[-][/c][/b] by successfully completing this mission.

[b][c][fdb100]Mission[-][/c][/b]
On the traces of Professor Void on ECC you learned about the Aliens Technologies. On the Triton Planet Professor Void himself developed a new device, but he did not came far... 

[b][c][fdb100]Location[-][/c][/b]
Triton Planet - Blue Dwarf System

[b][c][fdb100]Intel[-][/c][/b]
Travel around the Triton Planet and search for the ten EGS Caves. 
Solve a Puzzle to enter the secret room in the RMX Cave. 
Find out, what happened on the Triton Planet.

[b][c][fdb100]Repeatable[-][/c][/b]
No

[b][c][fdb100]Clone Points[-][/c][/b]

You find it somewhere at the end of the mission.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
Your next step is to leave this planet as soon as possible.
This is important, because it is too dangerous to live here a long time.
[c][fdb100](Planet wipe every 7 days. Type cb:wipe in your private chat for detailed info)[-][/c]
You will find your home planet out there very quick.

Let's build a small vessel (SV) for your short trip through the space!
I have a step by step tutorial for you and teleport core items to your inventory, so you can easily follow.

Let's move on to your first big HWS Feature Tutorial. The most important feature on HWS. The [c][fdb100]Orbital Cargo Drone[-][/c] or in short [c][fdb100]OCD[-][/c]. This Feature lets you store items in a virtual space, which only you have access to. You get access to it by logging in to our HWS Connect website. It is free and secure. Just google HWS Connect or go here: https://connect.hws.global

However to make it a fun feature it is bound into a [c][019245]progression system[-][/c]. So you have your OCD at level 1 right now, if you are a new player on HWS. You can level it up to level 10.
To do that, you need credits and HWS RP. And here you realize that HWS has its own Economy and Story, which you will dive into soon.

For now, let's visit one of many [c][fdb100]OCD Outposts[-][/c], so you can start in small steps.
Since it transmits your items, it is floating in the air for better connectivity.
Fly to the HWS OCD Outpost
Since it transmits your items, it is floating in the air for better connectivity.
[c][019245][b]HWS Connect:[/b][-][/c]\nGreat! Here you can upload and download your items, as long as your OCD level is below 5.\nLater on, you can do it globally and store more and more items.
You can thank EGS later for this gift.

[b][c][019245]HWS Connect:[-][/c][/b]
This is kind of rushed, considering you don't know how to survive properly yet.
But it's always good to have a Cockpit as a second home, right?
Leave this Structure first, otherwise your ship might get stucked inside the roof.
Then:
1. Press [c][fdb100].[-][/c] (dot) on your keyboard
2. If you are in a faction already switch to Faction Chat with CTRL + Arrow Right key
3. Type [c][fdb100]egs:spawn[-][/c]
4. It will spawn above you, so take care. Fuel it afterwards and check in the Control Panel, at Statistics, if all Sensitivity Sliders are set correctly (above 0)
